Descripción: Acerca del empleo Aha! is a very different type of high-growth SaaS company. We are self-funded, highly profitable, and 100 percent remote. We provide the world's #1 product development software so teams can build products that customers love. More than 600,000 product builders use our suite of tools which includes Aha! Roadmaps , Aha! Ideas , Aha! Create , and Aha! Develop . And they rely on our training programs via Aha! Academy to become product development experts. We are recognized as one of the best fully remote companies to work for, champion the Bootstrap Movement , and have given over $1M to people in need through Aha! Cares . Learn more at www.aha.io .  Our team  Aha! engineering is a mid-sized, fully remote team that is highly productive. We are centered around North American time zones so we can collaborate during the workday.  We move quickly: We ship code multiple times a day. We believe in getting new features in front of customers and iteratively improving as we learn what works and what does not. We collaborate: We each bring unique experiences and skills to the table. Working together to share that knowledge benefits the entire team and helps us produce the best results for our customers. We value product over process: We want the team to have the time and focus to solve complex challenges. We aim to minimize the overhead introduced by heavyweight processes and excessive meetings. We enjoy: We like what we do. And we want you to love your job too. Learn more about The Responsive Method , our company values , and the generous benefits we offer. Our technology  Our web application is a single-instance, multi-tenant Ruby on Rails monolith supported by Postgres (database), Redis (background jobs), and memcached (Rails caching). We also run a Node.js webserver to support collaborative editing and real-time updates. Our application is hosted on Amazon Web Services and architected with ECS for reproducibility and scalability.  We utilize a growing amount of React on the front end to build rich client-side experiences, including our fully collaborative text editor and our slide presentation editor. We balance the strengths of both technologies — Rails for its conventions and simplicity and React for more powerful interactive functionality.  We embrace new technologies that help us deliver a lovable product, but we also remain cognizant of the maintenance overhead that a new library or platform brings. We solve the problems in front of us rather than prematurely optimizing to address issues that may never materialize.  We do most of our planning and collaboration in Aha! Roadmaps and built Aha! Develop so that software engineers and their teams could take advantage of those same rich features. We use Slack and Zoom for video calls. (Email? Rarely.)  Your Experience  We believe that being a kind person who elevates the rest of the team is just as valuable as writing great code. You have strong problem-solving skills and experience working on important functionality for a cloud-based product. You are humble, eager to learn, and always willing to help others learn as well. You want to work with people who enjoy picking up a problem and solving it, regardless of the technologies and techniques involved.  Most of our features involve writing significant Ruby on Rails code, so you have meaningful past experience working in a Rails codebase. We also write a lot of React, but we are happy to help you learn that part on the job.  Your work at Aha!  As Ruby On Rails Engineer, Your Work Will Include  We work on a broad range of features across the full stack.  Implementing new features for our users, touching each layer of the MVC as needed Building deeply interactive reporting interfaces using React Working proactively with product and UX to refine and iterate on specifications as the feature takes shape Investigating slow performance and optimizing queries to ensure Aha! is snappy and satisfying to use Interfacing directly with users to quickly squash bugs as part of our regular customer support rotation Documenting components in our style guide to help drive consistency  If the Ruby on Rails Engineer role sounds appealing, we would love to hear from you. (A real human reviews every application.)  Grow with us  Everyone deserves to reach their fullest potential. We know that when we do work that matters with people we care about in a high-growth environment, we feel engaged and alive. And our goal is to help you do just that. We offer all the benefits you would expect and more, including profit sharing. The specific benefits listed below are reflective of what we offer U.S.-based hires. We also do our best to extend identical benefits to international teammates.  Generous salary with annual profit sharing for all Medical, dental, and vision plans — for many teammates, we cover 100 percent of the premiums Up to 200 hours of paid time off a year to spend however you want 30 to 90 days of paid parental leave and five to 10 days of paid care and bereavement leave Up to $1,000 annually for third-party education, along with paid time off to immerse yourself in learning Aha! contributes a percentage of your total compensation each year towards your retirement

Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  What We're Looking For: You're an expert in: Cloud Engineering (cloud computing) experience with AWS, Azure, and/or GCP. Networking (VPC, security groups, ALB/NLB, NAT, Route53, VPNs, WAF). Network architecture, including load-balancing, SSL, NGINX, Apache, DNS, IPSec. Access Control and Auditing. Postgress, data migration, PostgreSQL, MySQL, others. Storage design for high availability and disaster recovery. Linux operating systems. Large, greenfield, and legacy Ruby, PHP, Python, Node.js, and React apps. Serverless deployment (Lambda, API Gateway, or equivalent). Infrastructure as a code, specifically Terraform / Pulumi / Cloudformation experience. Design and maintain CI/CD process and tools (CircleCI, GitLab, Jenkins, etc). DockerIn-depth experience with the orchestration tools, especially Kubernetes. In-depth experience with the YAML config management tools, especially Helm & Ansible. Experience with Agile processes, testing, and code review Good communication skills. Fully professional English fluency.  Nice To Have Qualifications: AWS Professional Certificates. Kubernetes Certificates. Google Cloud Certificates. Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon. Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them. An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them. Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.  Duties: Architect and integrate new applications along with occasional legacy applications. Build, maintain, and update tools for deployment, monitoring, operations, and security. Troubleshoot and resolve issues in dev, testing, and production environments. Structure and maintain software config management systems. Scale for demand. Work with high-growth, technology clients. Develop and improve operational practices and procedures. Suggest improvements and enhancements. Bring new features and services into production. Meaningful experience working on large, complex systems. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. You’re passionate about software development and DevOps...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current. You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your colleagues.  Benefits: Competitive Salary Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Senior Product Developer, Retail Data Platforms  Orium is seeking a Senior Product Developer who approaches technology with curiosity, to contribute to our evolving offerings around retail data platform engineering. In this role you'll report to the Head of Product Engineering and you'll work as part of a cross-functional team to help lead the exploration, experimentation, and development of our service offerings around retail data platforms. You'll work alongside other members of the Product function on the design and development of software solution accelerators that are used across our organization as the platform for the services projects we deliver for our customers. You have hands-on experience with data platform engineering, using global cloud providers, in a retail and/or e-commerce context, with exposure to systems like OMS, POS, ERP and others.  Responsibilities  Contribute to high-level estimation and participate in laying out the architecture and development sequences of implementation projects Complete independently complex development tasks and actively contribute to pushing quality code to production Develop expertise in partner technologies and best-practices, supporting other members of the team level-up Clearly communicate on technical and advanced topics to both a technical and non-technical audience Delivery technical presentations and demos to technology partners and customers Support the implementation of new methodologies and processes Support knowledge-sharing activities within the team by creating documentation and technical references Accountable for performance, reliability, scalability and resilience of project deliverables  Is the Role a Fit for You?  The Senior Product Developer, Retail Data Platform Engineering, role emphasizes team collaboration, technical proficiency, and leadership in your area of expertise. You’ll find fulfillment in the role if you:  Embrace ambiguity and uncertainty. You appreciate the lean approach to product development and are excited to pivot in response to new research and customer feedback Delight in making things. You thrill at the concept of going beyond the theoretical and applying your ideas, skills, and expertise to products used by people every day Find passion in new challenges. Every chance to learn and move things forward with your can-do attitude or to share your entrepreneurship excites you Thoroughly enjoy collaborative work. Knowledge sharing and the chance to be part of a team who co-own the output, instead of a solo hero who lives and dies by their work alone, is important to you  Skills and Qualifications  4+ years of industry experience as a software engineer, with at least 2 years of hands-on experience with retail and/or e-commerce systems (, OMS, ERP,, POS, and others) Advanced experience developing in Python Hands-on experience working with one or more global cloud service providers such as AWS, GCP, or Azure Deep understanding of Computer Science fundamentals and Software Engineering principles Experience leading by influence within teams of developers working on research, prototyping, and technical decision making  Benefits and Perks  Enjoy a flexible schedule of full-time hours. As a remote-first organization, we care about the work you do, but it’s up to you to choose where and how you do it. Explore ongoing opportunities for professional development: training, conferences, certifications, and in-house peer mentorship. Experiment with new techniques, wear multiple hats and learn about new disciplines. Pursue independent projects, explore new ideas, and challenge yourself in your field with dedicated “Awesome time” (self-directed professional development) annually and quarterly training budgets. On top of standard medical and dental coverage, we offer benefits like a parental leave top-up plan, an EAP, mental health coverage, virtual healthcare and a minimum vacation policy. Our Toronto HQ is a modern, ergonomic space complete with hotelling standing/sitting desks available and an open-concept social atmosphere. Additional perks are available including in-house mindfulness sessions, an employee stock option plan, remote group get-togethers, and more!  Performance and Growth Expectations  We emphasize accountability for outcomes, but autonomy in activities. Your work will be measured across a number of data points (peer, leader & project team feedback) and will also be measured on the basis of client and user satisfaction. Your growth path is in your hands— you’ll have ongoing meetings with your leader to help determine your path, but your progress will be based on what you hope to achieve and how you choose to access the resources available to you.  About Orium  Orium (formerly known as Myplanet) is North America's leading consultancy and systems integrator specializing in composable commerce, customer data, and retail platform engineering. We have over a decade of experience in digital programs, and we work closely with best-in-class technology partners to bring modern commerce experiences to life as a member of the MACH Alliance. We're a remote-first company of over 200 globally-distributed employees. We've been a certified BCorp for over a decade. Based in Toronto with a global studio presence, we draw from a range of talents and perspectives to bring together data, systems thinking, and curiosity to build next-generation experiences. We’re building deep capabilities in data-driven design, AI implementation, and personalization while forming strong partnerships with leaders in machine learning, hardware development, and IoT platforms.  Committed to an Inclusive Workplace  We are committed to fostering an inclusive and accessible environment as we build a workforce that reflects the diversity of the community in which we live, including those with disabilities. We are dedicated to providing accommodations in all parts of the hiring process in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act and the Ontario Human Rights Code. If you require any accommodation, we will work with you to meet your needs.  Committed to Social and Environmental Stewardship Orium is committed to promoting and working towards a more socially and environmentally sustainable future. All employees are expected to make decisions and take actions in relation to their role and work that follow through on this commitment.

Título: Trabajos remotos de Analista de Datos
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Una empresa que cotiza en la Bolsa de Nueva York y que ha revolucionado la industria farmacéutica durante más de un siglo con sus productos y servicios centrados en el cliente está buscando un analista de datos. El candidato seleccionado será responsable de revisar los datos para identificar información comercial clave y de explorar las formas de utilizarlos para resolver problemas. La compañía ha establecido con éxito una base de clientes global a través de sus servicios de investigación y desarrollo, fabricación y distribución de clase mundial. Esta es una oportunidad única para los desarrolladores que están ansiosos por trabajar con un gigante multinacional y acelerar sus carreras.  Responsabilidades:  Automatizar los procesos comerciales existentes y los conjuntos de datos esenciales Analizar y mejorar la escalabilidad y la eficiencia de los procedimientos de recopilación y almacenamiento de datos del sistema Diseñar código existente, crear servicios y conjuntos de datos para usuarios relevantes Mejorar la observabilidad y la supervisión de los procesos de producción  Requerimientos:  Licenciatura / Maestría en Ingeniería, Ciencias de la Computación (o experiencia equivalente) Al menos 3 años de experiencia relevante como ingeniero de datos Amplia experiencia en Power BI – Power Query y Python Conocimiento de la cadena de suministro Dominio del inglés
Descripción (inglés): A company that is listed on the New York Stock Exchange and that has revolutionized the pharmaceutical industry for over a century with its customer-centered products and services is looking for a data analyst. The selected candidate will be responsible for reviewing data to identify key business information and exploring ways to use it to solve problems. The company has successfully established a global customer base through its world-class research and development, manufacturing and distribution services. This is a unique opportunity for developers who are eager to work with a multinational giant and accelerate their careers. Responsibilities: Automate existing business processes and essential data sets Analyze and improve the scalability and efficiency of system data collection and storage procedures Design existing code, create services and data sets for relevant users Improve the observability and monitoring of production processes Requirements: License/Mastery in Engineering, Computing Sciences (or equivalent experience) At least 3 years of relevant experience as a data engineer Extensive experience in Power BI – Power Query and Python Supply Chain Knowledge English Domain (or equivalent)

Título: Analista de datos y servicio al cliente
Descripción: Acerca del empleo TH PLUS Talento Humano, requiere para uno de sus clientes en la ciudad de Bogota, de un analista de datos y servicio al cliente, técnico o tecnólogo recién graduado, debe tener conocimientos y experiencia en manejo de bases de datos, Excel avanzado, excelentes relaciones interpersonales, persona orientada al logro y al cumplimiento de metas y objetivos, Se ofrece vinculación directa con la empresa, contrato a termino indefinido con prestaciones sociales y comisiones por cumplimiento de ventas. Interesados enviar hoja de vida al correo jsuarez@thpluscorp.com, indicando aspiración salarial.
Descripción (inglés): TH PLUS Human Talent, requires for one of its clients in the city of Bogota, from a data analyst and customer service, technical or technologist recently graduated, must have knowledge and experience in database management, advanced Excel, excellent interpersonal relationships, person oriented to the achievement and fulfillment of goals and objectives, It offers direct link with the company, contract to indefinite term with social benefits and commissions for fulfillment of sales. Interested send resume to the mail jsuarez@thpluscorp.com, indicating wage aspiration.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Rockwell Automation is a global technology leader focused on helping the world’s manufacturers be more productive, sustainable, and agile. With more than 25,000 employees who make the world better every day, we know we have something special. Behind our customers - amazing companies that help feed the world, provide life-saving medicine on a global scale, and focus on clean water and green mobility - our people are energized problem solvers that take pride in how the work we do changes the world for the better.  We welcome all makers, forward thinkers, and problem solvers who are looking for a place to do their best work. And if that’s you we would love to have you join us!  Job Description  Engineering students with basic knowledge in software development
Descripción (inglés): Rockwell Automation is a global technology leader focused on helping the world’s manufacturers be more productive, sustainable, and agile. With more than 25,000 employees who make the world better every day, we know we have something special. Behind our customers - amazing companies that help feed the world, provide life-saving medicine on a global scale, and focus on clean water and green mobility - our people are energized problem solvers that take pride in how the work we do changes the world for the better.  We welcome all makers, forward thinkers, and problem solvers who are looking for a place to do their best work. And if that’s you we would love to have you join us!  Job Description  Engineering students with basic knowledge in software development

Descripción: Acerca del empleo The Role  Working in a fast-paced, innovative environment, as a QA Engineer, you'll help Apploi improve our software quality and play a critical role in customer support .  Who You Are  Strong communication and fluent English required, both verbal and written Desire to work in a fast-paced start-up environment Strong work ethic, integrity, and desire to succeed Adaptability to new initiatives At least 2 years experience performing manual QA testing and writing test cases At least 2 years experience with Agile software development methodologies At leaset 1 years of test automation experience desired A strong desire to learn test automation tools and behavior-driven development  What You’ll Do  Work in a team of QA engineers Perform manual testing Maintain a suite of test cases and write comprehensive documentation Learn end-to-end automated testing and behavior driven development (BDD) Interact regularly with our Customer Success team and perform tier 2 customer support Support teams using Python and React Serve as an advocate for the end user Follow industry best practices and suggest improvements  Perks & Benefits  Competitive pay Flex Fridays - employees are encouraged to take up to 2 Fridays off each month outside of PTO, no meetings & wrap up at 3pm on all other Fridays Wellness reimbursement Excellent employee referral program Internal training programs In-person events and activities Employee hubs and office locations nationwide Flexible and remote working options Healthy life/work balance Fun, collaborative work environment  About Apploi  At Apploi, we pride ourselves on putting people first. This starts at the heart of the company, where we’ve created a workspace where we can be unapologetically ourselves. We’re an eclectic and spirited bunch with amazing company culture, working together to revolutionize hiring!  Apploi is transforming how healthcare hires with all-in-one software that empowers companies to find, onboard, and retain staff. Working with over 7,000 healthcare organizations across the United States, our team helps leaders solve the industry’s most pressing problem: how to provide superb care in the midst of a candidate shortage.  Our mission to revolutionize hiring through innovation, empathy, and an understanding of human impact has earned Apploi widespread notice. In 2021, Apploi won Gold for Established Excellence in Inc.’s Best in Business awards, and was recognized in 2022 by Inc. as one of America’s Fastest Growing Companies for the third consecutive year. The platform was also recognized by GetApp as a 2022 category leader in onboarding, recruiting, and applicant tracking. On a wide scale and an individual basis, Apploi is dedicated to helping healthcare workers and employers thrive in the industry they love.  At Apploi, we’re devoted to creating an excellent employee experience. Our team, culture, and benefits all make it an incredible place to work, so come join us!  We’re an equal-opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo 1. Cargo Requerido: - IOs Mobile Engineer  2. Funciones del cargo que ocupará: Levantamiento, análisis, diseño, desarrollo, pruebas, documentación e Instalación/Entrega de software. Generar código de pruebas unitarias que garanticen la solidez, como casos de borde, usabilidad y fiabilidad general.  Requisitos Técnicos Excluyentes: Objective-C Cocoa Touch Swift Bibliotecas y API de terceros (Conocimiento y experiencia en: Micro servicios (Rest / Soap), Spring Boot). Conocimientos en herramientas apoyo al desarrollo como: bamboo, Jira, Jenkins, Maven, Confluence, Bitbucket.  Requisitos Técnicos Deseables: N/A  3. Requisitos Académicos: - Ingeniero Informático titulado o Analista Programador  4. Capacidades: - Capacidad de análisis y de síntesis. - Proactivo(a), metódico(a) y ordenado(a). - Capacidad de trabajo bajo presión. - Capacidad de gestión, coordinación y hacer frente a desafíos. - Alta Capacidad de trabajo en equipo y de cara al cliente. - Alta capacidad de análisis e investigación personal. - Tener permanente adaptación a los cambios y a las innovaciones tecnológicas. - Capacidad para establecer apropiadas relaciones interpersonales. - Habilidades comunicacionales. - Orientación de Servicio al Cliente. - Alta capacidad para cumplir compromisos. - Compromiso Organizacional. - Probidad. - Ética.  5. Experiencia Requerida para el cargo a cubrir: Al menos 3 a 5 años de experiencia en el cargo (Perfil Medio).  6. Condiciones contractuales: Contratación directa de tipo Indefinido.
Descripción (inglés): 1. Charge Required: - IOs Mobile Engineer 2. Functions of the position you will occupy: Lifting, analysis, design, development, testing, documentation and installation/software delivery. Generate unitary test code that guarantees solidity, such as border cases, usability and general reliability. Exclusive Technical Requirements: Objective-C Cocoa Touch Swift Libraries and APIs of third parties (Knowledge and experience in: Micro services (Rest/Soap), Spring Boot). Knowledge in tools support development such as: bamboo, Jira, Jenkins, Maven, Confluence, Bitbucket. Deserable Technical Requirements: N/A 3. Academic Requirements: - Qualified Computer Engineer or Analyst Programmer 4. Capacities: - Capacities of analysis and synthesis. - Proactive(a), methodical and orderly. - Capacity of work under pressure. - Capacity of management, coordination and facing challenges. - High Capacity of team work and customer-facing. - High capacity of analysis and personal research. - Have permanent innovation to the changes.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Id de solicitud de puesto:  56844  Nombre de la vacante: Desarrollador de SW  Requisitos académicos: Ingeniero de sistemas o afines  Requisitos de experiencia: Conocimientos en programación sobre plataforma JavaScript y Pl-Sql Oracle  Funciones:  Comprender el requerimiento de software. Modelar y refinar especificaciones a fin de determinar un diseño detallado para implantar la funcionalidad requerida. Construir o adaptar clases, módulos u otras piezas de software. Reutilizar componentes existentes integrándolos con código propio. Verificar los programas producidos probándolos en forma unitaria. Revisar el código para resolver defectos o mejorarlo. Documentar los programas de acuerdo a estándares. Tanto con documentos funcionales y de arquitectura, como con comentarios en el propio código. Mantener las aplicaciones productivas, corregir errores e implementar nuevas funcionalidades. Cumplir con las entregas según las estimaciones de tiempo realizadas. Trabajar en estrecha colaboración con otros desarrolladores. Optimizar el rendimiento de las aplicaciones.
Descripción (inglés): Job Application Id: 56844 Vacancy Name: SW Developer Academic Requirements: System Engineer or Related Experience Requirements: Software Knowledge on JavaScript Platform and Pl-Sql Oracle Functions: Understand the Software Requirement. Model and refine specifications to determine a detailed design to implement the required functionality. Build or adapt classes, modules or other software parts. Reuse existing components by integrating them with your own code. Verify the programs produced by testing them in a unitary manner. Review the code to solve defects or improve it. Document programs according to standards. Both with functional and architectural documents, as well as with comments on the code itself. Maintain productive applications, correct errors and implement new functionalities. Comply deliver according to the time estimates made. Work closely with other developers. Optimize the performance of applications.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¡Si eres tecnólogo o profesional en ingeniería de sistemas o afines, y cuentas con experiencia en compañías dedicadas al análisis de datos, análisis estádistico, conocimiento del consumidor y/o afines, esta oferta es para ti!  Al trabajar con nosotros, realizarás funciones tales como:  *Procesamiento de los datos recopilados a través de nuestras diferentes investigaciones de mercado. *Depuración y organización de la información. *Detección de errores en la información analizada. *Entrega de reportes. *Procesamiento de datos en diferentes sistemas como SPSS. *Aseguramiento de la calidad de la información.  Te ofrecemos un ambiente de constante formación y aprendizaje, incluyendo tu competencia en el manejo del idioma inglés, que podrás seguir desarrollando al trabajar con nosotros.  Kantar es la empresa líder mundial de datos, insights y consultoría. Ayudamos a nuestros clientes a entender a las personas e inspirar su crecimiento. En Kantar trabajamos con datos y hechos demostrables para ofrecer insights y recomendaciones accionables a nuestros clientes de todo el mundo. Tenemos una comprensión única y completa de cómo piensan, sienten y actúan las personas a nivel global y local en más de 90 mercados.  ¡Postúlate ahora y haz parte de una de las mejores compañías en Colombia para jovenes profesionales! (De acuerdo con el último ranking de EFY).
Descripción (inglés): If you are a technologist or a professional in systems engineering or related, and you have experience in companies dedicated to data analysis, static analysis, consumer knowledge and/or related, this offer is for you! By working with us, you will perform functions such as: *Processing data collected through our different market research. *Debugging and organization of information. *Detecting errors in analyzed information. *Delivering reports. *Processing data in different systems such as SPSS. *Insureing the quality of information. We offer you an environment of constant training and learning, including your competence in the management of the English language, which you will be able to further develop when working with us. Kantar is the world's leading data, insights and consulting company. We help our customers understand people and inspire their growth. In Kantar we work with data and demonstrable facts to offer insights and actionable recommendations to our customers all over the world. We have a unique and complete understanding of how people think, feel and act at a global and local level in more than 90 markets.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Este anuncio proviene de un tablón de empleos. Más información Si cumples con todos los requisitos te estamos esperando, envia tu hoja de vida a nuestro correo talentohumano@turrisystem.com PRESENCIAL  Profesional en Ingeniería de Sistemas o carreras afines. Con estudios complementarios en Estructuras de Datos o BI o àreas afines. Experiencia mínima de tres (2) años en implementación de Análisis de Datos. Con conocimientos en ETL y diseño de Dashboards. Responsable de definir e implementar la estrategia de Análisis de datos, basado en la informacion de los diferentes modulos de una app Movil.
Descripción (inglés): This ad comes from a job planner. Learn more If you meet all the requirements we are waiting for you, send your resume to our human talent email@turrisystem.com PRESENTIAL Professional in Systems Engineering or related careers. With complementary studies in Data Structures or BI or related areas. Minimum experience of three (2) years in Data Analysis implementation. With knowledge in ETL and Dashboard design. Responsible for defining and implementing the Data Analysis strategy, based on the information of the different modules of a Movil app.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo En GNP somos líderes en el sector de Telecomunicaciones, Marketing y Tecnología. Nos encontramos en búsqueda de Técnico o Tecnólogo con conocimiento en paquete ofimático a nivel avanzado y análisis de datos. Debe tener mínimo 6 meses de experiencia en cargos relacionados. Su función principal será la de disenar y realizar informes de métricas de la campana y presentarlos a la operación. IMPORTANTE MANEJO DE EXCEL AVANZADO. Se ofrece Contrato Obra Labor con todas las prestaciones de ley directo con la empresa, buen clima laboral y beneficios de bienestar organizacional. Horario de Lunes a viernes 8:00am - 5:30pm y sábados 8:00am - 1:30 pm. Salario $1´650.000 + Auxilio de transporte.
Descripción (inglés): At GNP we are leaders in the field of Telecommunications, Marketing and Technology. We are in search of Technician or Technologist with knowledge in office package at advanced level and data analysis. You must have at least 6 months of experience in related charges. Your main function will be to design and make reports of bell metrics and present them to the operation. IMPORTANT MANNEJO DE EXCEL ADVANCED. Contract Work Labor with all the benefits of direct law with the company, good working climate and organizational welfare benefits. Time from Monday to Friday 8:00am - 5:30pm and Saturdays 8:00am - 1:30 pm. Salary $1 ́650,000 + Transportation Help.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Business Analytics is all about cooperation, gathering intelligence with other departments, and turning it into useful suggestions for the company's further growth.  We're a passionate bunch responsible for providing particular insights in full detail to make the right decisions, increasing profitability, and optimizing business processes. We have a mix of technical, soft, and analytical skills. We are responsible for solving complicated problems that will profoundly affect the company’s ability to quickly make the right business decisions.  As Business Analyst, you will be in charge of collecting, analyzing, and reporting business-related data in an ongoing effort to increase overall efficiency while considering current economic conditions and operative working resources. The position requires focusing on aligning the technology aspect with business one by providing conclusions based on industry/market knowledge.  Isn't that interesting? We are a team with a vast amount of information that goes through us – so we can make or help make strategic decisions for Infobip.  You Know You Are Doing a Good Job When  Daily traffic, revenue, GP and quality analysis with special focus on top customers (A and B segmentation) and take actions to insure profitability.  Close collaboration with RA regarding all changes in routes, senders, regulations, providing business insights and requirements. Close collaboration with Regional stakeholders in terms of customer strategy. Prepare special analyses for smaller customers and present them to Sales organization. Track the profitability of all deals with customers. Internal (BA) reporting on profitability  side of projects and suggesting next steps to increase it.  Create business insights for customer reports and suggesting new models on how to grow  business.*  Custom pricing analysis and suggested activities for top customers (as well as possible  discounts or other commercial models).*  Help with analysis, price suggestions and future route setup for auctions, tenders of top clients.* Collaborate with other relevant teams in setting and adjusting routes.* Follow, contribute to and internally (BA) report on regional sales strategy execution, both  in general and on a customer level.  Participate in regional pricing strategy by providing analytical inputs to the Regional BALead. Analysis of regional aggregators’ traffic and providing opportunity insights towards Sales. Customer macro analysis not tied to region, including information coming from CI. Active usage of all customer related internal tools (SU, SF, QS...) in order to gather all available information and turn it into insights. Keep the communication with Global Customer Analytic to ensure high level information flow, suggesting operational and business improvements, sharing good practices and use cases from the region within CA. Keep up with updates from the industry, market trends and customer strategies. Have an overview of business and latest industry trends as well as the competition. Achieved high level of autonomy in solving regular CA Associate scope of work. Consult and act to insure maximal profitability of all deals with customers. Regional and management reporting, on global and customer level. Prepare special analyses for high priority customers and present them to Sales  organization.  Proactively contribute to development of new business models for top regional clients. Approve custom pricing analysis and activity suggestions for top customers. Lead and approve special deals/discounts for customers on a regional level. Proactive involvement in specialized project teams – creating insights and suggestions for improvements based on data, analytics and client/market behavior. Travel (within dedicated regions) and participation in top customer meetings. Keep up with updates from the industry, market trends and customer strategies. Have an excellent overview of business and latest industry trends as well as the competition. Engage in mentoring more junior members and participate in onboarding process. Keep the communication with Global CA to ensure high level information flow, suggesting operational and business improvements, sharing good practices and use cases from the  region within CA.  More About You  You have a relevant working experience, preferably in business analytics. You have previous experience in driving business decisions based on data and analysis. You are fluent in English, both spoken and written. You are proficient in MS Office, especially Excel. Besides that, you are familiar with SQL and understand the background rationale of various analytics tools (Experience with QlikSense and/or Tableau is advantageous). You analytically approach problem-solving and you enjoy managing multiple priorities simultaneously. You achieve your best results in a collaborative, fast-paced and dynamic environment. You are a hardworking and persistent person. You are naturally continuously learning and challenging yourself with new technologies.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo El Banco Comercial AV Villas creemos que la educación es el mayor potencial que tiene el país. Es por ello que estamos en la búsqueda de practicante universitario de carreras como Ingeniería financiera, Ingeniería industrial, Ingenieria de Sistemas y/o afines; si tienes el perfil, vives en la ciudad de Bogotá o alrededores y tu practica es obligatoria ¡POSTULATE!  ¿QUÉ TE OFRECEMOS?  Posibilidades reales de continuar después de finalizada la etapa práctica en los mejores bancos del país, en el cual te garantizamos aprendizaje diario. Contrato de aprendizaje Apoyo de sostenimiento de 1SMMLV = $1.000.000 Horario de lunes a viernes de 8am a 5:30pm  En el Banco AV Villas creemos en ti, te esperamos
Descripción (inglés): The Commercial Bank AV Villas believe that education is the greatest potential that the country has. That is why we are looking for university practitioner of careers such as Financial Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Systems Engineering and/or related; if you have the profile, you live in the city of Bogotá or surroundings and your practice is mandatory.POSTULATE! WHAT WE OFFER YOU? Real possibilities to continue after the completion of the practical stage in the best banks of the country, in which we guarantee you daily learning. Learning contract Support of 1SMMLV = $1,000,000 Schedule Monday to Friday from 8am to 5:30pm At the AV Villas Bank we believe in you, we expect you

Descripción: Acerca del empleo There is never a typical day at Accenture, but that’s why we love it here! This is an extraordinary chance to begin a rewarding career at Accenture Operations. Immersed in a digitally-compassionate and innovation-led environment, here is where you can help top clients shift to the New using leading-edge technologies on the most ground-breaking projects imaginable.  Accenture Operations is the place for someone looking for a challenging Projects&Operations career and access to the kind of training, expertise and development tools that only a large company can offer. Our international reach also means you could have the opportunity to be part of a truly global organization of smart, technically-minded people and work with dynamic clients in countries all over the world.  If you are a passionate about Order Management and Order Intake this is your opportunity!  We are looking for a Customer Service Analyst with great knowledge in English to be part of our Accenture Operations team  Key responsibilities:  Perform data entry and research in various systems and tracking tools.  Apply knowledge of processes and related systems to assist in identifying, assessing and resolving issues problems.  Assess and resolve non standard and standard issues or problems.  Seek advice and escalate issues when faced with tasks problems outside the scope of the work.  Customer Care  Product and Distribution Complaints:  Data Capture from Customer/Patient.  Replacement / Credit Eligibility Determination.  In-Policy Returns:  Receive returns transactions.  Review customer returns via 3rd Party EDI transmission and validate reason code and SAP account information to confirm appropriate pricing strategy is applied.  Customer Order Intake and Processing:  Order Intake and Processing.  Order Validation.  Order Errors / Exception Management.  Out of Policy Returns:  Collect returns information and escalate to the Client for review and approval.  What are we looking for:  Experience in Order Management | OM.  Experience in Order to Cash | OTC.  Experience in Disputes | Returns.  SAP knowledge.  Industry Knowledge of Pharma/Life Sciences/CPG.  Above average analytical skills.  Above average supply chain knowledge.  English B2, C1, C2  Excel advanced.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo We are looking for a Logistics Data Analyst to bring technical expertise to ensure the quality and accuracy of the data. Likewise, process, design, and present it to reach meaningful conclusions.  Your main responsibilities will be: Collecting data from various sources. Presents complex data from a variety of sources in order to communicate and reinforce difficult concepts and to communicate large amounts of quantifiable data. Data is presented in a variety of formats such as graphs, maps, charts, illustrations, tables, diagrams, flow charts, plain text and other formats as needed. Perform extensive data validation/quality assurance analysis withing large datasets. Create reports to share findings and recommendations with the internal team. Supporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements.  Skills needed: Advanced Excel skills. • Strong interpersonal and time-management skills. • Strong problem solving, quantitative and analytical abilities. • Planning and organization of work. • Responsibility. • Initiative. • Teamwork.  Systems: Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and Google Analytics. • Proficient in business intelligence tools, software, and dashboards. • Google. • Outlook. • Smartsheet • Box  Non-bilingual profiles will not be taken into account.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo The opportunity  Unity’s Engine Support Team is at the very front line of the company. Our customers are developing a huge range of games and applications in Unity, and they rely on us to keep their projects on track. Our team of highly qualified engineers seek a wide variety of problems that require agile thinking and working skills.  What You’ll Be Doing   During your internship, you will work on a range of projects. You will get the chance to apply the software development knowledge you have acquired during your time at university. In return, you will constantly be learning about the latest features of Unity and help nurture some of the most exciting games in development today. Work with support tickets, learning how Engine Support is done, and developing the skills to become a fully-capable team member Work with customer projects and develop standard methodologies and tools for receiving, manipulating, and navigating exciting customer projects Work with tools for support engineers - and develop process improvements and time-saving tools for use by the team  What We’re Looking For  You are currently studying Computer Science, Game Development or a related subject at University, looking for a placement year You are proficient with at least one programming language You understand “performance” in software development, i.e., speed and memory utilization  You might also have Experience with C++ or C# specifically is an advantage Experience in games or app development with Unity Knowledge relating to graphics programming (e.g., DirectX, OpenGL) Experience in customer service (of any form)  Life at Unity  Unity (NYSE: U) is the world’s leading platform for creating and operating real-time 3D (RT3D) content. Creators, ranging from game developers to artists, architects, automotive designers, filmmakers, and others, use Unity to make their imaginations come to life. Unity is the foundation upon which the world’s most powerful digital content is created. Specifically, Unity’s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices.  In the fourth quarter of 2021, Unity had, on average, 3.9 billion monthly active end users who consumed content created or operated with its solutions. The applications developed by these creators were downloaded, on average, five billion times per month in 2021. For more information, please visit www.unity.com.  Unity is a proud equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment and celebrate our employees across age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. Our differences are strengths that enable us to support the growing and evolving needs of our customers, partners, and collaborators. If there are preparations or accommodations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.  Headhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this website or directly to managers. Unity does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Unity will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Unity.  #INT

Descripción: Acerca del empleo About the role  If you want to start building your career working for a company ranked among the 100 best startups in Colombia, Simetrik SAS is the perfect place. Come and join us to build our rocket as you enhance and improve your skills in the integrations field. As an integration intern, you will be working directly with a Brazilian client and monitoring its relationship with third parties, the integration transactions, and solving any issues that could come up. Furthermore, you will support the team by documenting integration processes and developments that have already been done.  Minimum Qualifications  Software development knowledge A strong mix of quantitative and qualitative skills The ability to forge strong relationships with clients and team members. Collaborative approach and constructive mindset Proven ability to deliver end-to-end solutions Communication skills Ability to pay accurate and precise attention to detail Comfortable working with multiple remote teams Fluency in written and spoken Portuguese (and Spanish)   Responsibilities Delivering support to any request by the client Documenting integration processes and developments that have already been done. Solving any issues that could arise with the client´s third party  Preferred Qualifications  Fluency in written and spoken English  Benefits  Well-funded and proven startup with large ambitions and competitive salaries. An entrepreneurial culture where pushing limits, creating, and collaborating is everyday business. Open communication with management and company leadership Small, dynamic teams = massive impact 100% Remote Work (You choose where to work from) 500USD a year for you to invest in learning. 2 Family days 5 fully covered sick leave days to rest and recover without impacting your income. 1 full day to celebrate your birthday 60% discount on Colsanitas Pre-Paid Medicine for you and everyone around you (Colombia Only).  Simetrik considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, gender, age, color, religion, national origin, marital status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, protected military/veteran status, or any other legally protected factor.  Join a team of incredibly talented people that build things, are free to create and love collaborating!

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Location: Remote WFH All Latin American Candidates welcome to apply  Overview of the Role:  We are looking for a skilled Senior Golang Developer capable of delivering high standards of technical quality and innovation, always striving for continuous improvement, and looking to help all different types of clients around the world.  To ensure success, you must have detailed knowledge of development techniques, excellent communication, and organizational skills.  As part of the team, you will:  Scope and design app Work with business team to get their requirements Build-in Golang Build custom API Develop the front end (language TBD and can influence) Work with the Infrastructure team to set up in Coinbase environments (AWS, EC2, Docker) Circle CI testing  Key qualifications and skills to succeed in this role:  Advanced English (spoken and written) Experience with SQL and NoSQL Databases Experience with Microservices and the Cloud Advanced algorithm knowledge IT infrastructure knowledge Intermediate agile methodologies management Strong understanding of best practices, SOLID principles, CLEAN Code, and scalable solutions Design Patterns knowledge Experience developing entire applications from scratch Experience in automated tests, CI/CD pipelines Strong experience with Version control Strong experience with Unit testing, integration testing, and code coverage  In return, we offer:  Competitive compensation package 100% remote Work from Home International company with diversity and multicultural inclusion The ability to work with leading startups and fast-growing companies in the USA  Company Overview  Workling is a talent acquisition marketplace whose mission is to unlock the professional potential of smart people everywhere. Workling helps companies move faster to hire remote, top-tier talent from anywhere in the world.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Falabella Financiero está buscando Talento: Data Analyst para unirse al equipo.  💥¿Cuál será tu principal misión?💥  Levantamiento de data para maximizar el valor generado en el negocio a partir del uso de big data en la toma decisiones.  🔎¿Qué tendrás que realizar? ✍️  Gestionar y coordinar con otros equipos para conseguir data necesaria. Trabajar de manera ágil en conjunto al negocio para identificar oportunidades de mejora con Big Data. Estructurar problemáticas de negocio: descomponer el problema, identificar y proponer análisis para abordar su solución y los datos y recursos requeridos. Diseñar y desarrollar dashboards y/o presentaciones que permitan comunicar de manera efectiva los hallazgos de los análisis. Traducir requerimientos y necesidades del negocio hacia el backlog de los productos de datos (características, visión, historias de usuario, etc.).   ¿Con qué necesitas contar? 👍  Desde 2 años de experiencia en cargo similar como data analyst/ business analyst/ BI analyst o similar. Manejo y experiencia en SQL (avanzado). Conocimiento en herramientas de visualización (Tableau, Looker, Data Studio). Deseable conocimiento en herramientas de gestión de proyectos ágiles (JIRA, Asana o similar) y conocimientos de SCRUM. Deseable conocimiento de soluciones cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure).  ¡Ven a vivir una gran experiencia junto a nosotros/as!  Somos una empresa que apoya la Ley 21015, apoyamos la diversidad y la inclusión en todas sus formas, sin importar religión, raza, género, situación de discapacidad, nacionalidad.
Descripción (inglés): Falabella Financiero is looking for Talent: Data Analyst to join the team. What will be your main mission? Data raising to maximize the value generated in the business from the use of big data in decision making. What will you have to do?  Manage and coordinate with other teams to get necessary data. Work agilely together to the business to identify opportunities for improvement with Big Data. Structure business issues: break down the problem, identify and propose analysis to address your solution and the required data and resources. Design and develop dashboards and/or presentations that allow to communicate effectively the findings of the analyses. Translate business requirements and needs to the backlog of the data products (feature, vision, user stories, etc.). What do you need to count?  From 2 years of experience in charge similar as data analyzest/business analyzers/BI analyzerst/BI analyzerst or similar knowledge. Management and experience in SQL (advanced). Knowledge in visualization tools (Tableau, Looker, Data Studio). Deserable knowledge in tools of Analys like as data as data management tools, Analys us.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  We're looking to hire several mid-level and senior Data Engineers to join our team. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For:  As a Data Engineer, you'll be working in a team responsible for Reports and Analytics for the highly loaded system and helping the team to achieve extraordinary results to impact the product and deliver the best solution to the market. 3 years of experience in databases in SQL Server or Oracle and ETL development. 3 years of experience in OOP and/or Functional Programming fundamentals, Design principles; Track record of anticipating technical problems that will fall out of major projects and designing solutions to overcome those problems; Experience in working with RESTful APIs; Experience in production support and troubleshooting. Self-organized and responsible person with experience in a distributed team; Good level of speaking and written English;  Nice to have: Experience in Ruby. Experience in AWS/Azure; Experience with Azure Logic Apps, SQL Server, ETL ; JavaScript experience (React is preferred); Experience with web tooling (Webpack, Jest, NPM, Babel, etc); Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, a related field, or comparable work experience;  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .
