Descripción: Acerca del empleo Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?  Are you looking for an entry-level role in the software industry that will give you the skills and exposure to move into any speciality later? We’re looking for curious individuals who love searching for meaningful answers.  In this role, you’ll be given a business problem and will scour the internet for possible solutions. The problems will come from every area of our business: operations, finance, hiring, engineering, and more - giving you broad exposure.  Not only will you gain knowledge, you’ll receive regular coaching and training from a team of global tech experts and operations professionals.  Jumpstart your career with us today!  What You Will Be Doing  Research a variety of high-priority topics that are critical to the business Evaluate results against provided evaluation criteria  What You Won’t Be Doing  Researching the same topics repeatedly Working on loosely-scoped research with desired outputs not clearly defined Getting lost chasing tangentially-related solutions; our systems and processes will help you focus your research and optimize your time  Research Analyst Key Responsibilities  Provide high-quality research data to support company-wide business decisions  Basic Requirements  Excellent written and verbal communication skills Basic financial analysis skills Ability to work in the US timezone  About Trilogy  Hundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.  There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!  Working with Crossover  This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $30 USD/hour, which equates to $60,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.  What to expect next:  You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application. Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.  Important! If you do not receive an email from us:  First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again. Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well. Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked. If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/reset-password if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply. Crossover Job Code: LJ-4718-CO-Antioqui-ResearchAnalys.003

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Una empresa de rápido crecimiento, que se dedica a transformar el sector automotriz con sus tecnologías de ecosistemas de automóviles vinculados, está buscando ingenieros DevSecOps. Los candidatos seleccionados serán responsables de incorporar parámetros para la evaluación de SAST, DAST y librerías de terceros en los procesos de CI/CD. La compañía está creando productos líderes en el mercado y soluciones de software, datos y diagnósticos de automóviles e IoT a gran escala. Ha logrado recaudar de forma segura más de 85 millones de dólares durante su ronda de financiación de la Serie B.  Responsabilidades:  Ayudar a crear una hoja de ruta de seguridad para todos los productos Crear equipos de integración y entregar especificaciones de productos de seguridad que contengan las necesidades del software, las especificaciones de diseño y los planes de prueba Dar soporte el análisis de amenazas y la evaluación de riesgos (TARA) del equipo de software/nube Implementar controles para SAST, DAST y análisis de librerías de terceros en flujos de trabajo de CI/CD Otros controles de integridad de seguridad en la nube y garantía de imagen Realizar evaluaciones de vulnerabilidades en el entorno de la nube, incluidas las de la infraestructura y las librerías de terceros, y establecer prioridades para resolverlas Trabajar con el equipo de software para implementar los requisitos de ciberseguridad y evaluar los informes de prueba y análisis de software después de analizar los puntos de entrada de los ataques de ciberseguridad y sopesar el riesgo frente al impacto Analizar la competencia del mercado y mantenerse actualizado sobre la nueva tecnología de seguridad en las industrias automotriz y la electrónica de consumo  Requerimientos:  Licenciatura o Maestría en Ingeniería, Informática (o experiencia equivalente) Al menos 5 años o más de experiencia relevante como ingeniero de software Experiencia en el diseño de arranque seguro, firmas de firmware y validación Experiencia en la planificación y el desarrollo de políticas, procedimientos y estándares de seguridad dentro de un entorno de IoT con recursos limitados Comprensión de sistemas operativos, tecnologías de red e implementaciones específicas Conocimiento de sistemas integrados y lenguajes asociados y frameworks de construcción asociados, incluyendo POSIX Firma y validación de firmware, métodos de firma y autenticación digital y no repudio Arranque seguro en un entorno de firmware, integración con TPM y seguridad de hardware Conocimiento del manejo de credenciales en memoria y de los sistemas de archivos y firmware cifrados Es deseable tener familiaridad con estándares como ISO 27001, SSAE 16/18 SOC 2, ISO 21434 y el framework Uptane Se valorará la comprensión de los puntos de referencia de CIS para los proveedores de la nube, las tecnologías de contenedores y los servicios clave Experiencia con informática y seguridad integrada, incluido el framework Uptane o similar Es deseable tener familiaridad con las prácticas, procesos y métodos de codificación segura Tener experiencia con pruebas de penetración de hardware y herramientas de penetración es una ventaja Fuerte orientación al cliente y obsesión por la calidad Capacidad para trabajar en un entorno de desarrollo rápido y ágil Fuertes habilidades de comunicación y análisis Conocimiento de IoT Dominio de Inglés

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Sabías que en DIRECTV /SKY  “Creemos que la diversidad de personas, experiencias y opiniones nos convierte en un equipo ganador y en un excelente lugar para trabajar, por eso trabajamos intencionalmente a través de nuestros procesos selectivos para promover la equidad y un espacio plural con respecto a raza, religión, identidad de género, orientación sexual, nacionalidad, discapacidad, ascendencia, generaciones, etc. Valoramos y respetamos a cada persona en su individualidad, para que todos formen parte de un entorno seguro e inclusivo, y así entreguen lo mejor de sí"  ¡La diversidad suma! !Súmate a la diversidad!  Te proponemos el siguiente desafío:  Es el responsable de incentivar la investigación y la innovación en las nuevas metodologías aplicadas (Classic Analytics - Advanced Analytics), así como velar por la oportunidad y calidad en los entregables, mediante comunicación efectiva a las diferentes áreas. Debe proponer soluciones técnicas robustas que agreguen valor, mediante el entendimiento de las necesidades de negocio apoyándose en el manejo de software estadístico y bases de datos como SAS, SQL, R y Python.  Principales responsabilidades:  Gestionar solicitudes de la jefatura y clientes internos, planear su ejecución y hacer seguimiento para garantizar su correcta y oportuna ejecución. Garantizar equilibrio entre aplicación de negocio y profundidad analítica. Definir la técnica de ejecución de las solicitudes, a través del análisis de metodologías, recursos y tiempos para producir consultorías efectivas. Coordinar y participar de forma activa en los espacios para la búsqueda, socialización, presentación y discusión de nuevas metodologías de minería de datos del área; donde se expondrán artículos y trabajos que estén en la frontera del conocimiento del área. Mantenimiento, mejora y creación de los algoritmos que impactan en los principales pilares del negocio, Pospago, OTT, Nuevos productos, Prepago y subcategorías como (Involuntario, Voluntario, Sistemas de recomendación, Migraciones, mapas etc…).  Formación Académica:  Profesional en ingeniería, estadística, matemática o afines. Deseable especialización en inteligencia de mercados, econometría, riesgo, investigación de operaciones, estadística, Ingeniería de información.  Experiencia:  3 años o más de experiencia, en áreas de Analytics, o consultoría con énfasis analítico, Estadística y/o Programación. Alto conocimiento en software de análisis estadístico, Python o R, deseable conocimiento en programación a través de SQL o SAS, experiencia en instrumentos de evaluación en áreas de negocio.  Conocimientos específicos:  Ingles Intermedio BI, BII Programación en SQL o SAS, Python o R, Alto Conocimiento en técnicas clásicas de minería de datos, además de habilidades en machine learning y Deep learning con experiencia en algoritmos y codificación.  CONOCIMIENTOS DE NEGOCIO Interpretar correctamente las cifras en función del negocio y la generación de valor a manera de consultor. Critico ante las cifras y funcionamiento del negocio con enfoque a resultados.   Te ofrecemos: Experiencias y aprendizajes para potenciar tu desarrollo profesional y personal. Una modalidad de trabajo flexible para contribuir a tu calidad de vida. Una cultura de trabajo orientada a la innovación y trabajo en equipo. Objetivos que desafían tus límites
Descripción (inglés): Sabías que en DIRECTV /SKY  “Creemos que la diversidad de personas, experiencias y opiniones nos convierte en un equipo ganador y en un excelente lugar para trabajar, por eso trabajamos intencionalmente a través de nuestros procesos selectivos para promover la equidad y un espacio plural con respecto a raza, religión, identidad de género, orientación sexual, nacionalidad, discapacidad, ascendencia, generaciones, etc. Valoramos y respetamos a cada persona en su individualidad, para que todos formen parte de un entorno seguro e inclusivo, y así entreguen lo mejor de sí"  ¡La diversidad suma! !Súmate a la diversidad!  Te proponemos el siguiente desafío:  Es el responsable de incentivar la investigación y la innovación en las nuevas metodologías aplicadas (Classic Analytics - Advanced Analytics), así como velar por la oportunidad y calidad en los entregables, mediante comunicación efectiva a las diferentes áreas. Debe proponer soluciones técnicas robustas que agreguen valor, mediante el entendimiento de las necesidades de negocio apoyándose en el manejo de software estadístico y bases de datos como SAS, SQL, R y Python.  Principales responsabilidades:  Gestionar solicitudes de la jefatura y clientes internos, planear su ejecución y hacer seguimiento para garantizar su correcta y oportuna ejecución. Garantizar equilibrio entre aplicación de negocio y profundidad analítica. Definir la técnica de ejecución de las solicitudes, a través del análisis de metodologías, recursos y tiempos para producir consultorías efectivas. Coordinar y participar de forma activa en los espacios para la búsqueda, socialización, presentación y discusión de nuevas metodologías de minería de datos del área; donde se expondrán artículos y trabajos que estén en la frontera del conocimiento del área. Mantenimiento, mejora y creación de los algoritmos que impactan en los principales pilares del negocio, Pospago, OTT, Nuevos productos, Prepago y subcategorías como (Involuntario, Voluntario, Sistemas de recomendación, Migraciones, mapas etc…).  Formación Académica:  Profesional en ingeniería, estadística, matemática o afines. Deseable especialización en inteligencia de mercados, econometría, riesgo, investigación de operaciones, estadística, Ingeniería de información.  Experiencia:  3 años o más de experiencia, en áreas de Analytics, o consultoría con énfasis analítico, Estadística y/o Programación. Alto conocimiento en software de análisis estadístico, Python o R, deseable conocimiento en programación a través de SQL o SAS, experiencia en instrumentos de evaluación en áreas de negocio.  Conocimientos específicos:  Ingles Intermedio BI, BII Programación en SQL o SAS, Python o R, Alto Conocimiento en técnicas clásicas de minería de datos, además de habilidades en machine learning y Deep learning con experiencia en algoritmos y codificación.  CONOCIMIENTOS DE NEGOCIO Interpretar correctamente las cifras en función del negocio y la generación de valor a manera de consultor. Critico ante las cifras y funcionamiento del negocio con enfoque a resultados.   Te ofrecemos: Experiencias y aprendizajes para potenciar tu desarrollo profesional y personal. Una modalidad de trabajo flexible para contribuir a tu calidad de vida. Una cultura de trabajo orientada a la innovación y trabajo en equipo. Objetivos que desafían tus límites

Título: INGLÉS Y FRANCÉS - SERVICIO AL CLIENTE - REMOTO
Descripción: Acerca del empleo ASESOR DE SERVICIO AL CLIENTE - INGLÉS Y FRANCÉS - INTERACTIONS ¿Eres un solucionador de problemas, experto en tecnología, que te llama la atención el servicio al cliente sin contacto directo con el usuario final? ¿Te gusta trabajar desde tu casa? Estamos contratando Asesores de Servicio al Cliente con Inglés y Francés B2 o superior, que se encargarán de las llamadas de servicio entrantes de los consumidores finales que necesitan ayuda. Se trabaja con tecnología digital. No se tiene contacto directo con el cliente. Esta posición es 100% de tiempo completo, remota, ofrece capacitación remunerada desde el primer día y oportunidades de crecimiento profesional. Buscamos candidatos con una personalidad positiva con el deseo de comprender las preocupaciones e inquietudes y presentar las soluciones a cada usuario. ¿Estás Interesado? ¡APLICA HOY MISMO! Correo electrónico: hojadevida@continuumgbl.com  ¿QUÉ REQUERIMOS DE TU TALENTO? · Actitud autodidacta, independiente y autocontrolada para trabajar desde la casa (en la modalidad de Work@Home). · Mayor de 18 años y Diploma de Bachiller. · Disponibilidad de cinco días a la semana con turnos rotativos 24x7, con dos días de descanso a la semana. Los turnos cambian una vez al mes. · No se necesita experiencia previa en contact center, pero sí es recomendable. · Debe vivir en Colombia. · Dominio de idiomas inglés y francés (mínimo un B2 o superior, en listening). Excelentes habilidades de escucha. · Internet de alta velocidad con un mínimo de 15 Mbps de velocidad de descarga con conexión de cable (no wifi). · Manejar herramientas informáticas con velocidad y precisión. · Tener buena ortografía y puntuación, tanto en el idioma inglés como en francés. · Debe contar con un espacio de trabajo tranquilo y seguro.  RESPONSABILIDADES: · Prestar el servicio de atención a los consumidores finales, en forma oportuna y efectiva, a través de los medios de comunicación suministrados, entre los que se encuentra la telefonía. · Prestar el servicio de atención a los usuarios, entregando información y/o soluciones, así como registrar la información de los servicios prestados, de acuerdo con los lineamientos y protocolos explicados. · Cumplir con los requerimientos y resultados mínimos exigidos en cada uno de los procesos de entrenamiento realizados. · Cumplir con los estándares y métricas de servicio establecidas para cada uno de los clientes y para cada una de las correspondientes líneas de negocio. BENEFICIOS Y VENTAJAS: · Salario total de hasta $3,063,000, entre el que se incluye salario básico y un salario variable de hasta el 25% según cumplimiento de indicadores. El salario fijo mensual es de $2,450,000. · Bono de permanencia de $500,000 a los tres (3) meses de antigüedad. · Bono de permanencia de $1,000,000 a los seis (6) meses de antigüedad. · Capacitación virtual remunerada desde el primer día. El resto del tiempo será trabajo virtual desde casa. · No se tiene contacto directo con el usuario final. · Entorno de trabajo amable. · Oportunidad de desarrollo profesional. · Elementos de oficina entregados por la empresa (computador y audífonos). ¡TE INVITAMOS A CRECER PROFESIONALMENTE CON NOSOTROS EN UN AMBIENTE AMABLE Y DE TRABAJO EN EQUIPO!

Rotary schedule from Monday to Friday 8:00-12:00 /1:00- 5:00 pm and Saturdays from 8:00-12:00pm. In-person. Salary $1.700.000.'}]

Codificación puntos nuevos, Censo, Auditoria  HORARIO: Lunes a viernes de 8:00am a 5:00pm y Sábados de 8:00am a 12:00M  SALARIO: $1.600.000 + Prestaciones de ley

Coding New Points, Census, HORARY Auditory: Monday to Friday from 8:00am to 5:00pm and Saturdays from 8:00am to 12:00M SALARY: $1,600.000 + Law Benefits'}]

Título: QA (Quality Assurance) Automation Engineer with Cypress - Remote - Colombia
Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  As a QA Automation Engineer at FullStack Labs, your primary responsibilities will be to design automated tests to validate the applications we build for clients. Each day at FSL, you will be collaborating with other members of the engineering team to solve problems with the application. You will develop automated tests and configure testing automation environments. You will ensure proper test coverage and will test features to ensure they are properly built, function as they are designed to function, and correctly solve clients' problems. To do this you will gain a deep understanding of our client's business and the problems that the software is designed to solve. The automated test coverage that you will create will ensure that the products we create maintain their level of excellence and do not regress. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For: 3+ years of Quality Assurance experience. Advanced English is required. A thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle. Well-versed with STLC and defect life cycle. Ability to work well with team members within an agile development team. Identifies defects and creates informative bug reports and effectively follows up on bug closure. Advises the team on major issues to product quality. Deep understanding of testing philosophies like TDD, BDD, etc. Knowledge of how to create and execute test plans Experience working on more than one time-sensitive project at a time. Proactively tests, provides test coverage, and resolves issues. Works closely with team members to emphasize quality throughout the entire SDLC. You must have an extremely high, forensic attention to detail. A natural orientation to detail is the most important skill set for this position. You naturally notice small imperfections in seemingly high-quality work. You care deeply about building flawless user experiences and have a visceral reaction to low-quality work. You DO sweat the small stuff. You must have strong computer / technical skills...using technology comes naturally to you. Strong work ethic and the ability to focus on multi-task throughout the day. A positive, optimistic, can-do attitude. Excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent customer service skills, placing customer outcomes as a focal point for all actions and decisions.  Technologies: Experience with some (not all) of these technologies is required: SauceLabs / BrowserStack / Kobiton. Postman. Jira. Slack. GitHub. Toggl. Mac OS. Terminal. XCode/Android Studio. Figma/Invision.  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  Duties and Responsibilities: Interpreting client specifications and identifying website user requirements. Creating timeframes and work schedules to meet deadlines. Understanding and executing on new website builds from concept to launch. Communicating effectively with clients and teams. Updating records and running reports. Debugging websites and ensuring software and plugins are updated. Liaising with designers and editors. Establishing strong professional relationships with clients and other professionals.  Ready to apply? First check if you have: 5+ years developing PHP/MySQL/Javascript-based websites 5+ years developing large WordPress websites Expert-level knowledge debugging web pages using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP Expert-level knowledge of Bootstrap 4, WordPress theme development, and plugin architecture/building Strong knowledge of implementation of Advanced Custom Fields, specifically with Flexible content Experience with other PHP and MySQL-based platforms is a plus Developing build pipelines for modern websites using tools like Grunt/Gulp, Continuous Integration, and Github Experience working with debugging tools such as Chrome Inspector and Firebug Experience with CSS preprocessors like SASS and LESS Deep understanding of best practices and utilization of REST APIs Familiarity with building Marketo and Hubspot landing pages in both WordPress and the Marketo and Hubspot CMS a plus Familiarity with managed hosting platforms like WP Engine and Pantheon, and self-managed hosting options like AWS and Google Cloud Ability to work in a flexible, dynamic, and fast-paced environment Ability to work independently and possess creative problem-solving skills  Why working at Cafeto: We value diversity, respect for the individual and integrity Everyone's empowered to work autonomously You will have a direction, an individual career path for you More than work, we are passionate about growing. More than colleagues, we are friends  We have some great Perks & Benefits for you! Flexible work hours—structure your work schedule, so it works for you, keeping your team and partner needs in mind. Health insurance. Your mental health is essential to us. You will have access to personalized therapy and counseling for your emotional well-being. Semi-personalized English classes, according to your level. Days off on your birthday and in case of moving. Great salary and paid vacations.  Interested?  We'd love to hear from you — apply below!

Título: Staff de control y riesgos de TI
Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¡Proyecta tu futuro con EY!  La oportunidad  El equipo ayuda a las juntas directivas y a los CxO a crear organizaciones ágiles y conscientes de los riesgos que toman mejores decisiones para lograr sus objetivos estratégicos. Lo ayudamos a definir su universo en función de objetivos estratégicos, financieros y operativos y categorizar los riesgos que debe asumir, evitar o mitigar. Todo esto ayuda a alinear sus riesgos con su propósito y estrategia comercial.  Para calificar para este puesto, deberás contar con lo siguiente: Profesional de ingeniería de sistemas, Ingeniería electrónica, ingeniería de software o afines Conocimiento en auditoria de control o riesgos de TI en el sector financiero o manufactura. Con conocimientos en evaluación de controles generales, bases de datos, sistemas operativos, redes, controles de aplicación y ciberseguridad. Deseable algunas de estas certificaciones: COBIT, ITIL, ISO 27001, SCRUM o equivalentes. Habilidades blandas como: comunicación efectiva, orientación al cumplimiento de objetivos, trabajo en equipo, administración del tiempo, escritura y redacción de informes.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Project your future with EY! Opportunity The team helps boards and CxOs to create agile and risk-conscious organizations that make better decisions to achieve their strategic goals. We help you define your universe according to strategic, financial and operational objectives and categorize the risks you should take on, avoid or mitigate. All of this helps align your risks with your business purpose and strategy. To qualify for this position, you will need to have the following: System Engineering Professional, Electronic Engineering, Software Engineering or Related Knowledge in IT Control Audit or Risks in the financial or manufacturing sector. With expertise in evaluating general controls, databases, operating systems, networks, application controls and cybersecurity. Deserable are some of these certifications: COBIT, ITIL, ISO 27001, SCRUM or equivalent. Soft skills such as: effective communication, targeting orientation, teamwork, time management, writing and reporting.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Reconocida entidad tecnológica, requiere para su equipo de trabajo ANALISTA DE DATOS, con experiencia mínima de 1 año como analista de datos, realizando recopilación, limpieza, carga y análisis de la base de datos maestra de los importadores, seguimiento del inventario de los importadores, reporte semanal de los shopcenter y calles comerciales del canal, entre otras, para desempeñar funciones similares, nivel educativo Profesional en economía o ingeniería  Importante Excel Avanzado: Formulas, Tablas dinámicas, Power Pivor Conocimiento en choques en la economía por cambios en la tasa de cambio Ingles nivel B2 Horario: Lunes a Viernes  Jornada: 08:30am a 05:30am  Salario: $ 2.000.0000 + Prestaciones de ley  Contrato: obra o Labor  Si estas interesado y cumples con los requisitos postúlate!!!
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': "Recognized technological entity, it requires for its work team DATA ANALYST, with at least 1 year experience as data analyst, performing collection, cleaning, loading and analysis of the importers' master database, monitoring of the importers' inventory, weekly report of the shopcenter and commercial streets of the channel, among others, to perform similar functions, educational level Professional in economics or engineering Important Advanced Excel: Formulas, Dynamic Tables, Power Pivor Knowledge in economic shocks due to changes in the exchange rate English level B2 Time: Monday to Friday Day: 08:30am to 05:30am Salary: $2,000.0000 + Benefits of law Contract: work or Labor If you are interested and meet the requirements postulate!!!"}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Importante companía del sector de las telecomunicaciones requiere para su equipo de trabajo un Analista de Datos: Funciones:  Ejecutar informes de la gestión de las campanas basado en BUSSINES INTELLIGENT Y ANÁLISIS DE RESULTADOS. Exportar las sábanas de gestión de las diferentes campanas Efectuar informes de rentabilidad, contactabilidad, efectividad, por agente y por equipos Efectuar informes de rentabilidad, contactabilidad, efectividad, por base de datos Efectuar los demás informes que sean solicitados y prescindibles Ejecutar los reportes y análisis correspondientes al personal de la companía que se requieran desde Recursos Humanos (ausentismo, novedades de nómina, bonificaciones, entre otras) Perfil: Tecnico o tecnólogo en carreras administrativas o sistemas. To export the management sheets of the different bells To carry out reports of profitability, contactability, effectiveness, by agent and by teams To carry out reports of profitability, contactability, effectiveness, by database To carry out the other reports that are requested and expendable To execute the reports and analyses corresponding to the personnel of the company that are required from Human Resources (absentism, new payroll, bonuses, among others) Profile: Technical or technologist in administrative careers or systems. Academic training may be approved by experience in related positions. Management of tools ofimatics.Manage of medium office tools. Advanced management in Excel Minimum 1 years occupying positions Data Marshal, Data Analyst, Report Specialist, and other related positions'}]

Título: Spanish speaking AI Community Surfer (formerly known as Search Engine Evaluator)
Descripción: Acerca del empleo The Role - Search Engine Evaluator Do you spend a lot of time on the internet and would like to get paid for helping improve the experience? Do you want a flexible work from home role that allows you to choose your own hours? Would you like to work in a job that gives you the opportunity to have fun working on a variety of different task types?  If you answered yes to any of the above, this job is for you! Join our AI Community where you can earn a fixed amount for each quality task completed.  In this role, you will be evaluating different task types to research which is better or analyzing a query and selecting the most relevant response to the query.  The Requirements Fluency in English & Spanish is essential. A keen interest in the internet is a must. Good attention to detail as all tasks will contain guidelines to follow. Ability to work on your own initiative and work independently is essential. The hours are flexible, you choose your own schedule. You have the opportunity to qualify on multiple task types to maximize your income. You can earn additional income working from the comfort of your own home. All guidelines and practice tasks will be in English. Access to a high speed internet connection and your own laptop / desktop with the latest version of Windows, all provided at your own expense. Working on other OS or mobile devices is not supported currently. A Windows Live ID is essential.  This is a freelance, independent contractor position.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ABOUT US:  Braintrust is the only network that gives in-demand talent all the freedom of freelance with all the benefits, community and stability of a full-time role. As the first decentralized talent network, our revolutionary Web3 model ensures the community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it through the blockchain token, BTRST. So unlike other marketplaces that take 20% to 50% of talent earnings, Braintrust allows talent to keep 100% of earnings and to vote on key changes to improve the network. Braintrust is working to change the way freelance works – for good. JOB TYPE: Freelance, Contract Position (no agencies/C2C - see notes below) LOCATION: Remote - United States and Canada only (TimeZone:EST | Partial overlap) HOURLY RANGE: Our client is looking to pay $80 – $105/hr ESTIMATED DURATION: 40h/week - Long-term  THE OPPORTUNITY  Our client has a SaaS FinTech product ready and running. Looking to strengthen CI/CD and DevOps to enterprise-grade. Great opportunity to make a significant impact at an early stage.  What you’ll be working on  Our client is looking for a DevOps Engineer to join their growing team. In this role, you will work with the development and engineering teams to understand the products and platform technical design and implement the infrastructure to enable software development & quality for the embedded software, platform software, and portals.  Their agile methodologies will influence their DevOps practices and automation and will require you to continuously review and refine (if required) the operational workflow and tooling to ensure desired alignment and outcome.  As a DevOps engineer, you will also be required to configure the CI/CD pipeline to automatically generate metrics for development experience and delivery that can help the team continuously learn and improve. The ideal candidate will be a self-motivated, hands-on, dynamic and detail oriented individual with a strong technical background and can drive effective product deployments, environment monitoring, automation, build & release engineering.  Requirements 3+ years of continuous experience of building DevOps with Google Cloud Platform (e.g., Compute Engine, BigQuery, PubSub). Proven track record of Large scale CI/CD in production environment Extensive use of Terraform Docker swarm and Kubernetes Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Expert experience with source control tools (e.g., GitHub) across environments. Strong understanding of microservice architectures, principles and patterns. Strong in analytical problem solving and looking beyond what’s obvious. Worked in a fast paced environment, deal with ambiguity.  Apply Now!  ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:  Qualified candidates will be invited to do a screening interview with the Braintrust staff. We will answer your questions about the project, and our platform. If we determine it is the right fit for both parties, we'll invite you to join the platform and create a profile to apply directly for this project.  C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.  Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo En Masiv sabemos que nuestros colaboradores son la clave del éxito, y que su compromiso y amor por la labor es fundamental para alcanzar nuestras metas y retos corporativos en esta oportunidad buscamos un Analista de facturación Estamos en búsqueda de un Técnico, Tecnólogo o estudiantes de carreras administrativas, Como Analista e facturación nos ayudaras a la elaboración de facturas de acuerdo con parámetros establecidos por los clientes y acuerdos(contratos) comerciales, con el fin, de garantizar documentos acorde a lo exigido y/o solicitad. ¿Cuáles serán tus funciones? 💻🙌🏻 Asegurar que el reporte de tráfico, priorización y tarifas sea recibido en los tiempos establecidos Envío de facturas (FE), a través de correo electrónico y/o cargue de portales. Apoyar en la elaboración y/o actualizaciones de información para la creación de clientes. ¿Qué debes saber?🤓🧠 Procesos de facturación y manejo de altos niveles de la misma. Manejo de herramientas como SIGO, SAP u ORACLE Conocimiento de impuestos y como aplicarlos manualmente. Manejo de Excel intermedio Buscamos una persona 😎✌🏻 Atención al detalle Trabajo en equipo. Manejo de frustración Orientación a cumplimiento de objetivos y/o logros  Condiciones Contractuales:  Contrato a término indefinido. Salario 1´500.000  Si es tu perfil envíanos tu hv a lorena.martinez@masiv.com.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'In Masiv we know that our collaborators are the key to success, and that their commitment and love for work is fundamental to achieving our corporate goals and challenges in this opportunity we are looking for a Billing Analyst We are looking for a Technician, Technologist or students of administrative careers, As Analyst and billing you will help us in the elaboration of invoices according to parameters established by clients and commercial agreements(contracts), in order to guarantee documents according to the required and/or request. What will be your functions?  Ensure that traffic reporting, prioritization and rates are received at the established times Sending invoices (FE), via email and/or charging portals. Support in the elaboration and/or updating of information for the creation of customers. What should you know? Invoicing processes and handling of high levels of the same. Handling of tools such as SIGO, SAP or ORACLE Tax knowledge and how to apply them manually. Management of Intermediate Excel We seek a person  Attention to detail Working in a team. Management of frustration Orientation to compliance with objectives and/or achievements Conditions Contract is your contract.'}]

Título: Analista de datos Excel Avanzado - Bilingüe
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Empresa de servicios tecnológicos y outsourcing requiere profesional en Ingeniería Industrial, Administración de Empresas, Contaduría, Finanzas o carreras afines, técnicos o tecnólogos con excelente dominio de Excel y manejo de inglés para desempenar el cargo de Analista de datos. Persona con capacidad analítica, propositiva, con fluidez verbal, empoderada, dinámica sin temor a expresarse en público, con capacidad de liderazgo, trabajo en equipo. agilidad, recursividad, adaptación a los cambios mientras trabaja bajo presión con plazos ajustados, fuertes habilidades de comunicación y presentación. Debe tener conocimientos específicos en:  Excel Avanzado (Tablas dinámicas, gráficas, formatos condicionales, fórmulas avanzadas, filtros, archivos extensos de Excel, segmentación de datos, Dashboard, etc), VBA. Excel (se hará prueba técnica)  Manejo de Inglés avanzado (Escrito y oral).  Paquete Office.  Alta Capacidad de análisis, desde la recopilación de datos hasta la identificación de indicadores clave (KPI) de rendimiento y la visualización de datos. Deseable tener conocimientos en:  Minería de datos  Power BI.  Power Apps  Power Query Manejo de Inglés avanzado (Escrito y oral). Deseable experiencia en cargos similares. Necesaria disponibilidad de contratación inmediata. Necesario contar con habilidades de gestión y organización de planes de trabajo y seguimiento de proyectos. Salario de acuerdo al perfil, entre $ 2.500.000 a $ 4.000.000 de nómina.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Company of technological services and outsourcing requires professional in Industrial Engineering, Business Administration, Accounts, Finance or related careers, technicians or technologists with excellent mastery of Excel and English management to carry out the position of Data Analyst. Person with analytical capacity, proactive, fluent verbal, empowered, dynamic without fear of expressing himself in public, with leadership capacity, team work. agility, recursivity, adaptation to changes while working under pressure with tight deadlines, strong communication and presentation skills. You must have specific knowledge in:  Advanced Excel (dynamic tables, graphics, conditional formats, advanced formulas, filters, extensive Excel files, data segmentation, Dashboard, etc.), VBA. Excel (to be done technical testing)  Advanced English Management (written and oral).  Office Package.  High ability to analyze, from data collection to identification of key indicators (KPI) of performance and data visualization. Deserable to have knowledge in: availability  Data mining  Power BI.  PowerEscriteria de instructación y desarrollo.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Nos soñamos un Analista de datos :  -Para conectarse con nuestro propósito y pertenecer a un grupo mundialmente reconocido. -Que tenga habilidades en minería, estructuración y limpieza de datos, mantenimiento y administración de la Data. -Científico de datos con la capacidad de proveer información estadística a las diferentes gerencias, análisis BI, generación de propuestas de desarrollo en conjunto con las demás áreas de la compañía. -Conocimientos avanzados/experiencia en lenguajes de programación y herramientas de BI. -Conocimiento/experiencia en consultas a bases de datos y análisis de KPI y métricas -Apasionado por disminuir tiempos en los procesos automatizándolos y mejorándolos.  Estudios •Profesional en estadística, matemáticas, Ingeniera de software, Ingeniería de sistemas, Ingeniería Industrial, Ingeniería Financiera con pasión en los sistemas y/o afines.  Requisitos •Experiencia mínima de 1 año en adelante en ciencia de datos o modelos predictivos, herramientas estadísticas y de visualización.  Otras habilidades •Habilidades analíticas de redacción y presentación de informes. •Excel avanzado. •Big data •Habilidades analíticas y matemáticas.  Envíanos tu hoja de vida al correo gestion.humana@conix.com.co  Anímate a ser parte de esta familia.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'We dream of a Data Analyst : -To connect with our purpose and belong to a globally recognized group. -To have skills in mining, structuring and data cleaning, maintenance and administration of the Data. -Data scientist with the ability to provide statistical information to the different managements, analysis BI, generation of development proposals in conjunction with the other areas of the company. -Advanced knowledge/experience in programming languages and tools of BI. -Knowledge/experience in queries to databases and analysis of KPI and metrics -passed by reducing times in the processes automating them and improving them. Studies •Professsional in statistics, mathematics, Software Engineer, Systems Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Financial Engineering with passion in the systems and/or related. Requirements •Minimum experience of 1 year onwards in data science or predictive models, statistical and visualization tools. Other skills •Analytic skills in writing and reporting. •Excel advanced. •Big data •Ability analytics and mathematics.com'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Empresa líder en suministro de equipos de seguridad industrial para sectores de minería, oil & gas, bomberos y eléctrico, busca para su equipo en Bogotá, Colombia: Data Analyst para Recopilar e interpretar datos procedentes de diversas fuentes con el fin de ser utilizados en la toma de decisiones de las diferentes dependencias.  Formación Profesional en carreras como, estadística, ingenierías, marketing, o relacionadas con las funciones a desempeñar con más de 5 años de experiencia. Experiencia laboral demostrada como analista de datos o analista de datos empresariales Nivel B2 de inglés, se valora conocimiento en portugués  Conocimientos y habilidades Capacidad para interpretar grandes cantidades de datos y realizar múltiples tareas. Fuertes habilidades de comunicación y presentación. Conocimientos técnicos sobre modelos de datos, desarrollo del diseño de bases de datos, minería de datos y técnicas de segmentación Excelente conocimiento de paquetes estadísticos, bases de datos y MS Office Perspicacia para motores de búsqueda, análisis web y herramientas de investigación empresarial Familiaridad con los programas de CRM Conocimiento de los métodos de recopilación de datos Pensamiento analítico y crítico  Funciones Recopilar datos sobre los consumidores, la competencia y el mercado y consolidar la información en elementos, informes y presentaciones Comprender los objetivos comerciales para descubrir las preferencias de los clientes potenciales. Recopilar y analizar datos estadísticos utilizando métodos eficientes Análisis de tendencias, comportamiento de mercado y clientes Identificación de problemas y recomendaciones de medidas adecuadas a la dirección y a los jefes de departamento correspondientes. Proporcionar análisis competitivos sobre las ofertas de mercado de varias empresas, modelos de precios y métodos de operación. Mantenerse completamente informado sobre las tendencias del mercado.  Si estás interesado/a envíanos tu hoja de vida al correo: rrhh.holding@kpnsafety.com con el asunto “Data Analyst”
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Leading company in supply of industrial security equipment for mining, oil & gas, fire and electrical sectors, seeks for your team in Bogotá, Colombia: Data Analyst to Collect and interpret data from various sources in order to be used in decision-making of different dependencies. Professional training in careers such as statistics, engineering, marketing, or related to functions to perform with more than 5 years of experience. Work experience demonstrated as a data analyst or business data analyst Level B2 of English, is valued knowledge in Portuguese Knowledge and skills Capacity to interpret large amounts of data and perform multiple tasks. Strong communication and presentation skills. Technical knowledge about data models, development of database design, data mining and segmentation techniques Excellent knowledge of statistical packages, databases and MS Office Perspica for search engines, web analysis and business research tools Provide familiarity with CRM programs Knowledge about data collection methods Analytical and critical data collection Functions Collect data about consumers, competition and market trends and consolidate the information into elements, reports and presentations Understand the business objectives to discover the efficient methods of CRM.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  What We're Looking For: You're an expert in: Cloud Engineering (cloud computing) experience with AWS, Azure, and/or GCP. Networking (VPC, security groups, ALB/NLB, NAT, Route53, VPNs, WAF). Network architecture, including load-balancing, SSL, NGINX, Apache, DNS, IPSec. Access Control and Auditing. Postgress, data migration, PostgreSQL, MySQL, others. Storage design for high availability and disaster recovery. Linux operating systems. Large, greenfield, and legacy Ruby, PHP, Python, Node.js, and React apps. Serverless deployment (Lambda, API Gateway, or equivalent). Infrastructure as a code, specifically Terraform / Pulumi / Cloudformation experience. Design and maintain CI/CD process and tools (CircleCI, GitLab, Jenkins, etc). DockerIn-depth experience with the orchestration tools, especially Kubernetes. In-depth experience with the YAML config management tools, especially Helm & Ansible. Experience with Agile processes, testing, and code review Good communication skills. Fully professional English fluency.  Nice To Have Qualifications: AWS Professional Certificates. Kubernetes Certificates. Google Cloud Certificates. Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon. Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them. An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them. Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.  Duties: Architect and integrate new applications along with occasional legacy applications. Build, maintain, and update tools for deployment, monitoring, operations, and security. Troubleshoot and resolve issues in dev, testing, and production environments. Structure and maintain software config management systems. Scale for demand. Work with high-growth, technology clients. Develop and improve operational practices and procedures. Suggest improvements and enhancements. Bring new features and services into production. Meaningful experience working on large, complex systems. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. You’re passionate about software development and DevOps...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current. You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your colleagues.  Benefits: Competitive Salary Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Storage design for high availability and disaster recovery. Linux operating systems. Large, greenfield, and legacy Ruby, PHP, Python, Node.js, and React apps. Serverless deployment (Lambda, API Gateway, or equivalent). Infrastructure as a code, specifically Terraform / Pulumi / Cloudformation experience. Design and maintain CI/CD process and tools (CircleCI, GitLab, Jenkins, etc). DockerIn-depth experience with the orchestration tools, especially Kubernetes. In-depth experience with the YAML config management tools, especially Helm & Ansible. Experience with Agile processes, testing, and code review Good communication skills. Fully professional English fluency.  Nice To Have Qualifications: AWS Professional Certificates. Kubernetes Certificates. Google Cloud Certificates. Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon. Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them. An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them. Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.  Duties: Architect and integrate new applications along with occasional legacy applications. Build, maintain, and update tools for deployment, monitoring, operations, and security. Troubleshoot and resolve issues in dev, testing, and production environments. Structure and maintain software config management systems. Scale for demand. Work with high-growth, technology clients. Develop and improve operational practices and procedures. Suggest improvements and enhancements. Bring new features and services into production. Meaningful experience working on large, complex systems. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. You’re passionate about software development and DevOps...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current. You work well within a team environment and enjoy working in the office with your colleagues.  Benefits: Competitive Salary Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Summary  This role will work within a team whose main focus will be to interpret the regulatory data received across different geographies, functions, divisions and ensuring key activities and regulatory systems updates are completed whilst adhering to all policies, practices and procedures. Timeliness/ accuracy in the data entry and removal of workload associated with data entry from Regulatory Strategy teams will be key performance indicators for this role. These activities ensure data integrity to enable the organization to have visibility across all functions within a products lifecycle. It is essential that all systems are clearly and accurately updated within the timelines specified in the Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) or business process documentation to ensure regulatory compliance.  Job Responsibilities  Review and interpret the data provided by the PCO to establish the system / tools required to be populated in line with current standard operating procedures or business process documentation, including systems and SOPs associated with the regulatory data scope. Perform data entry and quality control tasks associated in all global regulatory systems impacted, including systems associated with the regulatory data scope. Review audit reports from the systems and resolve errors to ensure integrity of data Identifies issues and provides input into solutions Accountable for remediation efforts associated with their scope as part of SCC global rollout. Perform monthly PEARL compliance report review and complete remediation activities in close partnership with Regulatory strategist teams Adhering to quality control procedures and standards related to the systems or tools ensuring Regulatory Compliance Support global/local team members with data management workload when necessary to provide flexible support for the portfolio. Adhere to Pfizer compliance standards Act as Regulatory Data SME in regions supported Produce country/regional reports as required Support audit as part of regulatory data / system scope  Qualifications / Skills  Computer literacy in MS Word/Outlook/Excel/Adobe Acrobat. Proven technical aptitude and ability to quickly learn and use new software, regulations and quality standards Functional and technical knowledge and skills to do the job at a high level of accomplishment Proven technical aptitude Quick learner with ability to multi-task Ability to work with accuracy and attention to detail Ability to work with autonomy and/or part of a team in a busy environment Demonstrated ability to work in a highly regulated environment Quality focus Customer orientation Analysis and solution of problems Effective communication English intermediate to advance (written and spoken) Academic Degree: Professional in Pharmaceutical Chemistry Regulatory knowledge and experience (at least 1-2 years) Demonstrated ability to work in a highly regulated environment Project Management Experience desirable  Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.  Regulatory Affairs

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Rockwell Automation is a global technology leader focused on helping the world’s manufacturers be more productive, sustainable, and agile. With more than 25,000 employees who make the world better every day, we know we have something special. Behind our customers - amazing companies that help feed the world, provide life-saving medicine on a global scale, and focus on clean water and green mobility - our people are energized problem solvers that take pride in how the work we do changes the world for the better.  We welcome all makers, forward thinkers, and problem solvers who are looking for a place to do their best work. And if that’s you we would love to have you join us!  Job Description  Rockwell Automation, the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation, employs about 22,000 individuals globally, makes its customers more productive and the world more sustainable. Throughout the world, our flagship Allen-Bradley® and Rockwell Software® product brands are recognized for innovation and excellence, and serves customers in more than 80 countries worldwide.When you choose Rockwell Automation, you join talented employees who have helped us establish our leadership position in the automation industry over the past century.You join a diverse, inclusive and global community with a passion for innovation. A place where you can partner with great minds and inspiring people.As much as we focus on our customers, we know our employees are key to our success and future. Helping you develop a rewarding career is a top priority. Because when you succeed, we succeed.  The Potential Engineer Internship Program at Rockwell Automation will give you the opportunity to start your professional career experiencing the challenges of the world's largest company dedicated to the field of Industrial Automation. Directed to senior students of Control and Automation Engineering courses, Electrical, Electronics and Mechatronics and systems engineering, the program lasts for one year. With great commercial and technical approach, our goal is to empower potential young people through job rotation in key business areas of the company, as well as training and feedback constant.This experience will offer you the opportunity to know the different aspects of our business, work in a global and highly qualified staff, enabling the development of skills for their professional career. In addition, the program's flexibility will provide you the possibility to identify in which area can best contribute according to their abilities and preferences.After the program ends, opportunities may be offered, as hiring in any department and location Rockwell as well as training and or international career.Be part of a global team breathing challenges, technology and innovation!  Main requiriments  Students Control and Automation Engineering, Electrical, Electronics, Mechatronics and systems engineering. Advanced English / fluent; Availability for an internship for a year and working full time. Location Bogota. Authorization from the university to perform internships  ()

Descripción: Acerca del empleo We are looking for students in international business, international trade, or related careers who would like to join us in our DHL Global Service Center – Bogota.  If you are energetic, positive, willing to learn, responsible, detail oriented and passionate about the logistic world, this role is for you. In this role you will be responsible for monitoring and Controlling different shipments around the world giving visibility to the customer you will perform Daily, Monthly and Quarterly reports regarding performance also participating in performing calls with the final customer and presenting Monthly KPIs. Also you would have the possibility to assist our Customers with Spot Quotes and help the commercial team to achieve their goals or assuring customs process are all correct and ready to receive a shipment into a country  You must have this Key Capabilities / Competencies: · · Knowledge in logistics processes · English Level: Intermediate - Advanced · MS Office: Intermediate · Written Communication: Advanced · Analytical Skills (data analysis) · Autonomy · Detail oriented  Salary $1'630.000 + food assistance + performance bonus since 5% until 13% out of salary ($71.500 - $185.900) · Indefinite duration contract · Prepaid health policy · Life insurance

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Importante multinacional Prosegur, S. A., Cia. de Seguridad, conocida simplemente como Prosegur, es una empresa de servicios globales de seguridad fundada en 1976, se encuentra en búsqueda del mejor talento para su equipo.  Buscamos profesionales (no técnicos ni tecnólogos), Recién graduados de carreras como Ingeniería industrial, electrónica, economía, matemáticas, estadística, administración, mercadeo o afines.  Objetivo del cargo: Conocer cada uno de los procesos del negocio de alarmas para identificar oportunidades que contribuyan al mejoramiento continuo del negocio, soportando los diferentes procesos por medio de reportería y análisis que permitan ejecutar proyectos de alto impacto en la organización con la exposición a la alta dirección.  COMPETENCIAS Y REQUISITOS · Educación: Profesional graduado de carreras en ingeniería Industrial, Administración de Empresas, Economía, Administración de negocios con formación en gerencia de proyectos y/o Mercadeo · Formación: Preferiblemente promedio académico durante su carrera mínimo de 4.0 De preferencia Bilingües. · Experiencia: Sin Experiencia laboral, preferiblemente desarrollo o trabajo académico con formulación de proyectos, trabajos de grado, prácticas laborales con iniciativas destacables dentro de su formación y reconocimientos por sus destacados resultados. Conocimiento avanzado en Excel y manejo de bases de datos. Horario de oficina L-V (7:30-5:30). Salario: 2000000 Se desempeñará en la ciudad de Bogotá en alternancia
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Important multinational Prosegur, S. A., Cia. de Seguridad, simply known as Prosegur, is a global security service company founded in 1976, is in search of the best talent for its team. We are looking for professionals (not technicians or technologists), New graduates of careers such as Industrial Engineering, Electronics, Economics, Mathematics, Statistics, Administration, Marketing or related. Objective of the position: To know each of the processes of the business of alarms to identify opportunities that contribute to the continuous improvement of the business, supporting the different processes by means of reporting and analysis that allow to execute projects of high impact in the organization with the exposure to the senior management. COMPETITIONS AND REQUIREMENTS · Education: Professional graduate of careers in Industrial Engineering, Business Administration, Economy, Business Administration with training in Project Management and/or Mercadeo · Training: Preferably average academic during his minimum career of 4.0 Of preference Bilingües. · Experience: Without work experience, preferably development or academic work with formulation of projects, grade jobs, labor practices with outstanding initiatives within his training and recognitions for his outstanding results L.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¿Te apasiona tecnología y la innovación?  Conoce nuestro ADN  Nos adaptamos fácilmente a los cambios  Creamos valor constantemente  Pensamos y actuamos como dueños  Fanáticos de los resultados y la agilidad  El conocimiento colectivo nos vuelve poderosos  Tu principal reto será:  Realizar el proceso de facturación, recaudo, gestión de cartera y conciliación de cuentas con el propósito de contabilizar todas las operaciones asociadas a la caja de la empresa.  Tendrás que:  1. Revisar y analizar las operaciones en la herramienta correspondiente. 2. Confirmar que la factura sea radicada de manera efectiva frente a los requerimientos de la organización y cumplan con los soportes exigidos en las políticas. 3. Analizar y clasificar las cuentas por pagos, de acuerdo con los acuerdos comerciales. 4. Gestionar la base de registro de clientes para un cobro efectivo. 5. Gestionar los procesos de correspondencia en las diferentes etapas de cartera (preventiva, administrativa, pre-jurídica y jurídica) para hacer el debido seguimiento de cobro persuasivo hasta culminar el recaudo. 6. Realizar informes de gestión que permitan conocer que clientes no pagan dentro del plazo establecido estratificándolos de acuerdo con el riesgo compañía.  Necesitaras: Ser profesional en formación de Finanzas, Negocios Internacionales, Comercio Exterior, Administración de Empresas, Contaduría Pública y/o afines. Contar con conocimientos básicos en Excel - Diplomado en impuestos y/o NIIF. Mínimo (6) seis meses de experiencia específica en Cartera.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': "Are you passionate about technology and innovation? Get to know our DNA?We adapt easily to changes.We create value constantly.We think and act as owners of the results and agility fans.The collective knowledge makes us powerful Your main challenge will be: Performing the process of billing, collection, portfolio management and reconciliation of accounts with the purpose of accounting for all transactions associated with the company's cashier.You will have to: 1. Review and analyze the operations in the corresponding tool. 2. Confirm that the invoice is effectively based against the requirements of the organization and comply with the supports required in the policies. 3. Analyse and classify the accounts by payments, according to the commercial agreements. 4.Manage the customer registration base for an effective collection. 5.Manage the correspondence processes in the different stages of portfolio (preventive, administrative, pre-legal and legal) to make the proper tracking of collection until the collection is completed. 6.Manage management reports that allow you to know that customers do not pay within the established time tratifying them according to the company's risk."}]
