Título: Ejecutiv@ de compras / Analista de medios
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Sobre GroupM...  GroupM lidera y da forma a los mercados de medios al ofrecer productos y servicios de medios que mejoran el rendimiento, impulsados por datos y tecnología. Nuestras agencias y negocios de la red global permiten que nuestra gente trabaje en colaboración a través de las fronteras con los mejores en su clase, brindándoles la oportunidad de acelerar su progreso y desarrollo. No estamos limitados por equipos o geografías; Nuestra escala y diversidad de clientes nos permite ser más aventureros con nuestro negocio y talento. Damos a nuestro talento el espacio, el apoyo y las herramientas para innovar y crecer.  Descubre más sobre GroupM en: www.groupm.com  Ejecutiv@ de compras / Analista de medios  Tus principales funciones serán… Brindar soporte en la elaboración del Plan Táctico de acuerdo a objetivos Ordenación y Chequeo de Pauta Realización del seguimiento diario de las campañas Seguimiento del cumplimiento de proceso de facturación  Sobre tu experiencia y conocimientos… Mínimo 1 año de experiencia en compra me medios ATL y Digitales (plus) en agencias de medios Manejo de las herramientas de IBOPE  Sobre ti… Eres una persona proactiva, orientada a los resultados y cuentas con buenas relaciones interpersonales Tienes habilidades de servicio al cliente, comunicación asertiva e iniciativa Innovador: buscas la manera de transformar las oportunidades para generar y crear nuevas ideas.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'About GroupM... GroupM leads and shapes media markets by offering products and media services that improve performance, driven by data and technology. Our agencies and global network businesses allow our people to work in collaboration across borders with the best in their class, providing them with the opportunity to accelerate their progress and development. We are not limited by teams or geographies; Our scale and diversity of customers allows us to be more adventurous with our business and talent. We give our talent the space, support and tools to innovate and grow. Find out more about GroupM at: www.groupm.com Executing@ of purchases / Media Analyst Your main functions will be... Providing support in the development of the Tactical Plan according to objectives Ordination and Checkup of Pauta Conducting the daily monitoring of campaigns Follow-up of the billing process About your experience and knowledge... Minimum 1 year of experience in buying me media ATL and Digital (plus) in media agencies Handling the tools of IBOPE About you... You are looking for a proactive person, oriented to the results and accounts with good interpersonal relationships You have the opportunity to generate new skills.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  Cafeto Software es una empresa de tecnología que implementa soluciones de software, desde la ideación, elaboración, pruebas de calidad y puesta en marcha. Inclusive, para asegurar la calidad y sostenibilidad de los mismos, ofrece el servicio de soporte y mantenimiento como una parte integral y necesaria para garantizar el éxito de todos los proyectos.  Actualmente nos encontramos en la búsqueda de un Analista administrativo.  ¿Cuáles son los requisitos que debes tener para aplicar? Experiencia de 2 años Ingeniero industrial Experiencia en coordinacion y gestion de procesos administrativos Manejo de excel avanzado Gran capacidad de organizacion, planeacion, comunicacion, trabajo en equipo y proactividad. Conocimiento en legislación laboral y seguridad social Nivel de ingles conversacional  Algunas de tus funciones serían: Apoyo administrativo. Analisis, actualizacion de mejoras a los proceso de Indicadores de gestión.  ¿Por qué trabajar con nosotros? Valoramos la diversidad y velamos por el respeto y la integridad de cada persona. Motivamos a nuestros cafeto makers a realizar su trabajo de forma autónoma. Tendrás un plan de carrera individual. Más que un trabajo, nos apasiona el crecimiento. Más que colegas, somos amigos.  Beneficios Contrato a término indefinido con todas las prestaciones de ley. Cobertura medicina prepagada al 100% para ti. Precio especial para afiliación de tus familiares para la medicina prepagada con Colsanitas. Seguro de vida. Fondo de empleados. Clases de inglés semi personalizadas. Y mucho más.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Description Cafeto Software is a technology company that implements software solutions, from the ideation, elaboration, quality testing and commissioning. Even, to ensure the quality and sustainability of the same, offers the support and maintenance service as an integral part and necessary to guarantee the success of all projects. Currently we are in search of an Administrative Analyst. What are the requirements that you should have to apply? 2 years experience Industrial engineer Experience in coordination and management of administrative processes Advanced excel management Great ability to organize, planning, communication, team work and proactivity. Knowledge in labor legislation and social security Level of conversational English Some of your functions would be: Administrative support. Analysis, updating of improvements to the management indicators process. Why work with us? We value diversity and ensure the respect and integrity of each person. We motivate our coffee maker to perform their work autonomously. You will have an individual career plan. More than a job, we are passionate about the growth. More than colleagues, we are friends. Benefits contract to the indefinite term with all the benefits of law. Coverage to our coffee maker.'}]

Título: Travel agent B2+ English level Required
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Estamos en la búsqueda de agentes para nuestra agencia de viajes brindado atención al cliente, la campaña esta relacionadas con la hotelería y el turismo.  Te ofrecemos crecimiento dentro de la empresa, estabilidad laboral, trabajo desde site y un excelente ambiente laboral!  Salario base de 2´300.000 + bonificaciones de performance, correspondemos con todas las prestaciones de ley, entrenamiento totalmente pago, firmas contrato a termino indefinido, trabaja solo 5 días a la semana, turnos rotativos dos días off.  Si cuentas con nivel de inglés B2 en adelante, vives en Bogotá o sus alrededores no dudes en aplicar. No requerimos experiencia previa. Si cuentas con disponibilidad de tiempo y tienes muchas ganas de aprender y crecer, ¿Qué estas esperando?  ¡Aplica ya!
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'We are looking for agents for our travel agency provided customer service, the campaign is related to hotel and tourism. We offer you growth within the company, job stability, work from site and an excellent work environment! Base salary of 2 ́300,000 + performance bonuses, we correspond to all the benefits of law, fully paid training, signatures contract to indefinite term, works only 5 days a week, rotation shifts two days off. If you have English B2 level from now on, you live in Bogotá or its surroundings do not hesitate to apply. We do not require previous experience. If you have time availability and you want to learn and grow, what are you waiting for? Apply now!'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  We're looking to hire several mid-level and senior ServiceNow Apps Developers to join our team. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For: 3+ years of professional software development experience. 5+ years preferred but not required. 3+ years of experience in configuration, testing, and deployment of ServiceNow functionality. Solid understanding of application portfolio management or software asset management framework. Both a strategic vision, yet crafty execution-style. You will need to think big but be able to get into the weeds and quickly produce. A track record of delivering outcomes where you've planned and driven product direction autonomously. We're seeking a self-starter, who asks for help when needed. Strong communication and collaboration skills, especially in influencing and partnering across many organizational levels. A growth mindset. Our team moves fast and there is always something to learn. Experience working on large, complex systems. Experience working on Agile / Scrum teams. A four-year college degree is required. Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon. Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them. An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them. Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current.  We’ll be super excited if you have: Experience launching Application Portfolio Management and Software Asset. Management (SAM) systems - especially on the ServiceNow platform. Experience working on end-to-end journeys and customer experiences. Experience managing or supporting SaaS applications. In-depth knowledge of Jira and Confluence.  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Concentrix Catalyst is the experience design and engineering team of Concentrix, a leading global solutions company that reimagines everything CX through strategy, talent and technology. We combine human-centered design, powerful data and strong tech to accelerate CX transformation at scale.  The Catalyst Team is seeking a DevOps Engineer to join our full-time team as full-time employee.  Responsibilities - Provide business, data, application and technology consulting for IT team members and business partners. -Follow guidelines on project level architecture and design work. -Increase skill and knowledge on best practices for design work. -Participate in reviews of project level architecture and designs for IT projects. -Develop leadership skills through providing business, application, and technology consulting. -Learn to deeply analyze business processes and technologies to discover and refine client's needs. -Work collaboratively with clients with varying expertise and exposure to DevOps in order to solve complex problems. -Develop solutions to varying challenges using: *Languages such as: Ruby, Python, Node.JS (Javascript), RSpec. *Tools such as Octopus, Kubernetes, Terraform -Possess working knowledge of object oriented and scripted programing. -Be comfortable building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and workflows. -Be comfortable using and adapting to different configuration management tools as required by clients. -Possess strong verbal and written communication skills in order to adapt to the dynamic nature of discussions with other engineering and product teams. -Learn proper documentation techniques to eventually provide translate functional service designs and models. -Seek out and identify opportunities to reuse enterprise technology services. -Develop code and documentation that adheres to best practices and standards. -Learn to estimate level of effort required to deliver quality solutions. -Perform peer reviews of designs and solution proposals to ensure conformance to current practice and quality of work being generated. -Learn to write unit and acceptance tests for modules. -Learn to implement scalable architecture. Qualifications - B.S. in Computer Science, Engineering, or Information Technology or equivalent experience. - 1+ years’ Open-Source Software tools and development experience in one or more of the following: Ruby, Python, Node.JS (Javascript), RSpec, Puppet/Chef, Octopus, Kubernetes, Terraform - Experience using Source Control tools such as Git or Subversion. Git knowledge is a plus. - Experience using virtualized machines (cloud based or local). - Experience with AWS, Azure, GCP platforms - Some software development or DevOps automation background.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo A well-funded stealth startup that aims at building the next enterprise software disruptor is looking for a Web Front-End Developer. The developer will be responsible for building the product and helping to shape the vision of the company. The company is backed by top-tier silicon valley investors and led by experienced founders who are competent in running emerging platform products. This position offers an excellent chance for the candidate to take ownership of the technical process and create next-generation technology.  Job Responsibilities:  Perform front-end coding during development sprints to produce excellent, scalable UI Collaborate with back-end developers to create robust, end-to-end solutions Develop CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and third-party libraries or frameworks Maintain and manage a consistent front-end framework across all devices  Job Requirements:  Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a front-end engineer Demonstrable experience in Chrome extensions Extensive experience in JavaScript Fluent in verbal and written English

The developer will be responsible for building the product and helping to shape the vision of the company. The company is backed by top-tier silicon valley investors and led by experienced founders who are competent in running emerging platform products. This position offers an excellent chance for the candidate to take ownership of the technical process and create next-generation technology.  Job Responsibilities:  Perform front-end coding during development sprints to produce excellent, scalable UI Collaborate with back-end developers to create robust, end-to-end solutions Develop CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and third-party libraries or frameworks Maintain and manage a consistent front-end framework across all devices  Job Requirements:  Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) At least 3+ years of relevant experience as a front-end engineer Demonstrable experience in Chrome extensions Extensive experience in JavaScript Fluent in verbal and written English

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Gorilla Logic provides nearshore Agile teams to Fortune 500 and SMB companies, bringing unparalleled expertise in the delivery of full-stack web, mobile, and enterprise applications. Our highly collaborative Agile Gorillas are uniquely qualified to implement complex software initiatives. With offices in the United States, Costa Rica, and Colombia, Gorilla Logic helps clients gain competitive advantages to achieve results faster.  About Us  Gorilla Logic provides custom application development services on the ground and in the cloud to many of the world's leading software-driven organizations. It has a rich history of applying software engineering best practices to reduce the time and cost of delivering high-quality, full-featured applications with advanced functionality. Its technical leadership in mobile, rich Internet, and enterprise applications showcases its broad commitment to software development best practices and quality.  The Details: Type of Employment: Employee. Length: Permanent. Location: San Jose, Costa Rica. Availability: Immediately Available, Flexible for 4-week notice. Third Party Availability: No third-party recruiters, please. Perks: Fun Environment, close-knit team, endless opportunities within company, start up feeling office, very cool product.  Python Developer  Gorilla Logic is looking for a Sr. Python Developer, who will work with a team of engineers building and maintaining our customer’s ETL environment. Based in San Jose, Costa Rica, this is a key role within our customer’s engineering team, requiring extensive ETL development experience using Python. Our environment will require you to work effectively with your teammates, of course. But your real success will be measured by how well you couple critical thinking with self-motivation, enthusiasm, and determination.  Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience). 5+ years of software development. 3+ years of Python development experience. In-depth knowledge of SQL preferably with Oracle, SQL Server and/or MySQL. Must have the ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Strong communication skills to interact with Agile team members.  Bonus Skills ETL processing experience with multiple data sources including SQL database(s) is a big plus. Experience writing stored procedures using PL/SQL. Experience with Django is a big plus. Experience with Databricks is a big plus. Experience consuming Amazon Web Services including S3. Experience with Kafka, Apache Spark, MemSQL, and/or HTFS.

It has a rich history of applying software engineering best practices to reduce the time and cost of delivering high-quality, full-featured applications with advanced functionality. Its technical leadership in mobile, rich Internet, and enterprise applications showcases its broad commitment to software development best practices and quality.  The Details: Type of Employment: Employee. Length: Permanent. Location: San Jose, Costa Rica. Availability: Immediately Available, Flexible for 4-week notice. Third Party Availability: No third-party recruiters, please. Perks: Fun Environment, close-knit team, endless opportunities within company, start up feeling office, very cool product.  Python Developer  Gorilla Logic is looking for a Sr. Python Developer, who will work with a team of engineers building and maintaining our customer’s ETL environment. Based in San Jose, Costa Rica, this is a key role within our customer’s engineering team, requiring extensive ETL development experience using Python. Our environment will require you to work effectively with your teammates, of course. But your real success will be measured by how well you couple critical thinking with self-motivation, enthusiasm, and determination.  Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience). 5+ years of software development. 3+ years of Python development experience. In-depth knowledge of SQL preferably with Oracle, SQL Server and/or MySQL. Must have the ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Strong communication skills to interact with Agile team members.  Bonus Skills ETL processing experience with multiple data sources including SQL database(s) is a big plus. Experience writing stored procedures using PL/SQL. Experience with Django is a big plus. Experience with Databricks is a big plus. Experience consuming Amazon Web Services including S3. Experience with Kafka, Apache Spark, MemSQL, and/or HTFS.

Título: Work From Home Senior Financial Analyst
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Location: Remote WFH All Latin American Candidates welcome to apply  Overview of the Role:  We are looking for a Senior Financial Analyst to join our Finance team. We are seeking proactive, dynamic people with great organizational abilities used to multitask, and with strong attention to detail.  This is an incredible chance to be a key member of our Product Team and place yourself in line for unmatched opportunities for career growth.  As part of the team, you will:  Perform research and gather documentation to compile comprehensive reports delivering clear, precise, and relevant information on time, operational reports, and transactional tasks such as processing accruals/prepayments/journal entries Work with banking/financial entities, international agencies, or government officials Assist in the vendor and client registration process, purchasing, and accounts payable process Data processing: responsible for updating records in the company system Assist in the department's programs, projects, and processes Assist in the preparation of monthly financial reports Assist in tracking due dates and compliance with US tax returns and other legal requirements  Key qualifications and skills to succeed in this role:  Advanced English (spoken and written) Minimum of 3 years of experience working in finance areas Expertise with web-based tools Excellent verbal and written communication skills; interpersonal and presentation skills Organized and detail-oriented Proven organizational skills Advanced English, both spoken and written (a must)  In return, we offer:  Competitive compensation package 100% remote Work from Home International company with diversity and multicultural inclusion The ability to work with leading startups and fast-growing companies in the USA  Company Overview  Workling is a talent acquisition marketplace whose mission is to unlock the professional potential of smart people everywhere. Workling helps companies move faster to hire remote, top-tier talent from anywhere in the world.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo En Sonda de Colombia nos encontramos en la búsqueda de un CONSULTOR FI Formación académica: Ingeniería de sistemas o Ingeniería de telecomunicaciones o afines. Conocimientos: Activos fijos. Product costing Soporte funcional. Mejora continua.  Experiencia Mínimo 5-6 años en consultoría SAP. En implementación o roll-out de un proyecto completo. Módulos FI  Funciones: Gestiona la resolución de incidencias “nivel 2” en los módulos FI Gestiona proyectos y roll-out de los negocios del grupo, desde un rol de implementación, acompañamiento y/o dirección en los módulos FI Ejecuta proyectos de mantenimiento y mejora al sistema SAP en los módulos FI Interpreta las necesidades funcionales de los procesos de negocio y las transforma en oportunidades de mejora. Brinda soporte a las operaciones y necesidades diarias del negocio. Velar por la seguridad del sistema en lo relacionado a mejores prácticas de parametrización, desarrollo y uso del sistema. Tipo de contrato: Indefinido Modalidad: Presencial-Bogotá  ¡Si cumples con este perfil, postúlate ahora! Envíanos tu hoja de vida al correo: martha.mosquera@sonda.com-Maria.pacheco@est.sonda.com Asunto : CONSULTOR FI
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': "In Sonda de Colombia we find ourselves in search of a CONSULTOR FI Academic training: Systems Engineering or Telecommunications Engineering or related. Knowledge: Fixed assets. Product costing Functional support. Continuous improvement. Minimum experience 5-6 years in SAP consulting. In implementation or roll-out of a complete project. FI Modules Functions: Manages the resolution of “level 2” incidents in FI modules Manages projects and roll-out of the group's businesses, from a role of implementation, accompaniment and/or direction in FI modules Implements projects of maintenance and improvement to the SAP system in FI modules Interprets the functional needs of business processes and transforms them into opportunities of improvement. Provides support to the operations and daily needs of the business. Ensures the security of the system in terms of best practices of parametrization, development and use of the system. Type of contract: Undefined Modality: Physical-Bogotá if you fulfill this profile, postulate now! Send us your resume to mail: martha.mosquera@sonda.com-Maria.pacheco@ Subject:"}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Este rol es responsable de la generación de insights alrededor del conocimiento del cliente, su comportamiento y su información, apoyados en herramientas de tecnología informática y construyendo las plataformas analíticas del Banco. Para lo anterior se requiere que participe en:  Construcción y consolidación de las plataformas analíticas del Banco (DWH, Datalake, Data Labs) Construcción de soluciones analíticas del Banco, particularmente en lo relacionado con análisis diagnóstico y descriptivo Diseñar e implementar los mecanismos a acceso a los datos (consultas analíticas, Dashboards, reportes, etc.) Administrar la herramienta de reportes y Dashboards (Tableau Server), así como la definición de sites y mini sites para el acceso a la información.  Requisitos Mínimos  Ingeniero de Sistemas o afines con experiencia con mínimo 4 años en Gestión de información analítica, Data Warehousing y business analytics y programación Experienca en consolidación de proyectos de analítica Fuertes conocimientos técnicos y tecnológicos relacionados con Inteligencia de negocios, conocimiento de herramientas analíticas generales y en particular del sector financiero  Conocimientos Requeridos  Herramientas de Big Data tales como Spark, SparkStreaming, Sqoop, Flume, Solr y demás herramientas de procesamiento en memoria orientadas a flujos de trabajo de analytics, data science y ML Bases de datos tales como Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, BigQuery Herramientas de Almacenamiento de datos Kudu, HDFS, HBASE, Hive, Impala Dominio herramientas ETL, tales como Informatica PWC, Pentaho, Talend, SSIS, etc. Dominio de SQL y Office avanzado Buscamos una persona con interés y motivación para trabajar en equipo, la autogestión y el aprendizaje continuo.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'This role is responsible for generating insights around customer knowledge, behavior and information, supported by computer technology tools and building the Bank’s analytical platforms. For this we require you to participate in: Construction and consolidation of the Bank’s analytical platforms (DWH, Datalake, Data Labs) Construction of Bank’s analytical solutions, particularly in relation to diagnostic and descriptive analysis Design and implement mechanisms to access data (analytical consults, Dashboards, reports, etc.) Manage the report tool and Dashboards (Tableau Server), as well as the definition of sites and mini sites for access to information. Minimum System Engineer and Related Requirements with at least 4 years experience in Analytical Information Management, Data Warehousing and Business Tools Analysis and Programming Experience in consolidation of analytics projects Strong technical and technological knowledge related to Business Intelligence, knowledge of general analytical tools and in particular of the financial sector Needed Knowledges Big Data Tools such as Spark, SparkStreaming and Programming, Solq.'}]

Título: Analista de Requerimientos Junior / Analyst, Business Operations
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Dinámica del Rol y Funciones Principales  Asegurar que todos los diseños funcionales de las soluciones a implementar hagan uso efectivo de las capacidades de la plataforma y cumplan los requerimientos internos de seguridad y arquitectura. Ser responsable del correcto seguimiento de los procesos y estándares globales de análisis y metodologías de desarrollo consistentes con los requerimientos técnicos solicitados. Identificar y solucionar problemas de procesamiento, tanto técnicos como de proceso, interactuando con distintos equipos relacionados (Soporte, Tecnología, Soluciones/Producto) en distintos equipos globales. Entregar resultados oportunos y precisos a los clientes, analizando los datos y los resultados obtenidos para garantizar que se mantenga la calidad esperada. Entender y proponer mejoras para el ciclo de vida de la entrega Batch, analizando perspectivas técnicas, de proceso, de cumplimiento, entre otras.  Requisitos  Profesional graduado en Ingeniería de Sistemas o Ingeniería Industrial. 1 año de experiencia profesional en gestión de proyectos de tecnología y de software, levantamiento de requerimientos, definición, diseño y gestión de proyectos de todas las etapas. Inglés avanzado. Capacidad de desarrollar relaciones de manera efectiva y comunicarse de manera asertiva orientada al cliente. Fuertes habilidades analíticas y de resolución de problemas. Buena comunicación verbal, narrativa y habilidades de negociación. Flexibilidad y adaptación al cambio.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Dynamics of the Role and Main Functions Ensure that all functional designs of the solutions to be implemented make effective use of the capabilities of the platform and meet the internal requirements of security and architecture. Be responsible for the correct monitoring of the processes and global standards of analysis and development methodologies consistent with the technical requirements requested. Identify and solve processing problems, both technical and process, interacting with different related teams (Support, Technology, Solutions/Product) in different global teams. Deliver timely and accurate results to customers, analyzing the data and results obtained to ensure that the expected quality is maintained. Understand and propose improvements for the life cycle of the Batch delivery, analyzing technical, process, compliance perspectives, among others. Professional requirements graduated in Systems Engineering or Industrial Engineering. 1 year of professional experience in managing technology and software projects, raising requirements, definition, design and management of projects of all stages. Advanced English. Ability to develop relationships effectively and communicate in an assertive way oriented to the client. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Good verbal communication, narrative and negotiation skills. Flexibility and adaptation to change.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¡Buscamos personas recién egresadas de las siguientes carreras, Economía, Finanzas, Administración, Ingeniería Financiera!  ¡Postúlate a esta vacante hasta el próximo 4 de Diciembre!  Sus principales funciones: Desarrollo de herramientas que permitan gestionar y controlar riesgos de inversión en activos alternativos, en apego a las políticas internas aplicables, así como reglamentos de cada fondo. Realizar el seguimiento a fondos alternativos propios y filiales de inversión con el fin de identificar alertas y generar reportes que provean información relevante sobre el estado de los fondos a los diferentes públicos de interés. Gestionar las solicitudes de procesos de Due Diligence del negocio Investment Management, en el que se establece algún tipo de relación comercial Proponer y apoyar la estandarización y automatización tanto de procesos como metodologías a nivel regional para la generación de sinergias y optimizaciones. Documentar los procesos del área, dando respuesta a las necesidades del negocio y recomendaciones provenientes del equipo de Auditoria Interna. Garantizar la correcta aplicación y conceptos de las diversas metodologías para el cálculo de rendimientos. Gestionar indicadores cuantitativos que permitan reportar el cumplimiento de los objetivos de desempeño de Sura Investment Management. Actualizar los diferentes repositorios de información de los que dispone Sura IM, de manera que que se pueda contar con toda la información necesaria para responder los cuestionarios de forma ágil y veraz.  ¡Este es el perfil que estamos buscando!  Profesional en carreras de Economía, Finanzas, Administración, Ingeniería Financiera Conocimientos en: Contar con algún nivel de conocimientos en programación en Matlab, R, Visual Basic o Python. PowerBI: Básico y Excel Avanzado Indispensable tener conocimiento en Excel. Años de experiencia requerida: recién titulados o egresados con conocimiento  ¿Dónde estará ubicado el cargo? Medellín, Colombia  ¿Qué te ofrecemos? Horario flexible Oportunidad de trabajar en una compañía multicultural con presencia en 6 países de Latinoamérica Tiempo libre, cumpleaños, matrimonio, nacimiento hijos, entre otros.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'We are looking for new graduates of the following careers, Economy, Finance, Administration, Financial Engineering! Postpone to this vacancy until next December 4th! Its main functions: Development of tools that allow to manage and control risks of investment in alternative assets, in compliance with the applicable internal policies, as well as regulations of each fund. Follow up to own alternative funds and investment subsidiaries in order to identify alerts and generate reports that provide relevant information about the state of the funds to the different publics of interest. Manage the requests of Due Diligence processes of the business Investment Management, in which some type of business relationship is established Propose and support the standardization and automation of both processes and methodologies at regional level for the generation of synergies and optimizations. Document the processes of the area, giving answers to the needs of the business and recommendations from the team of Internal Audit. Guarantee the correct application and concepts of the various methodologies for the calculation of performance. Manage quantitative indicators that allow to report the fulfillment of the performance objectives of Sura Investment Management. Update the different repositories of information of which Southa is necessary IM.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Si eres estudiante de último semestre, en proceso de grado o graduado de Contaduría pública y tienes experiencia mínima de un año en cuentas por pagar, conciliaciones bancarias, entre otras, este rol es para ti  ¡Opta por ser parte de nosotros!  Capacidades / competencias clave: - Manejo de paquete office, especialmente Excel (Nivel intermedio). - Análisis. - Orientación al detalle.  ¡Para Ti! - Salario de $1´630.000 + Auxilio de alimentación ($85.000) + Bonificación por cumplimiento. - Contrato a término indefinido. - Trabajo presencial, Centro Empresarial Connecta, Bogotá Av Calle 26 #92-32
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'If you are a senior student, in the process of graduating from Public Accounts and you have at least one year experience in accounts payable, bank reconciliations, among others, this role is for you ¡Choice to be a part of us! Capacities/key competences: - Management of office package, especially Excel (intermediate level). - Analysis. - Orientation to detail. For You! - Salary of $1 ́630,000 + Food aid ($85,000) + Complimentary bonus. - In-person contract, Business Center Connecta, Bogotá Av Calle 26 #92-32'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Description  Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?  Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It Uniquely Yours.  You will work with functional leadership to develop capabilities and support the efficiency and effectiveness of employees in a function and to conduct assessment interventions to identify gaps and build and implement training programs.  How You Will Contribute  You will:  Create and manage content for existing programs and develop new content for new capabilities Manage the relationship with external partners Implement and deliver a learning agenda to ensure compliance to the training strategy Create and deliver functional communications and engagement activities Support human resources in succession planning Manage the reward and recognition program Manage the coaching program Manage the team database and keep it updated Track turnover  What You Will Bring  A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career. You will bring experience and knowledge in:  Advanced knowledge of database management/data mining/big data (SQL, Access etc.) FMCG/CPG experience including commercial business and customer execution experience Direct training experience Capability management experience  Our Sales Team and Distribution Network key ingredients to our success, and you will work with functional and Centre of Expertise leadership to develop  capabilities and support the efficiency and effectiveness of team within the business. You will also implement assessment interventions  to identify and diagnose gaps, build and deploy Train of trainers programs, support Local Trainings and measure impact against investment.  Job Request:  5-12 Years’ experience in Sales, Capabilities, Change, Communication or Training Area.  Preferred Commercial Areas and Sales Field Experience (Execution in Right and Perfect Store), Trade Marketing and Sales Operations.  Administrative or Engineer desired but any Career applicable if flute in Workday Training Process, Sales Process, Training or Communication and Presentation Skills.  Advanced in English  No Relocation support available  Business Unit Summary  WACAM is Mondelez International’s Latin America presence with 1,700 wonderful people proudly representing a diversity of cultures and nationalities. WACAM includes 12 countries—Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Chile, Bolivia, Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, Honduras, Guatemala, El Salvador, and the Dominican Republic—and the U.S. territory of Puerto Rico. We make and distribute our global brands and local jewels such as Choco-Soda, Doña Pepa, Coronitas and Cua-Cua to over 190 million discerning consumers.  Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.  At Mondelez International we work under a hybrid model, in which our offices at WACAM offer us a space for connection, collaboration and co-creation, with attendance being subject to the needs of the teams themselves and/or the business.  Where permitted by internal policies and local laws, new hires are required to be fully vaccinated with the COVID-19 vaccine as a condition of employment by their date of hire, unless they are granted a medical accommodation.  Job Type  Regular  People Capability  Business Capability

Título: Profesional en Ingeniería Recién Egresado - Planeación y Control Costos
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Description  Sobre nosotros  En Technip Energies, creemos en un mañana mejor y creemos que podemos hacer que el mañana sea mejor. Con aproximadamente 15.000 mujeres y hombres talentosos, somos una empresa de ingeniería y tecnología global y líder, con una visión clara para acelerar la transición energética. Diseñar y entregar soluciones energéticas de valor agregado, es lo que hacemos.  Si comparte nuestra determinación de impulsar la transición hacia un futuro bajo en carbono, este podría ser el trabajo para usted. Actualmente estamos buscando Profesional en Ingenieria Recién Egresado para Planeación y Control Costos, que reportará directamente al Jefe de Departamento de Planeación y Control Costos, para unirse a nuestro equipo con sede en Bogotá, Colombia.  Acerca del trabajo  El Especialista de Planeación y Control Costos I es responsable de d efinir los objetivos del proyecto en termino de duración y recursos; hacer seguimiento y reportar el estado del (los) proyecto(s), asegurando la confiabilidad de la proyección, cumpliendo con los requerimientos técnicos, contractuales y corporativos, dentro del programa y marco de calidad establecido.  Le ofrecemos no solo un trabajo, sino también un viaje inspirador en un entorno verdaderamente global donde nos unimos, para romper fronteras gracias a la innovación, la creatividad y el espíritu pionero que impulsa a nuestra gente.  Acerca de ti  Nos encantaría saber de usted si su perfil cumple con los siguientes requisitos esenciales:  Profesional en Ingeniería recién egresado (Mecanica, Civil, Eléctrico, Electronica). Conocimiento en manejo del programa Microsoft Project y Primavera (deseable). Conocimiento avanzado del programa Excel y demás herramientas de Microsoft Office. Nivel intermedio de inglés (hablado y escrito).  Estándares de inclusión  En nuestro viaje continuo para desarrollar y construir una cultura de inclusión, nos adherimos a cuatro estándares de oro de inclusión. ¿Y usted?  Desafiamos nuestros prejuicios y adoptamos la diversidad de pensamiento. Nadie tiene todos los conocimientos y soluciones, colectivamente los tenemos. Fomentamos un ambiente solidario donde las personas son respetadas, cómodas para compartir y ser escuchadas. Promovemos la escucha activa para la toma de decisiones y acciones efectivas.  ¿Qué sigue?  Fecha de inicio: lo antes posible  Una vez que reciba su solicitud de sistema, el equipo de reclutamiento evaluará y comparará sus habilidades, experiencia y equipo potencial con los requisitos del puesto. Le pedimos paciencia mientras el equipo completa el volumen de solicitudes en un plazo razonable. Verifique el progreso de su solicitud periódicamente a través de la cuenta personal del perfil de candidato creado durante su solicitud.  Lo invitamos a conocer más sobre nuestra empresa visitando www.technipenergies.com y síganos en LinkedIn , Instagram , Facebook , Twitter , Youtube para obtener actualizaciones de la empresa .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Si te apasiona Gestión Humana en el proceso de Desarrollo Organizacional y quieres trabajar en un entorno de retos y constante aprendizaje, ¡esta oferta es para ti! Importante Grupo Empresarial, se encuentra en la búsqueda de un ANALISTA DE DESARROLLO ORGANIZACIONAL, con enfoque corporativo en Bogotá, buscamos un perfil profesional en INGENIERÍA INDUSTRIAL con experiencia comprobable mínima de 2 años en procesos de Desarrollo Organizacional con las siguientes responsabilidades  RESPONSABILIDADES  Levantamiento y elaboración de perfiles de cargos, organigramas (headcount) Elaboración y consolidación de información para generación de estadísticas Indicadores de Gestión Analizar los resultados de las evaluaciones de competencias y desempeño, identificando necesidades de formación, capacitación individual y grupal, y desarrollo de competencias Programar y coordinar las inducciones del personal, inducción al cargo e Inducción a la empresa Implementación de planes de desarrollo, planes de desempeño y sucesión Conocimiento y aplicación de metodologías de Mapeo de Talento (Requisito indispensable) Implementación de programas de cultura y cambio organizacional, clima, liderazgo, competencias. Conocimientos específicos en metodologías de formación y desarrollo (Presencial y Virtual), planes de capacitación. Conocimiento en pruebas de perfil comportamental (PDA< DISC< FINXS) Conocimiento en metodologías de Valoración de Cargos, Es Requisito Indispensable (Human, HAY, Deloitte, Mercer) Conocimientos básicos en conceptos de COMPENSACIÓN (equidad, competitividad, bandas salariales) Conocimientos y experiencia en Procesos de Selección ALTA CAPACIDAD DE ANÁLISIS DE DATA   REQUISITOS  Profesional en Ing. Industrial (no aplica otra profesión), Experiencia mínima de 2 años en desarrollo organizacional específicamente. Conocimiento requerido en Data Studio (Google) y EXCEL INTERMEDIO se revisara conocimiento en manejo de Data para costeo de GH e Indicadores. Disponibilidad para realizar trabajo 100% Presencial de lunes a Viernes de 7 am a 5 pm Salario de La Posición de $2.800.000 Indispensable Conocimiento en metodologías de Valoración de Cargos, (Human, HAY, Deloitte, Mercer)   Por favor NO aplique si no tiene la experiencia y formación Específica, no será tenido en cuenta.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'If you are passionate about Human Management in the organizational development process and you want to work in an environment of challenges and constant learning, this offer is for you!Important Business Group, is in search of an organizational development analyst, with a corporate focus in Bogotá, we look for a professional profile in INDUSTRIAL INGENIERÍA with minimum verifiable experience of 2 years in organizational development processes with the following responsibilities RESPONDIALITIES Raising and drawing up job profiles, organizational charts (headcount) Developing and consolidating information for generating statistics Management indicators Analyzing the results of skills and performance evaluations, identifying needs for training, individual and group training, and developing competencies Programming and coordinating staff inductions, induction to the position and Induction to the company Implementing development plans, performance plans and succession Knowledge and application of methodologies of Talent Mapping (Indispensable) Implementing industrial methodologies and organizational change, climate, leadership, competencies, and skills.'}]

Título: Company Data Analyst with English language
Descripción: Acerca del empleo About ISI Emerging Markets Group: ISI is a truly international business with over 500 employees based across 18 locations. We have a proud 30-year history as the leading provider of data, analysis and research on the world’s fastest growing and highest potential growth markets. We support our clients by anticipating their needs and providing them with expert advice and access to the information they require to make smarter business decisions. This includes macroeconomic data, research and analysis on companies, industries and countries.  For more information, please check out our website: www.isimarkets.com  Working for us: Our culture is purposed around our people, and we pride ourselves on supporting our employees to be the best they can be. Working for us will mean being part of a supportive and highly professional environment. The Company operates a hybrid working model of 3 days in the office and 2 days from home, and additionally 4 weeks a year you can work from any location that you choose.  Now, we are seeking a talented professional to be recruited on a full-time position in our Global Database Team.  The Role: This role is responsible for maintenance of the company database, industry, financial markets, and macroeconomic information on EMIS for Colombia. The Company Data Analyst will be responsible for properly addressing feedbacks coming from clients regarding company and financial related information. You will be expected to provide necessary support to sales and customer support, ensuring they are equipped to serve our customers/prospects.  Key Responsibilities: Maintenance and updating of the company database for Colombia. Updating of company profiles according to the schedule based on the predefined criteria. Manual uploading, updating and quality control of financial statements. Strict monitoring of financial data releases. Where applicable, creation of company profiles and manual collection of financial statements to maintain an up-to-date reasonable set of companies in the respective product(s). Responding to customers and sales team requests related to company and industry data. Close cooperation with Product Manager for Colombia in integrating new datasets and developing new functionalities.  Qualifications: Academic degree in Economics or Finance Good knowledge of financial concepts and financial statement reporting formats. Sound knowledge of the stock market, top companies, and industries in Colombia Excellent command of English language Experience in using Excel application Previous experience in data analysis is considered as a plus Experience in using MySql is considered as an advantage  Skills, Knowledge and Abilities: Rigorous attention to details Well informed, analytical thinking during problem solving Able to do complicated data-mining Ability to work well in a multinational team and strong organizational skills are essential Independent and be able to work under pressure and tight schedules Good communication skills  What We Offer: Full time employment contract Supportive and friendly environment in an international team with a global outreach Long term career development opportunities Work-life balance Competitive compensation package  How to Apply: If you are looking for the different opportunity, together with interesting and challenging projects, please, do not hesitate to send your resume in English. All job applicants will be treated with strict confidentiality. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted. Applicants from diverse backgrounds and underrepresented groups are encouraged to apply.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo  Posición Titulo posición: Analista Comercial Ubicación: Bogotá, Colombia Tipo de trabajo: Permanent Acerca del rol  Nuestro equipo:  Manejo, reporte y análisis de las cifras de venta, inventarios, cartera correspondiente a la base de toma de decisiones del área de ventas de la compañía.  Principales Responsabilidades:  Gestión de información: Reunir y administrar información para la toma de decisiones estratégicas, además de encontrar por medio de la información oportunidades para la compañía y para el cliente. Seguimiento a ventas e inventarios Comunicación con diferentes áreas de negocio Participación en reuniones comerciales, de activación y ejecución Manejo de cuotas de venta Conocimiento de P&L, provisiones, notas crédito y facturas Manejo de bases de datos y reportes a diferentes áreas de la compañía Control y seguimiento diario de la venta (de bruto a neto) Acerca de tí Experiencia: Pregrado, graduado en adm de empresas, finanzas, negocios o afines Compentencias técnicas: +2 años de experiencia en manejo de bases de datos, reportes, excel Educación: Excel avanzado, análisis de cifras. Idiomas: Inglés deseado pero no necesario Persigue el progreso, descubre lo extraordinario  Lo mejor está ahí afuera. Mejores medicamentos, mejores resultados, mejor ciencia. Pero el progreso no sucede sin las personas - personas de diferentes orígenes, en diferentes lugares, haciendo diferentes roles, todos unidos por una cosa: un deseo de hacer que los milagros sucedan. Así que, seamos esas personas. En Sanofi, brindamos igualdad de oportunidades a todos independientemente de su raza, color, ascendencia, religión, sexo, origen nacional, orientación sexual, edad, ciudadanía, estado civil, capacidad, identidad de género o estado de veterano. ¡Ve nuestro video ALL IN y nuestras acciones de Equidad e Inclusión en sanofi.com!  At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues, patients and customers. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people, their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all.

Título: REOPENING: OPERATIONAL CELL4-BASED HEALTH ADVISOR 4 (BASED IN BOGOTÁ)
Descripción: Acerca del empleo GENERAL OBJECTIVE AND JOB ENVIROMENT MSF OCBA Strategic Plan 2020-2023 strongly reasserts the commitment to assist populations affected by violence and to respond to emergencies, prioritizing those where MSF can have the biggest impact and be more relevant. Community engagement strategies, active listening and involvement of patients and communities in the design, monitoring and implementation of our programs will become a cornerstone of our action. The main objective of the Health Advisor position is to define and orient the OCBA medical strategy in the assigned Latin American and African countries, related to assist populations affected by Conflicts, Epidemics and Other Situations of Violence (OSV), and with regards to transversal areas like internal displacement and transcontinental migration, sexual violence, forced disappearance, urban violence, civil unrest, or torture. Thus, provision of quality medical care, mental health, comprehensive care for survivors of sexual violence and ill treatment, and safe abortion care are crucial in the cell portfolio, where community-based interventions will bring proximity to the most vulnerable. He/she is hierarchically accountable to the Operations Manager of Cell4 (RECO4), while functionally linked to the Head of the Operational Medical Unit, bridge between Operations and Medical Departments. MAIN RESPONSABILITIES AND TASKS To lead the innovation of medical strategies associated to Other Situations of Violence (OSV) Detect opportunities and propose innovative solutions to enrich medical response in OSV contexts within Latin America missions or in other contexts, including continuum of care through pre-hospital, mobile clinics, and distance care by use of social media/phone. Coordinate and consolidate medical referents support according to context. Incorporate strategic advice to develop medical referents support. Contribute to potentiate OSV networking, including MSF entities in Latin America. Contribute to develop collaboration with regional medical resources. Provide strategic and technical support to field teams in the Cell portfolio Collaborate with and give medical-operational support to the teams in the field in all phases of the project cycle (design of project proposal, planning, implementation, monitoring and evaluation, project re-orientation, expansion or closure), for regular, exploratory, and emergency missions. Define and justify the medical strategy of the projects within portfolio, ensuring it is aligned with both Operations and Medical Dept’s objectives. Assist in establishing networks with national health actors and medical academia. Support missions with medical advice when drafting the annual planning of the projects, in close collaboration with the rest of the members of his/her Cell and the support of the Medical Department. Provide medical-operational support to the assigned portfolio, considering operational orientations and the input from support services. Support emergencies when needed, to ensure effectiveness of our response. Promote cross-fertilization between missions/projects and contribute to capitalize cell portfolio experiences that can contribute to MSF know-how. Contribute to create and sustain inter-mission medical support platforms. Supervise and support implementation of policies and plans Ensure that the organization’s medical principles, guidelines and policies are implemented, as well as the recommendations mentioned in the different medical evaluations. Identify, report on, and challenge situations in which their implementation is not viable or may hinder the achievement of operational objectives. Ensure compliance to Medical Local Purchase Policy in all cell missions, including validation of Medical Orders by TESACO. Contribute to implementation of the annual operational plan in the projects within portfolio, according to medical policies. Follow up projects and support reporting Analyze the fulfilment of operational and medical objectives, and feed medical-operational monitoring and analysis. Follow up of the achievement of the general objectives and expected results of the projects in the medical area through field visits and technical reports. Analyze and follow up through managerial dashboard of the key medical performance indicators generated at mission level (HMIS). Support Mission Coordination Teams, with focus on Mission Medical Coordination Team, on analysis and monitoring of operational and medical objectives of their mission. Internal communication/training Carry out medical operational briefings and debriefings of all members of Mission Coordination Teams. Carry out technical briefings and debriefings of Medical Coordinators, Deputy Medical Coordinators and PMRs in his/her Cell, involving the technical Referents of the Medical Department when needed. Participate in internal and external courses/information sessions imparted by MSFE/OCBA or other entities in agreement with his/her corresponding RECO. Maintain good networking and exchange of information with MSF entities and medical partners in the region like BRAMU, CAMINO or other Health Advisors. Promote and support exchange of information between medical platforms currently functioning in the cell portfolio. Others This position is member and contributes to the TESACOs Platform; upon request and according to availability, represents the Platform providing input and guidance to strategies/dossiers. Manage the communication channels with the teams in the field and/or the Medical Department for issues that affect assigned portfolio. Consult support services for sparring and as technical content providers when needed. Organize regular exchanges with other operational units managing different portfolios and other relevant stakeholders. Agree with the Medical Department and provide support/recommendations on any operational research and surveys conducted in the field. Participate in the medical on-call system in HQ according to schedule. Participate in the operational back-ups as per need. Ensure that knowledge management policies are implemented at his/her level of responsibility (e.g. ensure that the history of the projects with regards to technical aspects is preserved). Provide input, review and approve external medical advocacy reports. SELECTION CRITERIA Health/medical physician having a good knowledge of health management of humanitarian projects, knowledge of public health, mental health and epidemiology. Experience of minimum 2 years in field medical-humanitarian projects. MSF experience is mandatory. Previously experience as Medical Coordinator and/or Head of Mission in MSF or a similar humanitarian organization is highly valued. Fluent in English and Spanish, French or Portuguese are an asset. Advanced knowledge of Windows setting as a user (mainly Word and Excel). Availability to travel frequently and on short notice. Flexibility with working hours. CONDITIONS Position will be based in Bogotá at the Médecins Sans Frontières OCBA Cell office with frequent travelling and visits to the field projects abroad (aprox. 25 %). Desirable commitment with the position of min. 3 years. Full time position. Salary conditions and secondary benefits (subject to MSF-OCBA Rewards Policy in Colombia). Starting date: January 2023. HOW TO APPLY To apply, please submit your CV and cover letter: https://careers.msf-applications.org/job-invite/7305/ Closing date: December 11th, 2022, 23:59 CET (Central European Time).  MSF is committed to achieving workforce diversity in terms of gender, race, nationality and culture. Individuals from minority groups, indigenous groups and persons with disabilities are encouraged to apply. We are committed to achieving a balanced gender distribution and therefore encourage women to apply. All applications will be treated with the strictest confidence. MSF provides a work environment that reflects the values of gender equality, teamwork, integrity and a healthy balance of work and life. MSF does not tolerate sexual exploitation and abuse, any kind of harassment, including sexual harassment and discrimination. All selected candidates will, therefore, undergo reference checks. Médecins Sans Frontieres, as a responsible employer, under article 38 of “Ley de Integración Social del Minusválido de 1982 (LISMI)” invite those persons with a recognized disability and with an interest in the humanitarian area to apply for the above-mentioned position.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Location: Bogotá, Colombia  Mode of Work: Hybrid  Are you excited by challenges? Do you enjoy working in a fast-paced, international, and dynamic environment which contributes to drive the energy transition? Then now is the time to join Quorum Software, a rapidly growing technology & professional services solutions company and industry leader in energy transformation.  Quorum Software is the world's largest provider of digital technology focused solely on business workflows that empower the energy industry. Throughout every region of the globe, customers rely on Quorum's proven innovation and unmatched global expertise to streamline business operations and make data-driven decisions that optimize profitability and growth. Our industry-leading solutions are transforming energy companies across the entire value chain, helping visionary leaders evolve their organizations into modern energy companies.  Overview  The Cloud and Automation Engineer is responsible for the facilitation of communication, collaboration, and integration between operations personnel, software engineering to rapidly produce results for cloud products and resources.  Responsibilities Experience deploying, managing, and supporting applications in both IaaS and PaaS landscapes Experience migrating existing monolithic applications to cloud-friendly architectures Has a handle on security/compliance standards and best practices Is used to and expects to support infrastructure and applications in a 24/7 environment Is well versed in infrastructure as code and automation techniques Understands and champions the benefit of a vendor-agnostic approach to infrastructure and application management Collaborate with others to design & proof of concept new cloud offerings to solve business & technical challenges Lead meetings to update the team using cloud dashboards regarding infrastructure metrics & costs Drive audit & evidence collection for infrastructure for security & compliance And other duties as assigned.  Requirements Experience with the following: Public Cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP) Infrastructure-as-Code tooling (Ansible, Terraform, ARM templates) Scripting (Powershell) Fluent in English, both written and verbal  Additional Details Background Check: The successful candidate will need to successfully complete the following clearances: Criminal History Check, Education Verification, Employment Verification, Driver’s License Verification and Passport/ID validation. Visa Sponsorship: Employment eligibility to work with Quorum Software in Colombia is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for this position. The successful candidate will be required to ensure they maintain and renew any visas or permits that grant employment eligibility where applicable. Current professional card or registration in Colombia (if applicable): The successful candidate will be required to present their professional card or registration information if the role is deemed to be regulated. Onboarding Medical: The successful candidate will be required to undergo an onboarding medical examination prior to commencement of employment, in accordance with Colombian legislation.  Please Submit your CV/Resumé in English  About Quorum Software  Quorum Software connects people and information across the energy value chain. Twenty years ago, we built the first software for gas plant accountants. Pipeline operators came next, followed by land administrators, pumpers, and planners. Since 1998, Quorum has helped thousands of energy workers with business workflows that optimize profitability and growth. Our vision for the future connects the global energy ecosystem through cloud-first software, data standards, and integration. The trusted source of decision-ready data for 1,800+ companies, Quorum Software makes the essential connections that let us work better together in the connected energy workplace. For more information, visit quorumsoftware.com.  Diversity Statement: At Quorum, we are committed to fostering, cultivating and preserving a culture of diversity, equity and inclusion. We want to be the place where a diverse pool of talented people join us, stay with us and do their best work. With a diverse team of employees, we grow and learn better together. The collective sum of the individual differences, life experiences, knowledge, innovation, self-expression, and talent that our employees invest in their work represents not only part of our culture, but our reputation and our achievements. We are fully focused on equality and believe deeply in diversity of race, gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, national origin and all the other characteristics that make us unique. We have a DEI committee focused on Culture, Advocacy and Talent, have company-wide Unconscious Bias training and more.  Quorum Business Solutions and Quorum Software are Equal Opportunity Employers. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.  Those applicants requiring reasonable accommodation to the application and/or interview process should notify a member of the Human Resources Department
Descripción (inglés): Location: Bogotá, Colombia  Mode of Work: Hybrid  Are you excited by challenges? Do you enjoy working in a fast-paced, international, and dynamic environment which contributes to drive the energy transition? Then now is the time to join Quorum Software, a rapidly growing technology & professional services solutions company and industry leader in energy transformation.  Quorum Software is the world's largest provider of digital technology focused solely on business workflows that empower the energy industry. Throughout every region of the globe, customers rely on Quorum's proven innovation and unmatched global expertise to streamline business operations and make data-driven decisions that optimize profitability and growth. Our industry-leading solutions are transforming energy companies across the entire value chain, helping visionary leaders evolve their organizations into modern energy companies.  Overview  The Cloud and Automation Engineer is responsible for the facilitation of communication, collaboration, and integration between operations personnel, software engineering to rapidly produce results for cloud products and resources.  Responsibilities Experience deploying, managing, and supporting applications in both IaaS and PaaS landscapes Experience migrating existing monolithic applications to cloud-friendly architectures Has a handle on security/compliance standards and best practices Is used to and expects to support infrastructure and applications in a 24/7 environment Is well versed in infrastructure as code and automation techniques Understands and champions the benefit of a vendor-agnostic approach to infrastructure and application management Collaborate with others to design & proof of concept new cloud offerings to solve business & technical challenges Lead meetings to update the team using cloud dashboards regarding infrastructure metrics & costs Drive audit & evidence collection for infrastructure for security & compliance And other duties as assigned.  Requirements Experience with the following: Public Cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP) Infrastructure-as-Code tooling (Ansible, Terraform, ARM templates) Scripting (Powershell) Fluent in English, both written and verbal  Additional Details Background Check: The successful candidate will need to successfully complete the following clearances: Criminal History Check, Education Verification, Employment Verification, Driver’s License Verification and Passport/ID validation. Visa Sponsorship: Employment eligibility to work with Quorum Software in Colombia is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for this position. The successful candidate will be required to ensure they maintain and renew any visas or permits that grant employment eligibility where applicable. Current professional card or registration in Colombia (if applicable): The successful candidate will be required to present their professional card or registration information if the role is deemed to be regulated. Onboarding Medical: The successful candidate will be required to undergo an onboarding medical examination prior to commencement of employment, in accordance with Colombian legislation.  Please Submit your CV/Resumé in English  About Quorum Software  Quorum Software connects people and information across the energy value chain. Twenty years ago, we built the first software for gas plant accountants. Pipeline operators came next, followed by land administrators, pumpers, and planners. Since 1998, Quorum has helped thousands of energy workers with business workflows that optimize profitability and growth. Our vision for the future connects the global energy ecosystem through cloud-first software, data standards, and integration. The trusted source of decision-ready data for 1,800+ companies, Quorum Software makes the essential connections that let us work better together in the connected energy workplace. For more information, visit quorumsoftware.com.  Diversity Statement: At Quorum, we are committed to fostering, cultivating and preserving a culture of diversity, equity and inclusion. We want to be the place where a diverse pool of talented people join us, stay with us and do their best work. With a diverse team of employees, we grow and learn better together. The collective sum of the individual differences, life experiences, knowledge, innovation, self-expression, and talent that our employees invest in their work represents not only part of our culture, but our reputation and our achievements. We are fully focused on equality and believe deeply in diversity of race, gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, national origin and all the other characteristics that make us unique. We have a DEI committee focused on Culture, Advocacy and Talent, have company-wide Unconscious Bias training and more.  Quorum Business Solutions and Quorum Software are Equal Opportunity Employers. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.  Those applicants requiring reasonable accommodation to the application and/or interview process should notify a member of the Human Resources Department

Descripción: Acerca del empleo We are excited to announce that Camino Financial is growing! We are looking for some energetic and excited individuals looking to join our community! We are seeking a Backend Developer.  We’re a financial technology start-up seeking a Backend Developer responsible for diving into backend code and completing tech infrastructure reviews in coordination with the Engineering and Product teams. Become fluent with the organization's technical infrastructure, applications, and business domain to become a subject matter expert and source of knowledge for the Engineering team.  The ideal candidate will be a team player who is extremely hard-working and responsible; someone who is digitally savvy, self-motivated, resourceful, culturally aware, and shows enthusiasm for the business. To be consider for this position you should meet most of the next requirements:   At least four years as Backend Developer. English B2 or superior! At least four years using Python AWS Experience MySQL / Postgres At least 3 years of experience with Unix/Linux systems with scripting experience   Responsibilities  Flag technical challenges early to Product stakeholders, while recommending best practices and potential approaches to tackling these challenges head-on. Hold a high bar on quality through tests, PR reviews and engineering best practices. Push for simplicity and clean code. Collaborate closely across development disciplines to coordinate, and in some cases drive feature functionality and implementation. Build and maintain microservice based APIs to support business needs   Why Join Camino Financial? There are MANY reasons but here are just four:  Mission-driven company serving underbanked communities High-tech firm well-positioned to exponentially grow and disrupt the financial service sector The passionate, young and experienced management team and board of advisors Venture-backed start-up incubated at Harvard Business School   Don’t take our word for it, check out what the press says about us:  CNN Money: This Startup Helps Latino Businesses Get Funding (http://money.cnn.com/2016/03/16/smallbusiness/camino-financial-latino-business/index.html?iid=hp-grid-dom) NBC: What I've Learned: Growing Latino Businesses When Banks Won't (http://www.nbcnews.com/news/latino/what-i-ve-learned-growing-latino-businesses-when-banks-won-n504541) Univision: Los Gemelos Salas, Exitosos Empresarios Hispanos (http://www.univision.com/los-angeles/kmex/los-gemelos-salas-exitosos-empresarios-hispanos-video)   Looking forward to receiving your application. Camino Financial is an online finance company offering business loans and solutions to help small businesses grow. The company primarily lends to Latino-owned small businesses with unmet credit demand of $ 6.8 billion. As a tech-driven company, Camino Financial has created an online credit and educational experience that helps businesses improve their financial performance and graduate into cheaper and longer-term loans. Check out Camino Financial in the news!
