Descripción: Acerca del empleo Con una excepcional trayectoria, iuvity entrega soluciones innovadoras y seguras a través de canales digitales a entidades financieras en América Latina que desean transformar positivamente la vida de sus clientes. En iuvity buscamos humanizar la relación entre las personas y su mundo financiero entregando soluciones de canales digitales a las entidades financieras que quieran llegar a sus usuarios con una propuesta diseñada para facilitar su uso y adopción. Con una fuerte presencia regional, más de 10.000.000 de usuarios y 4000 millones de transacciones en el último año cubrimos todo el espectro de las necesidades de canales digitales que tienen las instituciones financieras.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'With an exceptional trajectory, iuvity delivers innovative and secure solutions through digital channels to financial institutions in Latin America that want to positively transform the lives of their clients. At iuvity we seek to humanize the relationship between people and their financial world by delivering digital channel solutions to financial institutions that want to reach their users with a proposal designed to facilitate their use and adoption. With a strong regional presence, more than 10,000,000 users and 4000 million transactions in the last year cover the full spectrum of digital channel needs that financial institutions have.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo El Analista de Compras gestiona de una manera eficiente y eficaz las adquisiciones de los bienes y ervicios que la empresa requiere para el desarrollo normal de sus actividades. Debe atender cada solicitud y monitorear el recibo de los bienes y servicios adquiridos.  Las responsabilidades son las siguientes y no se limitan a:  Garantizar la adquisición de los bienes y servicios necesarios para la operación de la empresa, de manera oportuna, con la calidad y cantidad requerida y con las mejores condiciones de negociación. Buscar permanentemente proveedores confiables que permitan cumplir con los requerimientos y mantener un contacto oportuno con los proveedores Experiencia en negociación con proveedores fuera del país Manejo de proveedores de Marketing, publicidad, ferias, material POP Evaluar los costos de los elementos a comprar mediante análisis comparativos de las cotizaciones recibidas de los proveedores Gestionar aprobación de las cotizaciones con las áreas usuarias  Habilidades y conocimientos:  Estudios: Profesional en Administración de Empresas, Ingeniería Industrial o carreras afines. 2 años de experiencia en el área de Compras. Conocimiento en manejo de MS Office, con conocimiento avanzado en Excel. Manejo de inglés intermedio (B2)
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'The Procurement Analyst efficiently and effectively manages the acquisitions of goods and services that the company requires for the normal development of its activities. It must comply with each request and monitor the receipt of goods and services acquired. The responsibilities are as follows and are not limited to: Ensuring the acquisition of goods and services necessary for the operation of the company, in a timely manner, with the quality and quantity required and with the best trading conditions. Permanently seek reliable suppliers that allow compliance with the requirements and maintain timely contact with suppliers Experience in trading with suppliers outside the country Management of marketing suppliers, advertising, fairs, POP material Assess the costs of items to be purchased by means of comparative analyses of quotations received from suppliers Manage approval of quotations with user areas Skills and knowledge: Studies: Professional in Business Administration, Industrial Engineering or related careers. 2 years of experience in the area of Purchasing. MS Office management knowledge, with advanced knowledge in Excel. Management of intermediate English (B2)'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™  Royal DSM es una empresa global, “purpose-led”, con base científica y activa en los campos de la nutrición, la salud y la vida sostenible. El propósito de DSM es crear vidas más brillantes para todos. DSM afronta con sus productos y soluciones algunos de los retos mundiales actuales más importantes, a la vez que logra prosperidad económica y valor medioambiental y social para todas las partes interesadas (clientes, empleados, accionistas y la sociedad en general). DSM ofrece soluciones innovadoras para la nutrición humana y animal, higiene personal y fragancias, productos sanitarios, productos ecológicos y aplicaciones, y nueva movilidad y conectividad. DSM y sus empresas asociadas arrojan un volumen de ventas netas anual de aproximadamente 10 000 millones de euros y cuentan con unos 23.000 empleados. La empresa se fundó en 1902 y cotiza en Euronext Ámsterdam. Más información en www.dsm.com.  Analista de Planeamiento El reto:  Garantizar el suministro oportuno de materias primas (right product, right quantity,right timing and at the right place) para soportar el proceso de ventas de la división HNC de Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela y Guatemala que hacen parte de la región Norte de Latinoamerica.  La posición:  Hacer seguimiento al estado de los pedidos de materias primas y fechas de entrega a la planta de cada país. Solicitar aprobación a Brasil y casa matriz para compra de materias primas que se encuentran por fuera del forecast o por incremento repentino en la venta de productos y oportunidades de mercado. Garantizar actualización de datos y generar mejora contínua a las reuniones periodicas de Sales and Operations Planning (S&OP – junta de Supply Review), con las diferentes áreas de la compañía; igualmente hacer seguimiento a los pendientes y planes de acción generados en la misma. Tener en cuenta la necesidad de recibir el plan de ventas (baseline) de la junta de Demand Review, evaluar posibles restricciones en la junta de Supply Review, preparar datos, escenarios y posibles decisiones para la junta de Executive Review, a fines de garantizar el proceso adecuado de ventas, evitando riesgos para el cumplimiento del plan del negocio y aprovechando las oportunidades con el mejor costo-beneficio. Apoyar y coordinar la presentación general de Supply review de la región Andina y/o Latam North, en donde se incluyen los indicadores y restricciones de cada ciclo por lo menos una vez al mes, elaborar y compartir el acta de la reunión a todos los participantes. Monitorear el estado de los inventarios de materias primas obsoletas y solicitar las acciones correspondientes a cada responsable, elaborar periódicamente un reporte donde se describen las materias primas vencidas o próximas a vencer, coordinando acciones multidisciplinares de overstocks, non-moving, blocked stocks, scraps, etc. Garantizar el adecuado nivel de inventarios tanto de materias primas como de materiales de empaque de los paises bajo su responsabilidad, así mismo, actualizar el listado de materias primas vigentes. Conectar la cadena de suministros con el área de negocios. Proponer oportunidades de mejora relacionadas a todo el Supply Chain, principalmente a lo que tiene relación al proceso de S&OP y a planeación diferenciada de materiales. Garantizar el cumplimiento de todas las metas relacionadas al equipo de Supply Chain (OTIF, Inventario, Write-Off, etc…) Dar de alta nuevos productos de la división HNC en SAP P48 y gestionar la creación en APO y SAP IBP cuando sea necesario. Velar por la correcta configuración del Maestro de Materiales de SAP (parámetros básicos) de los productos requeridos de los países de Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela y Guatemala, de la Division de HNC y F&B, verificar en el sistema SAP la configuración de los parámetros de cada una de las materias primas, premezclas intermedias, material de empaque y si se requiere ajustar, corregir o modificar para que funcione adecuadamente en la toda la cadena de suministros. Gestionar el cambio (pase-in/pase-out) de materias primas en los diferentes niveles de la organización (producción, comercial, sistemas). Recibir desde SAP IBP el listado de BoM (Bill of Materials), validando la integridad de los datos y evaluando las necesidades de material para replenishment en SAP o sistemas equivalentes, generar requisiciones a través del sistema P48 en SAP e indicar al área de Compras la cantidad y fecha de necesidad de los materiales en la planta de Ecuador, Peru, Venezuela y Guatemala e informar al solicitante el estado del pedido. El ideal:  Profesional universitario en Ingeniería, Administración, Matemática, Estadística, Contabilidad, Finanzas, o áreas afines Inglés intermedio/avanzado Conocimiento avanzado de excel (tablas dinamicas, macros, uso de formulas para gran cantidad de datos) SAP y Power BI Al menos dos años de experiencia en áreas de planeación de producción o logística de materiales o Comercio Exterior La Compensación:  Trabajar para DSM significa una oportunidad de contribuir realmente a mejorar la vida de las personas resolviendo los retos presentes en el mundo de hoy. Trabajos desafiantes, oportunidades de crecimiento y un ambiente inspirador permiten que puedas alcanzar tu desarrollo personal. DSM reconoce que el éxito continuo de una compañía depende del desarrollo frecuente y compromiso de nuestros colaboradores buscando una política de remuneración justa y competitiva, reconociendo las competencias y desempeño individual y del equipo.  Procedimiento y Contacto:  ¿Estas interesado en esta posición por favor aplica en linea a través del portal de carreras (www.dsm.com/careers).  La revisión de referencias es parte del Proceso de Reclutamiento y Selección de DSM. Serás contactado posteriormente si estos datos son requeridos.  Royal DSM es un empleador que promueve la igualdad de oportunidades y la discriminación positiva, y todos los solicitantes cualificados serán considerados para el puesto sin distinción de raza, color, religión, sexo, nación de origen, edad, estado de veterano protegido, estado de persona cualificada con una discapacidad o cualquier otra característica protegida por la ley.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Our Purpose  We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.  Job Title  Customer Technical Services Analyst II-1  Overview Provides service support for businesses (B2B) that have product and service agreements with Mastercard Responsible for overall satisfaction of these business customers through knowledge of their business and products Builds long-term customer relationships and ensures timely response and resolution of issues The applicant will be responsible for diagnosing, communicating, and resolving production incidents The position will analyze issues on MasterCard applications to integrate a variety of systems and technologies to solve business problems. Do you enjoy finding creative solutions to complex problems and working with others to implement them according to MasterCard and customer business needs? Have you provided product technical support on new technology at a global scale? Is leading edge technology and being part of a Global company exciting to you?  Role Enhances customer experience by providing high level technical customer service and support across a diverse and complex array of customer inquiries Identify and analyze processing incidents to communicate with both customers and internal partners Serves as a subject matter expert accountable for analyzing, supporting, and troubleshooting customer technical support inquires Ensures that customer resolution efforts adhere to Mastercard standard processes and procedures Represents the voice of the customer to product line, application team and shared services group Support to identify opportunities for improvements with customer experience at the forefront Participate in the departmental processes to integrate new products and acquisitions into existing B2B support models Provide documentation of current processes, improvements to existing processes, and apply existing support knowledge to build out support models for new products and services  All About You Fluent both in English and Spanish Experience troubleshooting and contributing to the delivery of holistic resolutions to complex technical inquiries Experience serving as the go-to person for delivering high quality technical resolutions in a timely manner Candidate must have the ability to negotiate, resolve and present to internal/external customers. Candidate must have technical experience along with the ability to absorb and apply operational information to business solutions. Knowledge of the payments model including Authorization, Clearing, and Settlement is preferred Financial acumen and understanding of the four-party process model is preferred Collaborate with others in support of products, processes, and problem resolution. Ability to interact with customers as well as MasterCard management to articulate key performance indicators and action plans.  Corporate Security Responsibility  Responsibilities  All activities involving access to Mastercard assets, information, and networks comes with an inherent risk to the organization and, therefore, it is expected that every person working for, or on behalf of, Mastercard is responsible for information security and must Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices; Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed; Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.

Do you enjoy finding creative solutions to complex problems and working with others to implement them according to MasterCard and customer business needs? Have you provided product technical support on new technology at a global scale? Is leading edge technology and being part of a Global company exciting to you?  Role Enhances customer experience by providing high level technical customer service and support across a diverse and complex array of customer inquiries Identify and analyze processing incidents to communicate with both customers and internal partners Serves as a subject matter expert accountable for analyzing, supporting, and troubleshooting customer technical support inquires Ensures that customer resolution efforts adhere to Mastercard standard processes and procedures Represents the voice of the customer to product line, application team and shared services group Support to identify opportunities for improvements with customer experience at the forefront Participate in the departmental processes to integrate new products and acquisitions into existing B2B support models Provide documentation of current processes, improvements to existing processes, and apply existing support knowledge to build out support models for new products and services  All About You Fluent both in English and Spanish Experience troubleshooting and contributing to the delivery of holistic resolutions to complex technical inquiries Experience serving as the go-to person for delivering high quality technical resolutions in a timely manner Candidate must have the ability to negotiate, resolve and present to internal/external customers. Candidate must have technical experience along with the ability to absorb and apply operational information to business solutions. Knowledge of the payments model including Authorization, Clearing, and Settlement is preferred Financial acumen and understanding of the four-party process model is preferred Collaborate with others in support of products, processes, and problem resolution. Ability to interact with customers as well as MasterCard management to articulate key performance indicators and action plans.  Corporate Security Responsibility  Responsibilities  All activities involving access to Mastercard assets, information, and networks comes with an inherent risk to the organization and, therefore, it is expected that every person working for, or on behalf of, Mastercard is responsible for information security and must Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices; Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed; Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.

Título: Ingeniero de Campo Sector IT - Bogotá
Descripción: Acerca del empleo We Believe in Better!  We are a global information technology company that builds high-performance, security-centric solutions that can help change the world. Enhancing people’s lives through secure, reliable advanced technology is our vision.  At Unisys, we believe in better! Here, you have the opportunity to learn new skills, apply your expertise, and solve complex problems with cutting edge technologies and solutions. You are part of a global diverse team that supports you, drives change, and delivers successful results consistently.  Our associates are at the forefront of everything we do, driving our clients’ successes while giving back to communities and making this world a safer and more secure place to live and work. Our success is a direct result of the work of our people who live and breathe our Core Beliefs. Simply put, we believe in better lives. Join us!  Learn more about Unisys and our key solution offerings: Unisys, Stealth™, CloudForte®, InteliServe™  What success looks like in this role: Manejo de servidores de Linux, Windows. Manejo de sistemas de almacenamiento. Llamadas de Servicios de Transformación, instalando y dando servicio a PCs, y periféricos de PC y/o equipos electrónicos. Puede realizar instalaciones de rutina, movimientos, adiciones y cambios como parte de un equipo dirigido. Trabajos complejos de reparación de ordenadores de sobremesa y portátiles - Sustitución de unidades completas. Realiza la carga de imágenes con guión, el diagnóstico de unidades y el cambio de unidades reemplazables. Realiza la resolución de problemas mediante la ejecución de diagnósticos básicos y la sustitución de módulos básicos en PC, servidores y periféricos. Realiza actividades de mantenimiento preventivo en determinados productos según las instrucciones. Garantiza el cumplimiento de los Acuerdos de Nivel de Servicio específicos del cliente y la actualización de los tickets de incidentes y solicitudes en el sistema de tickets. Puede proporcionar soporte de manos inteligentes utilizando la realidad aumentada. Puede Mantener las existencias/el inventario en el sitio del cliente (si corresponde).  You will be successful in this role if you have: Se requiere un título profesional en Ingeniera de sistemas, telecomunicaciones, telemática y/o afines. 2 años de experiencia práctica en la reparación de portátiles y ordenadores de sobremesa Conocimiento general de hardware y software de escritorio, incluyendo conocimientos básicos de las aplicaciones de Microsoft  Importante: Experiencia en reparación de laptop y Pc de escritorio, tener capacidad de plataformar e instalar sistemas operativos.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Este rol será responsable de:  Asegurar las propuestas de valor para los productos del pasivo, que se comuniquen adecuadamente y sea tangible para los clientes  Trabajar en sinergia con el área de BI y Marketing para comunicar los beneficios de los Productos del Pasivo. Hacer seguimiento a la estrategia de apertura dentro de los diferentes canales (Digital, Oficinas, Call center) Atender y resolver las solicitudes de las diferentes áreas (especialmente canales) respecto al producto Identificar áreas de mejora en el producto e implementar las mejoras y nuevos atributos. Impulsar el uso y activación de productos del Pasivo. Liderar proyectos e iniciativas de los Productos del Pasivo.  Conocimientos específicos Experiencia en diseño de estrategias de producto Excel intermedio Conocimiento del ciclo de vida de producto Experiencia en productos digitales  Requisitos Ingeniero Industrial, Administrador, Economista, y carreras afines con alta capacidad analítica, experiencia en estrategias de producto o productos digitales. Experiencia laborar mínimo de 2 años en adelante en áreas de producto o similares.  Beneficios Condiciones Oferta: Tiempo libre y flexible modalidad de trabajo hibrida Beneficios propios del grupo (Se revisan a fondo en el proceso)
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'This role will be responsible for: Ensuring value proposals for passive products, which are communicated appropriately and be tangible for customers Working in synergy with the BI and Marketing area to communicate the benefits of Passive Products. Monitoring the opening strategy within different channels (Digital, Offices, Call center) Attending and resolving requests from different areas (especially channels) regarding the product Identify areas of improvement in the product and implementing improvements and new attributes. Promoting the use and activation of Passive products. Leading projects and initiatives of Passive Products. Specific knowledge Experience in product strategy design Intermediate Excel Product Life Cycle Knowledge Digital Product Experience Requirements Industrial Engineer, Administrator, Economist, and related careers with high analytical capacity, experience in product strategies or digital products. Experience working at least 2 years onward in product or similar areas. Benefits Conditions Offer: Free and flexible working mode Hybrid Benefits of the group (They are thoroughly reviewed in the process)'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo We are a digitally native technology services company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use some of the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspect.  Right now, we are looking for Cloud Engineers to join our Cloud Studio at Globant!  This Studio combines the best cloud technologies, continuous integration and continuous delivery practices along with unique Globant capabilities to facilitate new and more efficient way of doing business.  You will get the chance to: Work with professionals who have created some of the most revolutionary solutions in their fields. Make an impact. Work in large-scale projects globally. Develop your career in our Studios. Each Studio represents deep pockets of expertise on the latest technologies and trends and delivers tailored solutions focused on specific challenges. Develop your career within an industry or multiple industries. Work in the city you want, and be nourished by cultural exchanges. Be empowered to choose your career path: we have more than 600 simultaneous projects, so you can choose where and how to work. Be part of an agile pod. Driven by a culture of self-regulated teamwork, each team -or POD- works directly with our customers with a full maturity path that evolves as they increase speed, quality and autonomy.  What will help you succeed: Believe and love what you do. Build bridges & open doors. Enjoy solving problems. Being capable of taking a step back to look at a bigger picture. Intermediate or upper English skills. Solid Linux/Unix administration skills. Strong Puppet or Chef experience (either for Configuration Management and/or Continuous Delivery) and integration with virtual environments (Vagrant, VirtualBox, AWS EC2). A development background and a strong scripting knowledge.  At Globant we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment makes us stronger. We encourage people to have an inclusive spirit as our global footprint expands. We seek to generate a place of inspiration and growth for everyone. A safe space, based on equity as a value, where everyone's careers can be promoted and developed in the same way. There is no innovation without diversity and there is no improvement without plurality.  This job be filled from Anywhere in Colombia  Are you ready?  Job Segment: Developer, Engineer, Computer Science, Java, Testing, Technology, Engineering, Mobile, IOS; Android, Cloud, DevOps  Job Segment: Engineer, Equity, Linux, Unix, Cloud, Engineering, Finance, Technology

Título: Profesional en Ingeniería Mecanica Recién Egresado - Equipos Estáticos y Maquinas
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Description  Sobre nosotros  En Technip Energies, creemos en un mañana mejor y creemos que podemos hacer que el mañana sea mejor. Con aproximadamente 15.000 mujeres y hombres talentosos, somos una empresa de ingeniería y tecnología global y líder, con una visión clara para acelerar la transición energética. Diseñar y entregar soluciones energéticas de valor agregado, es lo que hacemos.  Si comparte nuestra determinación de impulsar la transición hacia un futuro bajo en carbono, este podría ser el trabajo para usted. Actualmente estamos buscando Profesional en Ingenieria Mecanica Recién Egresado para Equipos Estaticos y Maquinas, que reportará directamente al Jefe de Departamento de Equipos Estaticos y Maquinas, para unirse a nuestro equipo con sede en Bogotá, Colombia.  Acerca del trabajo  El Especialista de Equipos Estaticos y Maquinas I es responsable de desarrollar cálculos, diseños, especificaciones, revisión y control de planos, requisiciones de equipos y materiales para los proyectos y ofertas dentro de su área de especialidad, cumpliendo con los requerimientos técnicos, contractuales y corporativos.  Le ofrecemos no solo un trabajo, sino también un viaje inspirador en un entorno verdaderamente global donde nos unimos, para romper fronteras gracias a la innovación, la creatividad y el espíritu pionero que impulsa a nuestra gente.  Acerca de ti  Nos encantaría saber de usted si su perfil cumple con los siguientes requisitos esenciales:  Profesional en Ingeniería Mecanica recién egresado. Conocimiento en manejo de MicroStation y AutoCAD Conocimiento avanzado del programa Excel y demás herramientas de Microsoft Office. Nivel intermedio de inglés (hablado y escrito).  Estándares de inclusión  En nuestro viaje continuo para desarrollar y construir una cultura de inclusión, nos adherimos a cuatro estándares de oro de inclusión. ¿Y usted?  Desafiamos nuestros prejuicios y adoptamos la diversidad de pensamiento. Nadie tiene todos los conocimientos y soluciones, colectivamente los tenemos. Fomentamos un ambiente solidario donde las personas son respetadas, cómodas para compartir y ser escuchadas. Promovemos la escucha activa para la toma de decisiones y acciones efectivas.  ¿Qué sigue?  Fecha de inicio: lo antes posible  Una vez que reciba su solicitud de sistema, el equipo de reclutamiento evaluará y comparará sus habilidades, experiencia y equipo potencial con los requisitos del puesto. Le pedimos paciencia mientras el equipo completa el volumen de solicitudes en un plazo razonable. Verifique el progreso de su solicitud periódicamente a través de la cuenta personal del perfil de candidato creado durante su solicitud.  Lo invitamos a conocer más sobre nuestra empresa visitando www.technipenergies.com y síganos en LinkedIn , Instagram , Facebook , Twitter , Youtube para obtener actualizaciones de la empresa .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo The Cloud Practice Architect designs, develops and implements cloud-based solutions. Designs cloud architecture and completes  plans and specifications to develop solutions. Collaborates with product managers and engineers to develop specifications for new cloud based products/services, applications and solutions. Drives the rollout of cloud management platforms, evaluates its performance and implements enhancements.  Develops and enriches the product portfolio of cloud services and value-added services. Responsible for adhering to company security policies and procedures and any other relevant policies and standards as directed.  Career Level Summary Requires specialized depth and/or breadth of expertise in own job discipline or field. Leads others to solve complex problems. Works independently, with guidance in only the most complex situations. May provide functional leadership to teams or projects Critical Competencies Encourages others to listen attentively and engage with the speaker by asking appropriate open ended questions; reflects on and reiterates key points and clarifies messages to help others reach agreement. Monitors non-verbal reactions of others to identify and respond to areas of interest or concern. Ensures all viewpoints have been heard and discussed before reaching conclusions, offering guidance or asserting own views. Influences and coaches others across the business unit/function to work independently and identify areas for improvement in work processes. Encourages and motivates people to achieve high standards of excellence by consistently raising the bar and coaching others to achieve results. Sets challenging and realistic goals for others; proactively considers the business unit/function’s goals to prevent conflicts of interests and communicates goals to teams. Provides guidance and expertise to analyze data and patterns and assess the root cause of complex, non-routine problems. Collaborates with others across disciplines to brainstorm and execute solutions to the most complex, uncommon problems. Guides the execution of solutions for complex, non-routine issues; redirects solution implementation if desired results were not originally met. Creatively develops tools, visual aids and other original content to support the understanding/education of complex and technical information (e.g., legal, operational risk, and regulatory data). Guides others on the best practices and approaches for creating clear, concise and organized communication materials to convey technical concepts in a user-friendly way. Challenges others to bring fresh and creative perspective to differentiating technical communications and ensuring comprehension and ease-of-use for various audiences. Exceeds customers’ expectations by listening for unexpressed needs; connects customer needs to relevant service offerings and new technology. Leads others in resolving technical issues in a timely manner; follows up with customers to ensure satisfaction. Partners with the business to integrate new technologies into business solutions; creates and communicates a vision of the technology requirements for the future state of the business. Prioritizes workload and ensures that deadlines are successfully met; delegates or seeks additional staff when necessary. Identifies short- and long-term barriers to completing project plans and takes corrective action to meet deliverable objectives. Manages multifaceted projects or assignments, such as projects that have several separate components, with minimal error and without missing important deliverables. Key Responsibilities Other Incidental tasks related to the job, as necessary. Be the technical liaison between customers and engineering resources Provide tactical scope and work directly with the business representatives/customers to understand the requirements driving the need for a solution to be developed Communicate effectively with both business and technical colleagues throughout the course of the project Ensure that all the appropriate questions are asked and verify that nothing crucial to the success of the project is overlooked Be an AWS evangelist by educating a variety of customers on the value of AWS Help customers transition to the cloud in a high-value migration approach that leverages best of breed designs and practices delivered in an agile model. Work with customers to enable a DevOps culture and modernize operations and release strategies Establish credibility and build impactful relationships with our customers to enable them to be cloud advocates Participate in deep architectural discussions to build confidence and ensure customer success when building new, or migrating existing, applications, software and services on the AWS platform. Conduct deep-dive “hands-on” education/training sessions to transfer knowledge to customers interested in AWS and to ensure our SAs are up to date Attend and present valuable information at Industry Events Knowledge Extensive knowledge of cloud services, methodologies, best practices, and tools Knowledge of at least one other programming language (such as Node.js , Scala, Python, or Golang, etc). Knowledge of at least one modern services framework (K8S, SDWAN, Serverless, etc) Skills Builds rapport with customers by soliciting feedback proactively. Guides others to collect information and analyze complex data and business problems; identifies trends and uses data-driven insights to make recommendations. Applies knowledge of emerging technology trends and best practices to show the potential business application of technology improvements. Provides guidance in selecting the appropriate research tools, data sources and methodologies to test and/or validate hypotheses; reports departmental findings. Generic DevOps Skill Baseline Coding Scripting/ Programing language/ Configuration Management/ Container (1 or more at 100 level) Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment VCS (Git Based VSC) family with commit, branch, merge, review process Artifact Repository CI/CD tools Operating System familiar with Linux or Windows OS Cloud Skill Baseline Automation IaC CI/CD (Implement CI services -VSC, Artifacts repo, build service pipeline service) Landing Zone (Multi Account Framework) Identity Access Management (IAM) Security Networking Compute (VM, Container platform, Function) Virtual Machine workload Implement serverless solution for operational purpose Data storage, Database Configuration management Secret Management Monitoring and Logging Message Queues Education Bachelor's Degree in field related to role required. Certifications (Preferred) AWS Certifications GCP Certifications Azure Certifications CNCF Certifications Experience 8 – 11 years of experience in the field of role required. ,  About Rackspace Technology  We are the multicloud solutions experts. We combine our expertise with the world’s leading technologies — across applications, data and security — to deliver end-to-end solutions. We have a proven record of advising customers based on their business challenges, designing solutions that scale, building and managing those solutions, and optimizing returns into the future. Named a best place to work, year after year according to Fortune, Forbes and Glassdoor, we attract and develop world-class talent. Join us on our mission to embrace technology, empower customers and deliver the future.  More on Rackspace Technology  Though we’re all different, Rackers thrive through our connection to a central goal: to be a valued member of a winning team on an inspiring mission. We bring our whole selves to work every day. And we embrace the notion that unique perspectives fuel innovation and enable us to best serve our customers and communities around the globe. We welcome you to apply today and want you to know that we are committed to offering equal employment opportunity without regard to age, color, disability, gender reassignment or identity or expression, genetic information, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity status, military or veteran status, nationality, ethnic or national origin, race, religion or belief, sexual orientation, or any legally protected characteristic. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

Applies knowledge of emerging technology trends and best practices to show the potential business application of technology improvements. Provides guidance in selecting the appropriate research tools, data sources and methodologies to test and/or validate hypotheses; reports departmental findings. Generic DevOps Skill Baseline Coding Scripting/ Programing language/ Configuration Management/ Container (1 or more at 100 level) Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment VCS (Git Based VSC) family with commit, branch, merge, review process Artifact Repository CI/CD tools Operating System familiar with Linux or Windows OS Cloud Skill Baseline Automation IaC CI/CD (Implement CI services -VSC, Artifacts repo, build service pipeline service) Landing Zone (Multi Account Framework) Identity Access Management (IAM) Security Networking Compute (VM, Container platform, Function) Virtual Machine workload Implement serverless solution for operational purpose Data storage, Database Configuration management Secret Management Monitoring and Logging Message Queues Education Bachelor's Degree in field related to role required. Certifications (Preferred) AWS Certifications GCP Certifications Azure Certifications CNCF Certifications Experience 8 – 11 years of experience in the field of role required. ,  About Rackspace Technology  We are the multicloud solutions experts. We combine our expertise with the world’s leading technologies — across applications, data and security — to deliver end-to-end solutions. We have a proven record of advising customers based on their business challenges, designing solutions that scale, building and managing those solutions, and optimizing returns into the future. Named a best place to work, year after year according to Fortune, Forbes and Glassdoor, we attract and develop world-class talent. Join us on our mission to embrace technology, empower customers and deliver the future.  More on Rackspace Technology  Though we’re all different, Rackers thrive through our connection to a central goal: to be a valued member of a winning team on an inspiring mission. We bring our whole selves to work every day. And we embrace the notion that unique perspectives fuel innovation and enable us to best serve our customers and communities around the globe. We welcome you to apply today and want you to know that we are committed to offering equal employment opportunity without regard to age, color, disability, gender reassignment or identity or expression, genetic information, marital or civil partner status, pregnancy or maternity status, military or veteran status, nationality, ethnic or national origin, race, religion or belief, sexual orientation, or any legally protected characteristic. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Let’s just start with Zemoga is different ...and we hope you are too!  We are looking for an iOS developer who will be in charge of planning, architecting, and developing components and views aimed to resolve different mobile platform layers such as client/server communication (i.e API handling), UI interfaces + interaction as well as client-side business logic that could be needed within the app, everything according to the iOS development guidelines. The planning phase will also include contributing to UX design decisions to align this part with the platform capabilities.  Zemoga is the groundbreaking and industry-leading design and technology firm that was the first to offer the world’s leading brands the amazing talent from Colombia and has been doing so for over 18 years. Our teams are in the top 5% of the workforce, we have one of the highest retention rates in the industry, and we have the most comprehensive and creative benefits program in the industry. Zemoga might be the perfect place for you if you’re driven by new ideas, international travel, and working directly with the leaders of some of the smartest companies in the world.  We are a people-driven company committed to ethical business practices and are driven by the passion and creativity that is Colombia. We build better and enjoy it every step of the way.  You Will Thrive At Zemoga If You Are...can...and Have  Technical architecture (MVVM) and documentation Strong experience in unit testing Strong experience with iOS development and different form factors using Objective C and Swift. Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle. Web services integration (REST, GraphQL) in a mobile environment. Good communication skills The ability to translate Sketch and Zeplin files to iOS layouts Experience working in an Agile environment Versioned source code (GIT) A thorough understanding of OOP, and design patterns in mobile application integration.  Apply today and build better with us!  About Media.Monks  Media.Monks is on a mission to create a new future for this industry. Our vision? Build everything with a belief that changing for good comes from changing who does the work. Yep, that means you. Welcome to the party—one global, cross-cultural collective with a passion for using our skills to create better and a better world. That’s how we’re able to connect the dots between data, content, digital media, and technology from everywhere we are—a true end-to-end model. Joining the Media.Monks collective means having the opportunity to create award-winning work with some of the most gifted, focused, joyful, talents from all over the world.  At Media.Monks, you’ll be joining a highly ambitious company on a global mission to win the decade by changing the industry for good. Partner to 8 of the 10 most innovative companies in the world, Media.Monks works with established as well as up-and-coming global, regional, DTC and B2B brands, helping them own their data and build out customer ecosystems to elicit smart, efficient, high-impact engines for growth. We deliver table stakes quickly, creating cost efficiencies from day one to push up the creative effectiveness of our work with every cycle.  We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo  Coupa Software (NASDAQ: COUP), a leader in business spend management (BSM), has been certified as a “Great Place to Work” by the Great Place to Work organization. We deliver “Value as a Service” by helping our customers maximize their spend under management, achieve significant cost savings and drive profitability. Coupa provides a unified, cloud-based spend management platform that connects hundreds of organizations representing the Americas, EMEA, and APAC with millions of suppliers globally. The Coupa platform provides greater visibility into and control over how companies spend money. Customers – small, medium and large – have used the Coupa platform to bring billions of dollars in cumulative spend under management. Learn more at www.coupa.com. Read more on the Coupa Blog or follow @Coupa on Twitter.  Do you want to work for Coupa Software, the world's leading provider of cloud-based spend management solutions? We’re a company that had a successful IPO in October 2016 (NASDAQ: COUP) to fuel our innovation and growth. At Coupa, we’re building a great company that is laser focused on three core values:  1. Ensure Customer Success – Obsessive and unwavering commitment to making customers successful. 2. Focus On Results – Relentless focus on delivering results through innovation and a bias for action. 3. Strive For Excellence – Commitment to a collaborative environment infused with professionalism, integrity, passion, and accountability. Responsibilities: Design and implement solutions (using industry standard best practices) with functions in the organization that utilize and access Salesforce.com Build and modify triggers, apex classes, Visualforce pages, LWCs to automate and streamline business processes Help clean up and maintain Coupa’s code base and right size our platform Design, document, build, test and deploy enhancements to Salesforce custom objects, page layouts, workflows, alerts, reports and complex dashboards within Salesforce Understand and analyze business objectives and functional requirements into technical Salesforce solutions that account for integrations, governor limits and other downstream impacts Quickly identify business risks, inefficiencies, issues, and opportunities related to Salesforce Ensure adherence to Coupa’s IT guidelines, standards, methodologies and frameworks Requirements: 2+ years of experience as a Salesforce Developer Expert-level understanding of Salesforce.com best practices and governor limits Technical proficiency in LWC, Apex, Visualforce, custom objects, APIs, and Flow Experience with customer facing Salesforce Customer and Partner Communities a plus Strong project management and documentation skills, with the ability to effortlessly multi-task while ensuring timely delivery of projects and, more importantly, valuable business results Proven experience with business process optimization Certified SFDC Developer Experience to respond to production support requests and troubleshoot issues. Strong accountability, teamwork, and initiative Excellent written and verbal communication skills At Coupa, we have a strong and innovative team dedicated to improving the spend management processes of today’s dynamic businesses. It’s our people who make it happen, and we strive to attract and retain the best in every discipline.  We take care of our employees every way we can, with competitive compensation packages, as well as restricted stock units, an Employee Stock Purchase Program (ESPP), comprehensive health benefits for employees and their families, retirement and savings plans with employer match, a flexible work environment, no limit vacations for exempt employees, accrued vacation days for non-exempt employees, catered in-office lunches… And much more!  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, Coupa is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or religion.  Please be advised, inquiries or resumes from recruiters will not be accepted.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Falabella Financiero está buscando Talento: Data Engineer para unirse al equipo.  💥¿Cuál será tu principal misión?💥 Proveer a las áreas las capacidades de explotación de data desarrollando los entorno de consumo y procesos de ingesta de datos  🔎¿Qué tendrás que realizar? ✍️  -Desarrollar las capacidades técnicas de ingesta de data en función de las definiciones funcionales - Realizar y planificar la mejora continua en conjunto con los equipos funcionales de los productos de data - Construir las integraciones de dato (api, web service, etc) desde fuentes de datos - Habilitar los entornos de datos landing, row, QA, consumo para la explotación de datos - Realizar monitoreo de los productos desarrollados - Dar resolución y/o escalar incidentes en procesos y ecosistema de datos - Adherir los desarrollos a los lineamientos de Arquitectura - Planificar y coordinar las iniciativas bajo su rol - Gestionar y responsable de los KPI de rendimiento de su rol   ¿Con qué necesitas contar? 👍  Experiencia de 2 a 3 años como Data Engineer o Ingeniero de Software con conocimientos de datos. Conocimiento intermedio/avanzado en uno o más de los siguientes lenguajes: Python, Java, Scala o Golang. Aplicación de patrones de diseño y tests unitarios en código desarrollado. Versionamiento de código con git. Contenerización de aplicaciones (Docker) y despliegue en orquestadores de contenedores (Kubernetes). Conocimientos aplicados en CI/CD (Gitlab o Github). Entendimiento de tipos de datos (estructurados, semiestructurados y no estructurados) en distintas plataformas de almacenamiento de datos. Experiencia en construcción de pipelines de datos (ETL) tanto en Streaming como en Batch. Conocimientos avanzados de SQL Experiencia el alguna de las nubes principales (GCP, AWS, Azure).   ¡Ven a vivir una gran experiencia junto a nosotros/as!  Somos una empresa que apoya la Ley 21015, apoyamos la diversidad y la inclusión en todas sus formas, sin importar religión, raza, género, situación de discapacidad, nacionalidad.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Falabella Financiero is looking for Talent: Data Engineer to join the team. What will be your main mission? Provide to the areas the capacities of exploitation of data developing the consumption environment and processes of data intake What will you have to do?  -Develop the technical capacities of data intake according to the functional definitions - Perform and plan the continuous improvement in conjunction with the functional teams of data products - Build the integrations of data (api, web service, etc) from data sources - Enable the environments of data landing, row, QA, consumption for the exploitation of data - Perform monitoring of the products developed - Give resolution and/or scale incidents in processes and data ecosystem - Adher the developments to the guidelines of Architecture - Plan and coordinate the initiatives under its role - Manage and responsible of the KPIs of performance of its role What do you need to count?  Experience from 2 to 3 years as Data Engineer or Software with data knowledge.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Remote, Colombia  Hi, I'm Erika Plazas, your Recruiter. At CSG, we choose to see beyond a resume paper. We put your story, perspective, background, and what you have to offer first. While the traditional approach works for some, many miss out on fantastic talent like yourself, and we refuse to make that mistake. Instead, we believe that by channeling the power of all, we make ordinary customer and employee experiences extraordinary.  Channel the power of YOU as the next Full-Time Test Engineer II - QA at CSG.  Who will love this job  A hybrid – you excel when you can choose your work style - remote, in-office, or a combination of both A grower – you learn new skills and expose yourself to experiences that you can apply quickly to enhance results An individualist – you succeed by leading your own projects and producing impactful outcomes An empath – you know how to connect and communicate with different audiences worldwide A collaborator – you love to work on projects that have functional workflows  What you'll do  You will report to the Senior Manager Software Developer to contribute toward developing an understanding of the feature's requirements and how features are used while working with different applications and networking groups You will create software test plans with a heavy emphasis on test automation you will work in collaboration with developer teammates to develop in tandem a test automation suite. Configure environments for testing. Also, document test results, diagnose and debug problems, and tracks resolution Adhere to internal processes and help implement new departmental procedures You will participate in project planning, code demos, and other forms of team quality procedures. Perform end-to-end testing with third-party vendors, troubleshooting, and escalation to key stakeholders  You should have  Research shows that candidates from underrepresented backgrounds often don't apply for roles if they don't meet all the criteria – unlike majority candidates meeting fewer requirements. Channel the power of YOU and apply to discover if we're a match.  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Business, related field, or equivalent experience 2 or 3 years of experience with testing tools and evaluation of a testing tool 3 years of experience with test plan development and test environments 2 or 3 years of experience in QA standards and testing methodologies Experience in Programming concepts Experience in automated testing processes Experience with codebase test automation tools Proficient in English in a business environment  Perks & Benefits  Work from Home, in-office, or hybrid Medical & Dental Coverage Life Insurance Emotional and Mental Well-being Initiatives Volunteer Time Off Birthday Day Off Meal Allowance Education Reimbursement  Our Story  For over 40 years, we've serviced the world's most recognizable brands with future-ready solutions in customer engagement, revenue management, and payments that make ordinary customer experiences extraordinary. As a trusted technology provider in telecommunications, retail, financial services, and healthcare, our solutions impact over 900 customers in over 120 countries. Over 5,000 customer-obsessed CSGers in more than 20 countries made it possible and helped reach our $1 billion in revenue milestone.  Our Way of Life  Our people power a culture of integrity, innovation, and impact. In return, we power our people with the choice to work from home, in-office, or a hybrid work combination that integrates well with their lifestyle. You'll find CSGers exercising this choice at most of our locations worldwide.  We are committed to building and nurturing a diverse, supportive, and inclusive work environment where individuality is valued, and our people can flourish. We believe our workforce should reflect the world we live in and that we are stronger because of our differences. By embracing different backgrounds, attributes, experiences, and perspectives, we will help our employees, customers, and communities excel while, together, we work toward making social equality a reality.  We are committed to making a bigger community impact by creating new opportunities and access for underrepresented communities, protecting the environment, and developing technology solutions that foster digital inclusivity. That's just who we are. If not us, then who?  Follow us! LinkedIn | Facebook | Twitter  Location(s):

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Leapcure promueve los avances médicos globales con un enfoque que se enfoca en la defensa e inclusión del paciente. Aceleramos el desarrollo de nuevos tratamientos combinando nuestra plataforma tecnológica de monitorización del comportamiento con un sistema de apoyo al paciente personalizado. Nuestro equipo se extiende por más de 10 países y es totalmente remoto. Algunos ejemplos de nuestros éxitos son:  Reducir los tiempos de investigación en más de 100 años a lo largo de ensayos clínicos de cáncer y enfermedades raras. Ayudar a Moderna la inclusión de poblaciones BIPOC (Black, Indigenous, and people of color) para la vacuna de COVID-19 en la Fase 3. Salvar miles de vidas durante la pandemia gracias al trabajo realizado con las donaciones de plasma.  En este momento, Leapcure está contratando a un Ruby on Rails Developer para participar en la definición de nuestro Product Roadmap, contribuir a la mejora continua de nuestra tecnología, construir nuevas features y proponer diferentes enfoques técnicos para nuestras soluciones.  Trabajarás con un proyecto Ruby on Rails de alta calidad, completamente probado y actualizado, y ayudarás a ampliar la voz del paciente dentro de los ensayos clínicos a través del robustecimiento de nuestra tecnología, creación de data pipelines y la recolección de datos necesaria para la toma de decisiones. El o la candidata ideal es una persona que le apasiona promover avances médicos a gran escala a través de la creación de tecnología y siempre se inspira en lo que los datos nos dicen.  Leapcure es una de las principales voces de la DEI (Diversidad, Equidad e Inclusión) en la investigación. Nuestras diversas alianzas con comunidades aceleraron la concientización y ayudaron a Moderna a obtener la aprobación de su vacuna de Fase 3, ahorrando aproximadamente un mes de su plazo de aprobación. Además, Leapcure está allanando el camino para un diseño de ensayos clínicos más inclusivo y se compromete a garantizar que la representación de la investigación sea culturalmente adecuada.  En este rol: Contribuirás a nuestras aplicaciones y plataformas de Ruby on Rails. Participarás en las definiciones de nuestro Product Roadmap. Serás un contribuyente importante en las discusiones de alto nivel sobre la arquitectura, infraestructura, diseño, alternativas tecnológicas, etc. Apoyarás el mantenimiento del sitio web de la empresa. Colaborarás y apoyarás a otros departamentos. Ayudarás a Leapcure a seguir definiendo los estándares de la tecnología DEI en los ensayos clínicos.  Es requerido: Un mínimo de 1 año de experiencia profesional como desarrollador de Ruby on Rails. Experiencia trabajando con herramientas de testing para Ruby on Rails (p.ej. RSpec, Minitest, Cucumber). Comodidad en todo el stack de Rails: sólidos conocimientos de HTML/CSS/Javascript y habilidad para desarrollar y mantener APIs RESTful. Conocimiento en el despliegue de aplicaciones Ruby on Rails en la nube (p.ej. Heroku, AWS). Conocimientos intermedios de consultas SQL. Familiaridad con metodologías ágiles como SCRUM o Kanban.  Te daría puntos extra: Título técnico o universitario en Ingeniería, Informática o afines. Experiencia de trabajo en la industria Healthtech. Experiencia trabajando con plataformas de publicidad digital (Google, Facebook, etc) y sus respectivas APIs. Experiencia laboral en startups. Experiencia con AWS.  Es deseable: Nivel de inglés intermedio o avanzado. Experiencia trabajando con herramientas de monitorización de registros y rendimiento (p.ej. Pingdom, Rollbar, New Relic y Papertrail). Experiencia en implementaciones para cumplimiento HIPAA, GDPR y/o CCPA. Integración con third-parties a través del consumo de APIs. Optimizaciones para SEO. Creación de prototipos simples con herramientas de prototipado (p.ej. Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch).  Tech stack: Ruby on Rails. Bootstrap, StimulusJS, Webpack, y Javascript moderno de vainilla. Sidekiq background workers. PostgreSQL, Redis. Aplicación principal alojada en Heroku. Aplicación secundaria alojada en AWS (CDK, CodeBuild, CodePipeline, RDS, ECS, S3, SecretsManager, CloudFront, etc).  Salario: 2.000 USD to 2.500 USD al mes

Nuestro equipo se extiende por más de 10 países y es totalmente remoto. En este momento, Leapcure está contratando a un Ruby on Rails Developer para participar en la definición de nuestro Product Roadmap, contribuir a la mejora continua de nuestra tecnología, construir nuevas features y proponer diferentes enfoques técnicos para nuestras soluciones.  Trabajarás con un proyecto Ruby on Rails de alta calidad, completamente probado y actualizado, y ayudarás a ampliar la voz del paciente dentro de los ensayos clínicos a través del robustecimiento de nuestra tecnología, creación de data pipelines y la recolección de datos necesaria para la toma de decisiones. El o la candidata ideal es una persona que le apasiona promover avances médicos a gran escala a través de la creación de tecnología y siempre se inspira en lo que los datos nos dicen.  Leapcure es una de las principales voces de la DEI (Diversidad, Equidad e Inclusión) en la investigación. Nuestras diversas alianzas con comunidades aceleraron la concientización y ayudaron a Moderna a obtener la aprobación de su vacuna de Fase 3, ahorrando aproximadamente un mes de su plazo de aprobación. Además, Leapcure está allanando el camino para un diseño de ensayos clínicos más inclusivo y se compromete a garantizar que la representación de la investigación sea culturalmente adecuada.  En este rol: Contribuirás a nuestras aplicaciones y plataformas de Ruby on Rails. Participarás en las definiciones de nuestro Product Roadmap. Serás un contribuyente importante en las discusiones de alto nivel sobre la arquitectura, infraestructura, diseño, alternativas tecnológicas, etc. Apoyarás el mantenimiento del sitio web de la empresa. Colaborarás y apoyarás a otros departamentos. Ayudarás a Leapcure a seguir definiendo los estándares de la tecnología DEI en los ensayos clínicos.  Es requerido: Un mínimo de 1 año de experiencia profesional como desarrollador de Ruby on Rails. Experiencia trabajando con herramientas de testing para Ruby on Rails (p.ej. RSpec, Minitest, Cucumber). Comodidad en todo el stack de Rails: sólidos conocimientos de HTML/CSS/Javascript y habilidad para desarrollar y mantener APIs RESTful. Conocimiento en el despliegue de aplicaciones Ruby on Rails en la nube (p.ej. Heroku, AWS). Conocimientos intermedios de consultas SQL. Familiaridad con metodologías ágiles como SCRUM o Kanban.  Te daría puntos extra: Título técnico o universitario en Ingeniería, Informática o afines. Experiencia de trabajo en la industria Healthtech. Experiencia trabajando con plataformas de publicidad digital (Google, Facebook, etc) y sus respectivas APIs. Experiencia laboral en startups. Experiencia con AWS.  Es deseable: Nivel de inglés intermedio o avanzado. Experiencia trabajando con herramientas de monitorización de registros y rendimiento (p.ej. Pingdom, Rollbar, New Relic y Papertrail). Experiencia en implementaciones para cumplimiento HIPAA, GDPR y/o CCPA. Integración con third-parties a través del consumo de APIs. Optimizaciones para SEO. Creación de prototipos simples con herramientas de prototipado (p.ej. Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch).  Tech stack: Ruby on Rails. Bootstrap, StimulusJS, Webpack, y Javascript moderno de vainilla. Sidekiq background workers. PostgreSQL, Redis. Aplicación principal alojada en Heroku. Aplicación secundaria alojada en AWS (CDK, CodeBuild, CodePipeline, RDS, ECS, S3, SecretsManager, CloudFront, etc).  Salario: 2.000 USD to 2.500 USD al mes

Título: QA (Quality Assurance) Automation Engineer - Remote - Colombia
Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  As a QA Automation Engineer at FullStack Labs, your primary responsibilities will be to design automated tests to validate the applications we build for clients. Each day at FSL, you will be collaborating with other members of the engineering team to solve problems with the application. You will develop automated tests and configure testing automation environments. You will ensure proper test coverage and will test features to ensure they are properly built, function as they are designed to function, and correctly solve clients' problems. To do this you will gain a deep understanding of our client's business and the problems that the software is designed to solve. The automated test coverage that you will create will ensure that the products we create maintain their level of excellence and do not regress. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For: 2+ years of Quality Assurance experience. Advanced English is required. A thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle. Well-versed with STLC and defect life cycle. Ability to work well with team members within an agile development team. Identifies defects and creates informative bug reports and effectively follows up on bug closure. Advises the team on major issues to product quality. Deep understanding of testing philosophies like TDD, BDD, etc. Knowledge of how to create and execute test plans Experience working on more than one time-sensitive project at a time. Proactively tests, provides test coverage, and resolves issues. Works closely with team members to emphasize quality throughout the entire SDLC. You must have an extremely high, forensic attention to detail. A natural orientation to detail is the most important skill set for this position. You naturally notice small imperfections in seemingly high-quality work. You care deeply about building flawless user experiences and have a visceral reaction to low-quality work. You DO sweat the small stuff. You must have strong computer / technical skills...using technology comes naturally to you. Strong work ethic and the ability to focus on multi-task throughout the day. A positive, optimistic, can-do attitude. Excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent customer service skills, placing customer outcomes as a focal point for all actions and decisions.  Technologies: Experience with some (not all) of these technologies is required: SauceLabs / BrowserStack / Kobiton. Postman. Jira. Slack. GitHub. Toggl. Mac OS. Terminal. XCode/Android Studio. Figma/Invision.  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo About NCR  NCR Corporation (NYSE: NCR) is a leading software- and services-led enterprise provider in the financial, retail and hospitality industries. NCR is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, with 36,000 employees globally. NCR is a trademark of NCR Corporation in the United States and other countries.  TÍTULO: Técnico de Mantenimiento de Primera Línea  UBICACIÓN: Bogotá  Posición de nivel básico que requiere poca o ninguna experiencia en el trabajo de mantenimiento. En este nivel, el técnico debe ser capaz de representar profesionalmente a NCR, resolver problemas sencillos, organizar y planear de manera efectiva su tiempo y saber cuándo y a quien escalar un problema mayor.  Es entrenado para ejecutar rutinas y procedimientos estandarizados de servicio técnico y atención al cliente, como:  Rutinas de diagnótico báicas, reparaciones sencillas y cambios de algunos móulos Revisión de conexiones, condiciones eléctricas y ambientales de operación de los equipos Ejecutar pruebas de funcionamiento de los equipos Colocación de suministros y solución de atascos de papel Re-establecimiento de la operación normal de las máquinas Reportar oportuna y detalladamente los problemas encontrados y las acciones tomadas  Calificaciones Básicas:  Bachiller con al menos un año de estudios en mantenimiento de computadores, electricidad/electrónica y/o sistemas Buenos conocimientos de tecnología de PC y de sistema operativo Windows 7 No se requiere experiencia previa Disponibilidad para moverse permanentemente dentro y fuera de la ciudad, trabajar algunos fines de semana y ocasionalmente en horarios extendidos Buenas habilidades de comunicación interpersonal, orientación al servicio, trabajo en equipo y estabilidad emocional Licencia de conducir (motocicleta)  Offers of employment are conditional upon passage of screening criteria applicable to the job.  EEO Statement  Integrated into our shared values is NCR's commitment to diversity and equal employment opportunity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, age, race, color, creed, religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, military service, genetic information, or any other characteristic or conduct protected by law. NCR is committed to being a globally inclusive company where all people are treated fairly, recognized for their individuality, promoted based on performance and encouraged to strive to reach their full potential. We believe in understanding and respecting differences among all people. Every individual at NCR has an ongoing responsibility to respect and support a globally diverse environment.  Statement to Third Party Agencies  To ALL recruitment agencies: NCR only accepts resumes from agencies on the NCR preferred supplier list. Please do not forward resumes to our applicant tracking system, NCR employees, or any NCR facility. NCR is not responsible for any fees or charges associated with unsolicited resumes.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Nowports  ¿Quieres ser parte de la transformación digital de la cadena de suministro (supply chain)?  Nowports lo hace posible integrando herramientas tecnológicasT y financierash. Somos el agente de carga digital (digital freight forwarder) más grande de Latinoamérica. Diseñamos soluciones logísticas para mover la carga de nuestros clientes con agilidad, seguridad y transparencia. Con más de 3 años aprendiendo, creciendo y adaptando nuestros procesos, actualmente somos más de 500 nowporters trabajando desde México, Chile, Colombia, Uruguay, Perú, Brasil y Panamá.  Nuestra cultura laboral ha sido destacada por Best Place to Code y Employers for Youth (EFY).Recientemente nos convertimos en unicornio , es decir, somos una startup privada valorada por $1100 millones de dólares. Fondos importantes como SoftBank Latin America Fund, Tiger Global, Foundation Capital, Monashees, Soma Capital, Broadhaven Ventures, Mouro Capital, Tencent y Base10 Partners han confiado en nosotros.  ¡En equipo navegamos mejor!  Buscamos a un@ Finance Analyst- basado en Bogotá  ¿Qué vas a hacer en tu día a día?  Manejo de contabilidad mensual Facturación servicios Cobranza Pago proveedores Tareas administrativas Apoyo en elaboración de estados financieros  ¿Qué necesitas para desempeñar este rol?  Egresado de Administración de empresas, contabilidad, finanzas o carreras afines Experiencia mínimo 2 años en manejo de procesos contables Manejo de Excel  ¿Qué beneficios tendrás como Nowporter?  Medicina Prepagada Nowportsdays - 2 días libres por semestre a elección Home office (sujeto a coordinación) Excelente clima laboral Oportunidades de crecimiento profesional  Queremos conocerte, ¡aplica hoy para convertirte en parte de la Historia del comercio exterior!   Nowports es una organización comprometida con la equidad, la inclusión y la diversidad. Nuestra columna vertebral son nuestros valores: respeto, transparencia, milla extra, agilidad, proactividad e innovación. Creemos que una fuerza laboral diversa nos ayuda a potencializar nuestros resultados y obtener diferentes perspectivas para nuestros clientes y usuarios. Si tienes creatividad, espíritu emprendedor y ganas de trabajar en equipo, únete a Nowports para que podamos seguir convirtiéndonos en la solución más completa y confiable para la cadena de suministro de las empresas latinoamericanas y hacer logística como nadie lo está haciendo.  People Team nowports.com

Descripción: Acerca del empleo A fast-growing company providing innovative enterprise software for the home improvement industry is looking for a Backend .NET Engineer. The engineer will be responsible for utilizing .NET infrastructure to create software solutions, rewriting existing code to ensure compliance, and more. The company is currently supporting home improvement programs for various leading national retailers, and providing a wide range of products including HVAC, flooring, countertops, siding, kitchen and bath remodeling, etc. to their customers. This is a rare chance to collaborate in an exciting and challenging environment that encourages independent thinking, problem-solving, and growth. It is a full-time role that requires a minimum of 4 hours daily overlap with EST.  Job Responsibilities:  Utilize .NET infrastructure to create software solutions Rewrite existing code to ensure compliance with specified guidelines Ensure that outputs are user-friendly and visually compelling Collaborate with product teams & engineering professionals (especially front-end engineers) Optimize the platform for faster execution and solve scalability issues  Job Requirements:  Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience) 3+ years of back-end development experience Proficiency in .NET Core and ASP.NET Experience in writing enterprise software Experience with SharePoint or working with a CMS system would be an added advantage Expertise in architectural patterns, like MVC Strong collaboration and communication skills

The engineer will be responsible for utilizing .NET infrastructure to create software solutions, rewriting existing code to ensure compliance, and more. Descripción: Acerca del empleo En Falabella estamos en búsqueda de Analista de Operaciones de negocios para la ciudad de Bogotá, profesional en estadística, economía, matemáticas, ingeniería industrial, administración de empresas o carreras afínes. Se requiere experiencia mínima de 1 año manejando indicadores estratégicos en excel avanzado, Power BI o SQL, Tableau.  Su rol será, realizar analítica descriptiva y predictiva, determinar la forma más idónea para despliegue/visualización de los resultados generando reportes, dashboard y realizando el control presupuestal, así como la creación de KPIs.
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'In Falabella we are looking for Business Operations Analyst for the city of Bogotá, professional in statistics, economics, mathematics, industrial engineering, business administration or related careers. It requires at least 1 year experience handling strategic indicators in advanced excel, Power BI or SQL, Tableau. Its role will be to perform descriptive and predictive analytics, determine the most suitable way to deploy/visualize results generating reports, dashboard and carrying out budget control, as well as the creation of KPIs.'}]

Título: Profesional en Ingenieria Quimica Recien Egresado
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Description  Sobre nosotros  En Technip Energies, creemos en un mañana mejor y creemos que podemos hacer que el mañana sea mejor. Con aproximadamente 15.000 mujeres y hombres talentosos, somos una empresa de ingeniería y tecnología global y líder, con una visión clara para acelerar la transición energética. Diseñar y entregar soluciones energéticas de valor agregado, es lo que hacemos.  Si comparte nuestra determinación de impulsar la transición hacia un futuro bajo en carbono, este podría ser el trabajo para usted. Actualmente estamos buscando un Especialista de Proceso I - Junior, que reportará directamente al Jefe de Departamento de Proceso, para unirse a nuestro equipo con sede en Bogotá, Colombia.  Acerca del trabajo  El Especialista de Proceso I es responsable de brindar soporte al Coordinador de Proceso en todas las actividades y entregables de diseño requeridas en un proyecto o propuesta, cumpliendo con los requerimientos técnicos, contractuales y corporativos.  Le ofrecemos no solo un trabajo, sino también un viaje inspirador en un entorno verdaderamente global donde nos unimos, para romper fronteras gracias a la innovación, la creatividad y el espíritu pionero que impulsa a nuestra gente.  Acerca de ti  Nos encantaría saber de usted si su perfil cumple con los siguientes requisitos esenciales:  Profesional en Ingeniería Quimica recién egresado. Conocimiento de simuladores de Proceso (Hysys, Pro II, Visual Flow, Pipesys y similares). Conocimiento avanzado del programa Excel y demás herramientas de Microsoft Office. Manejo básico de programas de diseño Autocad. Nivel intermedio de inglés (hablado y escrito).  Estándares de inclusión  En nuestro viaje continuo para desarrollar y construir una cultura de inclusión, nos adherimos a cuatro estándares de oro de inclusión. ¿Y usted?  Desafiamos nuestros prejuicios y adoptamos la diversidad de pensamiento. Nadie tiene todos los conocimientos y soluciones, colectivamente los tenemos. Fomentamos un ambiente solidario donde las personas son respetadas, cómodas para compartir y ser escuchadas. Promovemos la escucha activa para la toma de decisiones y acciones efectivas.  ¿Qué sigue?  Fecha de inicio: lo antes posible  Una vez que reciba su solicitud de sistema, el equipo de reclutamiento evaluará y comparará sus habilidades, experiencia y equipo potencial con los requisitos del puesto. Le pedimos paciencia mientras el equipo completa el volumen de solicitudes en un plazo razonable. Verifique el progreso de su solicitud periódicamente a través de la cuenta personal del perfil de candidato creado durante su solicitud.  Lo invitamos a conocer más sobre nuestra empresa visitando www.technipenergies.com y síganos en LinkedIn , Instagram , Facebook , Twitter , Youtube para obtener actualizaciones de la empresa .
Descripción (inglés): Job Description  Sobre nosotros  En Technip Energies, creemos en un mañana mejor y creemos que podemos hacer que el mañana sea mejor. Con aproximadamente 15.000 mujeres y hombres talentosos, somos una empresa de ingeniería y tecnología global y líder, con una visión clara para acelerar la transición energética. Diseñar y entregar soluciones energéticas de valor agregado, es lo que hacemos.
