Título: Consultor para la Formulación de Instrumento para la creación de la Agencia Pública de gestión y colocación de Empleo de Cúcuta
Descripción: Acerca del empleo Programa Venezuela: Respuesta e Integración IDIQ/Orden de Tarea No. 2 -Oportunidades Sin Fronteras-  Invitación a Presentar Propuestas (RFP)  El Programa Venezuela respuesta e Integración de USAID a través de su Orden de Tarea No. 2, lo INVITA a presentar propuesta para Servicios Profesionales para fortalecer a la Alcaldía de Cúcuta en su estrategia de inclusión laboral, a través de la formulación de un instrumento que permita la creación de la Agencia Pública de Gestión y Colocación de Empleo de Cúcuta.  Número de RFP: RFPVRITO2-021 - Consultoría para fortalecer a la Alcaldía de Cúcuta en su estrategia de inclusión laboral, a través de la formulación de un instrumento que permita la creación de la Agencia Pública de Gestión y Colocación de Empleo de Cúcuta Objeto: Prestar servicios profesionales para Fortalecer a la Alcaldía de Cúcuta en su estrategia de inclusión laboral, a través de la formulación de un instrumento que permita la creación de la Agencia Pública de Gestión y Colocación de Empleo de Cúcuta, con el fin de lograr los objetivos esperados en el marco de la ficha de proyecto “Taller Escuela DORCAS, empleo formal y digno para una transformación del sector textil en la ciudad de Cúcuta” Entidad contratante: Chemonics International Inc. Sucursal Colombia (Chemonics), operador del Proyecto Integración Económica de Comunidades Migrantes implementado bajo el Programa IDIQ -Venezuela: Respuesta e Integración financiado por la Agencia de los Estados Unidos para el Desarrollo Internacional (USAID), bajo el contrato número 72051421D0008/72051422F00005 Fecha de Expedición: Noviembre 25, 2022 Entrega de propuestas: Noviembre 30, 2022 a las 11 am Punto de contacto: Luz Angela Rodríguez – Gerente de Recursos Humanos y Consultores Email: lrodriguez@colombiavri.org Ingresar al enlace para conocer las instrucciones y requisitos en la aplicación a la convocatoria:  https://chemonics-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/g/personal/lrodriguez_colombiavri_org/EuDkMKua-39LtwT2efQuj1ABUOsSBeQ0ct6h9IFkbWDbog?e=lXO3iT  Para participar en el proceso de competencia se deben cumplir con los requisitos con el envío de: 1- Propuesta técnica -Hoja de Vida- 2- Propuesta Económica 3- Anexos

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Acerca de usted:  Si tiene ambiciones de clase mundial para alcanzar las estrellas mientras mantiene los pies en la tierra, somos el equipo para usted. Hemos creado una nueva generación de empresas, centradas en el futuro con una ambición reinventada en todas las disciplinas del sector energético.  Amamos a las personas que conocen su propio potencial y no tienen miedo de usarlo. Sabemos que juntos, somos mucho más que la suma de nuestras partes. Por lo tanto, celebramos a las personas que quieren crecer y desarrollarse a medida que trabajemos juntos en algunos de los proyectos más grandes en el escenario mundial de la energía.  Nuestro propósito y creencias:  En Kent, estamos abordando el mayor desafío de nuestro tiempo: llevar a nuestro mundo la energía que necesita de la manera más responsable jamás imaginada.  Es la energía de cada miembro de nuestro equipo impulsada por nuestras creencias lo que está haciendo que esto suceda. Cualquiera que sea nuestra habilidad, nuestro idioma o nuestra cultura. Estas creencias nos definen y nos dirigen todos los días para ser los mejores, para nosotros, nuestros clientes, nuestras partes interesadas clave, las comunidades en las que operamos y el planeta:  JUGAMOS A LO GRANDE  Prosperamos en AGILIDAD EMOCIONAL  Somos FANÁTICOS DEL RENDIMIENTO  Estamos construidos sobre el PENSAMIENTO INFINITO  Lea más sobre el Propósito, las Creencias y los Principios Rectores que nos impulsan: https://kentplc.com/who-we-are/purpose-beliefs  Nuestra visión para la Diversidad, la Inclusión y la Pertenencia:  Reconocemos que la diversidad y la inclusión son catalizadores del éxito. Estamos aumentando la conciencia sobre los beneficios de la diversidad de las personas, la diversidad de experiencias y la diversidad de nuestras perspectivas. Crear una cultura de inclusión donde todos los empleados sientan un sentido de pertenencia.  La combinación de nuestra energía es alimentada por diferentes nacionalidades, en 6 continentes y 24 países. Nuestro compromiso es celebrar el carácter, sin importar el origen étnico, el género, la edad, la religión, la identidad o la discapacidad.  Sobre el trabajo:  Kent está buscando un Ingeniero Asistente Soporte IT para apoyar a los proyectos en curso. Esta posición se encuentra en nuestra oficina de Bogotá, Colombia.  Sus responsabilidades:  Realizar el soporte a usuarios, la gestión de recursos e inventarios y las copias de respaldo de la información generada por la Empresa y sus proyectos, dentro del marco de los métodos y procedimientos establecidos por la organización, con el objetivo de mantener el óptimo funcionamiento de los equipos y servicios tecnológicos y de preservar la información de la Compañía. Sus conocimientos/habilidades, educación y experiencia:  Calificación / Certificación:  Estudiante de Ingeniería de sistemas, técnico o tecnólogo en sistemas Experiencia mínima de 1 Requisito de habilidades:  Soporte y mantenimiento de hardware y software Conocimientos en instalación, configuración, mantenimiento, actualización y solución de problemas, manejo de bases de datos en Access y detección y solución de problemas de redes. Comunicación:  Excelentes habilidades de comunicación: verbal y escrita, Usted piensa que una carrera en nuestro equipo podría coincidir con su perfil, ¡envíe su solicitud en línea ahora!

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Nowports  ¿Quieres ser parte de la transformación digital de la cadena de suministro (supply chain)?  Nowports lo hace posible integrando herramientas tecnológicasT y financierash. Somos el agente de carga digital (digital freight forwarder) más grande de Latinoamérica. Diseñamos soluciones logísticas para mover la carga de nuestros clientes con agilidad, seguridad y transparencia. Con más de 3 años aprendiendo, creciendo y adaptando nuestros procesos, actualmente somos más de 500 nowporters trabajando desde México, Chile, Colombia, Uruguay, Perú, Brasil y Panamá.  Nuestra cultura laboral ha sido destacada por Best Place to Code y Employers for Youth (EFY).Recientemente nos convertimos en unicornio , es decir, somos una startup privada valorada por $1100 millones de dólares. Fondos importantes como SoftBank Latin America Fund, Tiger Global, Foundation Capital, Monashees, Soma Capital, Broadhaven Ventures, Mouro Capital, Tencent y Base10 Partners han confiado en nosotros.  ¡En equipo navegamos mejor! e i  Buscamos a un@ Finance Analyst- basado en Bogotá  ¿Qué vas a hacer en tu día a día?  Manejo de contabilidad mensual Facturación servicios Cobranza Pago proveedores Tareas administrativas Apoyo en elaboración de estados financieros  ¿Qué necesitas para desempeñar este rol?  Egresado de Ad ministración de empresas, contabilidad, finanzas o carreras afines Experiencia mínimo 2 años en manejo de procesos contables Manejo de Excel  ¿Qué beneficios tendrás como Nowporter?  Medicina Prepagada Nowportsdays - 2 días libres por semestre a elección Home office (sujeto a coordinación) Excelente clima laboral Oportunidades de crecimiento profesional  Queremos conocerte, ¡aplica hoy para convertirte en parte de la Historia del comercio exterior!  Nowports es una organización comprometida con la equidad, la inclusión y la diversidad. Nuestra columna vertebral son nuestros valores: respeto, transparencia, milla extra, agilidad, proactividad e innovación. Creemos que una fuerza laboral diversa nos ayuda a potencializar nuestros resultados y obtener diferentes perspectivas para nuestros clientes y usuarios. Si tienes creatividad, espíritu emprendedor y ganas de trabajar en equipo, únete a Nowports para que podamos seguir convirtiéndonos en la solución más completa y confiable para la cadena de suministro de las empresas latinoamericanas y hacer logística como nadie lo está haciendo.  People Team  nowports.com

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  Sobre ADDI  Somos una empresa de tecnología que trabaja para transformar el crédito y la banca en América Latina comenzando con el financiamiento en el punto de venta. Nuestro objetivo es crear servicios financieros justos, simples y asequibles que empoderen a nuestros clientes, tratándolos con dignidad y generando libertad financiera. Empezamos en febrero de 2019 y ya hemos atendido a miles de clientes y desembolsado millones de dólares.  Operamos como una startup full stack. Hemos construido nuestros sistemas y procesos centrales desde cero, y creemos que nuestra plataforma de tecnología y análisis impulsará nuestro progreso en los próximos años. Llegamos a esto con una profunda experiencia en la creación y el crecimiento de equipos de tecnología y productos financieros. Tan importante como lo que hacemos es cómo lo hacemos. Somos una empresa consciente y estamos profundamente comprometidos con trabajar y vivir nuestros cinco valores fundamentales: una empresa de propietarios que inspiran a los colegas, hacemos de lo imposible, posible, nos preocupamos y confiamos, actuamos con integridad, ganamos hoy y todos los días y escalamos exponencialmente.  Estamos respaldados por Andreessen Horowitz, Monashees, Village Global y un destacado equipo de ángeles individuales, incluidos Kevin Ryan, Josh Abramowitz y Scott Weiss.  Descripción del cargo  El área de collections tiene como objetivo fidelizar a nuestros clientes a través del proceso de cobranza, instruir y apoyar el hábito de pago en nuestros clientes, somos una ficha clave en el crecimiento de la compañia a la que pertenecemos y trabajamos con altos indices de calidad. En la ejecución, la clave es la actitud de servicio, la venta de soluciones y el seguimiento de instrucciones y procesos.  El Analista de cobranza será el encargado de brindar de forma permanente servicio a nuestros clientes, apoyar su proceso de pago y crear un hábito, Atenderá al usuario satisfaciendo sus necesidades y expectativas, con base en los requerimientos del área, cumpliendo los estándares de calidad, productividad, servicio, metas de recuperacion establecidas por el área y obligaciones establecidas por la Compañía.  Requirements  Requisitos Experiencia mínima de 6 meses como Analistas de Cobranzas. Experiencia trabajando en cobranzas para una institución financiera. Bachiller, Técnico, Tecnólogo o Estudiante Universitario de cualquier carrera. Nivel de Ingles A1. Competencias Manejo de herramientas ofimáticas Conocimientos en Contact center Creatividad E Innovación Ética y confidencialidad Orientación a resultados Adaptabilidad al cambio Cualidades comerciales Trabajo en Equipo Benefits  Beneficios Trabajar junto a un gran y diverso equipo que se preocupa por lo que estamos haciendo y cómo lo estamos haciendo. Medicina prepagada con cobertura al 100% (50% para beneficiarios). Gran oportunidad de mercado por delante; estamos creciendo más rápido que cualquier otro prestamista fintech en nuestra etapa.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo SGF Global is a global leader with over 30 years’ experience providing recruitment solutions.  We’re currently looking for a BILINGUAL OVER-THE-PHONE INTERPRETERS (SPAN -ENG).  We are an equal opportunity employer! 💪 📌Freelance Contract  Role description: As an Over the Phone interpreter (OPI) you will be assisting with consecutive bidirectional interpretation of important information from the source language into a target language. We are looking for competent Interpreters to aid non-English speakers across a range of activities.  Benefits: ✅100% Remote Position ✅Initial Training ✅Schedule Flexibility ✅Payment in USD  Main responsibilities: 📌Providing consecutive interpretation services. 📌Imparting thought, purpose, spirit, emotions, and tone of speakers from source language into target language. (Creole-English language pair). 📌Complying with applicable ethics and standards.  Required qualifications (Must have): ⭐Bilingual English-Spanish a B2/C1 level ⭐Smartphone (Android or iOS operating system) ⭐Stable and fast internet connection ⭐Willingness to learn and grow both professionally and personally.  Please attach your resume and include your email address to be contacted. Join our wonderful LATAM interpreters' team! 🌎

Descripción: Acerca del empleo En Mercado Libre estamos democratizando el comercio, el dinero y los pagos en América Latina. En Marketplace VIS somos líderes regionales en los verticales de vehículos, inmuebles y servicios. Ofrecemos publicaciones especializadas que logran mejorar la conversión y un mayor tráfico de visitas. En un negocio en plena expansión, conectamos a quienes están buscando comprar el vehículo o el hogar de sus sueños, con ofertas de valor. Tenemos un desafío para quienes: Vibran energía emprendedora: se mueven por la curiosidad, nunca se rinden y se enfocan en superar sus propios límites. Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación. Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores. La excelencia y la ejecución son claves en su forma de hacer las cosas. Promueven el buen clima, aportan alegría y diversión. Saben cómo construir con otras personas y disfrutan trabajando en equipo. Imagínate emprendiendo proyectos desafiantes, dinámicos e innovadores y siendo responsable de: Realizar análisis competitivos para detectar nuevas oportunidades de negocio. Ejecutar el proceso comercial de punta a punta, bajo las mejores prácticas del modelo de venta consultiva, con el fin de superar los objetivos del negocio. Inspirar y capacitar a las nuevas cuentas en la puesta en marcha de sus operaciones en la plataforma, garantizando los más altos estándares en la ejecución. Requisitos: Ser profesional de Ingeniería Industrial, Administración de Empresas o carreras afines. Tener 2 años de experiencia desarrollada en posiciones similares. Te proponemos: Ser parte de una compañía con espíritu emprendedor en la que nos encanta pensar en grande y a largo plazo. Ser protagonista de tu desarrollo en un ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizaje, crecimiento, expansión y proyectos desafiantes. Compartir y aprender en equipo junto a grandes profesionales y especialistas. Un excelente clima de trabajo, con todo lo necesario para que vivas una gran experiencia. :) En Mercado Libre trabajamos para promover una cultura inclusiva, que busca la equidad y valora las diferentes perspectivas. Esto se traduce en género, religión, personas con discapacidad, LGBTQ+, etnia y diversidad de experiencias. Trabajamos todas nuestras búsquedas con base en esta premisa. ¡Súmate a nuestro equipo!
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'At Mercado Libre we are democratizing trade, money and payments in Latin America. At Marketplace VIS we are regional leaders in verticals of vehicles, buildings and services. We offer specialized publications that manage to improve the conversion and greater traffic of visits. In a business in full expansion, we connect those who are looking to buy the vehicle or home of their dreams, with offers of value. We have a challenge for those who: Vibrate entrepreneurial energy: move by curiosity, never give and focus on overcoming their own limits. They give the maximum because they like to work with commitment and dedication. They live the changes as opportunities and learn from their mistakes. The excellence and execution are key in their way of doing things. Promote the good climate, bring joy and fun. They know how to build with other people and enjoy working as a team. Imaginate undertaking challenging, dynamic and innovative projects and being responsible for: Perform competitive analysis to detect new business opportunities. Run the commercial process from top to top, under the best practices of the consultative sales model, in order to overcome the objectives of the business.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo WE ARE  SoftServe is a global digital solutions company with headquarters in Austin, Texas, founded in 1993 in Ukraine. 13,000+ associates are currently working on 1,100+ projects with clients in the USA, Europe, and APAC region. In January 2022, we started our operations in Latin America. We made a commitment to grow our local community to 3,500 associates by 2025 and invest in the market.  Our client is the world’s largest travel site, operating at scale with over 700 million reviews, opinions, photos, and videos, reaching over 390 million unique visitors each month and covering approximately 7.7 million accommodations, airlines, experiences, and restaurants.  YOU ARE  A highly motivated Data Engineer looking for a long-term exciting opportunity to cooperate closely with the customer and work with a great team. Your qualifications include Proficiency in SQL and RDBMS Experience in DWH/ETL principles Background with data-warehouse technologies, such as Snowflake or Hadoop Hands-on experience with T-SQL, PL-SQL, Hive, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server (deprecated part but still used on a project), Whampipe, Simon Data, JIRA, Confluence Mastership in navigating and querying relational databases Knowledge of Spark, Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery, and other MPP would be a big plus Communication skills Interest in long-term cooperation Upper-Intermediate English level  YOU WANT TO WORK WITH Snowflake Migration from ET to CRM Platform / Simon Data Taking part in the full process includes requirement meetings, investigation system and finding needed information, creating and maintaining ETL pipelines Сonverting existing pipelines and business campaigns from deprecated systems (MS SQL Server, etc.) Enhancing the CRM Platform and making it easy for new products to onboard  TOGETHER WE WILL Code! The project is not overwhelmed with meetings and other not-development-related activities Operate across evolving technology stack Support hundreds of thousands of travelers each day by booking attractions and holiday homes across the globe Help people decide where to stay, how to fly, what to do, and where to eat Have a funny and friendly environment where the key objective is getting things done

Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  We're looking to hire several mid-level software engineers to join our team. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For:  Meaningful experience working with any of the following technologies: React.js. Ember.js. Angular. Vue. React Native. Node. Ruby on Rails — 3+ years of professional software development experience. Advanced English is required. Experience working on large, complex systems. Experience working on Agile / Scrum teams. A four-year college degree is required. Ability to take extreme ownership over your work. Every day is a challenge to ensure you are performing to the expectations you and your team have agreed upon. Ability to identify with the goals of FullStack's clients, and dedicate yourself to delivering on the commitments you and your team make to them. An understanding of best practices and a commitment to following them. Ability to work through new and difficult issues and contribute to libraries as needed. A positive mindset and can-do attitude. Forensic attention to detail. You’re passionate about software development...it’s not just your career, it’s your hobby. You’re constantly striving to learn new things and improve. You follow industry news, regularly tinker with new technologies, and read books and blogs to keep your skills current. Ability to consistently work 40 hours per week.  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo WE HAVE SEVERAL POSITIONS TO FILL IN LATIN AMERICA - YOU CAN WORK REMOTELY FROM THE COMFORT OF YOUR HOME!  The Microsoft 365 team is looking for software developers. Are you interested in working on a product that ships new features every week?  Would you like to design and develop new components that solve complex distributed systems and search optimization problems?  If the answer to these questions is yes, then Microsoft 365 team would like to hear from you! We write software from the ground-up, running across thousands of servers. We are currently building a new system for searching data in an enterprise.  The goal of the system is to efficiently search all entity types such as emails, calendar items, contacts, documents, and so on with latency in milliseconds. To design the new system, we are applying a combination of approaches from the fields of API design, Machine Learning, Distributed Computing, Workflow engines, Algorithm Optimization, and many more. Come to define, design and deliver the next state of enterprise search system.  Responsibilities  Your responsibilities will include some or all the below: Designing and developing search platform related features and solutions Collaborate with the team on building a highly scalable and high performance search stack Collaborate with customers and partners to understand user requirements and design features to enable rich search experiences Working on distributed infrastructure, released and managing live service in production. Qualifications  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in CS or equivalent experience At least 3 years’ experience in designing, developing and shipping software Solid C++/C#/Java skills with at least 5 years of C++/C#/Java programming experience 2+ years of experience in distributed systems and agile development environment Prior experience with development in large low-latency high-volume services, experience with service-oriented development and cloud-based systems. Experience in writing efficient multi-threaded and concurrent code Strong verbal and written communication skills in English with excellent interpersonal communication and collaboration skills Demonstrated commitment to the success of others. Preferred Qualifications Passion for delivering high quality software on a rapid ship cycle Enjoy learning and ramping up on new technologies quickly. Requirements  These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings  Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.  Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.  Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Title:  Associate, Real Time Management  Job Description  The Associate, Real Time Management is responsible for managing the intraday performance of one program or line of business within a Call Center environment. This position will utilize monitoring systems to ensure appropriate staffing levels and agent availability to meet client expectations and Concentrix scheduling standards  Responsibilities  Job Description  Distributes accurate and timely agent schedules Inputs intraday corrections and exceptions into systems for agent time off and absences Monitors inbound volume for unusual activity to ensure staffing needs are met Recognize abnormal scheduling issues and escalate as necessary Initiates and coordinates trouble tickets and escalate issues as required Prepares standard and ad hoc reports for agent availability effectiveness Monitors and resolves agent availability concerns via face-to-face communications, phones, and messaging applications with agent(s) and command center  Candidate Profile  Proficient in Excel as most Visual Basic Knowledge (Macros) Previous experience in related fields. Ability to multi-task and meet timelines on deliverables Effective communication skills, both written and verbal in English Detail oriented Results oriented Quick learner and self-started Associate degree in related field not required but is a plus  Internal Applicants must also comply with:  Have 6 months in current role No more than 3 Estart Points and no active DAs in the past 6 months Please attach your resume in Workday #LATAMCNX  Your Benefits:  A place where you can oversee your own work A place where your ideas will be heard Competitive salary Career development Good working environment  About us:  Concentrix, a global customer experience services and technologies company, providing support to the world’s best brands.  Every day, from more than 40 countries and across 6 continents, our 280 000 employees deliver next generation customer experience and help companies better connect with their customers. We create better business outcomes and help differentiate our clients through technology, design, data, process, and people. Concentrix provides services to clients in the following key industry verticals: technology & consumer electronics; retail, travel & ecommerce; banking, financial services & insurance; healthcare; communications & media; automotive; and energy & public sector.  #LATAMCNX  Location:  COL Bogata - Plaza Titan  Language Requirements:  Time Type:  Full time R1345593

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¡Únete al equipo SONDA! Si estás buscando un nuevo desafío para innovar y transformar el futuro, entonces queremos que seas parte de nuestro equipo. Únete a la empresa latinoamericana líder en servicios de TI, un lugar dónde podrás impulsar tu carrera, adquirir conocimiento y desarrollarte profesionalmente. Formación: · Profesional en sistemas y/o carreras afines. Experiencia: · Experiencia certificada mínima de 2 a 4 años en Desarrollo de Software en C#, .Net, Javascript y Pl-Sql Oracle Tus retos serán: • Realizar las actividades necesarias para el análisis, desarrollo, pruebas técnicas y de integración Modalidad y Horario: · Teletrabajo, lunes a viernes 08:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m. Si cumples con el perfil Postúlate a esta gran oportunidad laboral.  Correo: dgomezg@ext.sonda.com Asunto: Desarrollador de Software Sector Salud - Bogotá   ¿Preparad@ para el desafío?

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  We are a technology company working to transform credit and banking in Latin America starting with point of sale finance. We aim to build fair, simple and affordable financial services that empower our clients, treating them with dignity, and building financial freedom. We launched in February 2019 and have already served thousands of clients and disbursed millions of dollars.  We operate as a full stack startup. We have built our core systems and processes from scratch, and we believe our technology and analytics platform will drive our progress into the years to come. We come at this with deep experience building and growing technology teams and financial products. As important as what we do is how we do it. We are a conscious company, and are deeply committed to working and living our five core values - A company of owners inspiring colleagues, we pull rabbits out of hats, we care and we trust, act with integrity, win today every day, and scale exponentially  We are backed by Andreessen Horowitz, Monashees, Village Global, and an outstanding team of individual angels, including Kevin Ryan, Josh Abramowitz, and Scott Weiss.  What you will do Take e2e ownership and operate the software that you design, develop, test and release into production. Work closely with designers, engineers, and product owners to build great products and experiences for our clients and allies. Architect and develop world-class user interfaces which combines usability, maintainability, and performance. Develop software on a daily basis using our frontend technical stack based on Typescript, Storybook, React, and React Native. Review pull requests on a daily basis transferring your knowledge with your team. Receive mentorship from everyone on the team, from more experienced members to people who are just starting. Deploy new features to production on a daily basis using our CI/CD pipeline. Be on-call occasionally. We rotate to distribute our knowledge and experience. Contribute to our Architecture Decision Records where you will be able to propose new techniques, patterns, and tools for our evolving platform. Requirements You have 3+ years of full-time technical work experience as a software engineer. We will adjust the seniority of the role accordingly. Great communication abilities with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Willingness to work with a distributed team. Good foundations in UX/UI design. Strong expertise building user interfaces using well-structured HTML and CSS code. Experience with modern JavaScript libraries and tools. Awareness of web performance optimization techniques. Benefits Work on a problem that matters and help change customers’ lives. Build a lasting company from the very beginning, helping define every aspect of it. Massive market opportunity ahead of us; we are growing faster than pretty much any other fintech lender was at our stage. Work alongside a great and diverse team that cares about what we are doing and how we are doing it. Generous compensation, including equity, 100% health insurance (and 50% for dependents), flexible time-off, learning budget, fitness allowance and visa sponsorship for foreigners. How The Hiring Process Looks Like Meet with our recruiter for a 30-minute video chat. We will get to know you better, understand what you’re looking for, and answer any questions you might have about ADDI. Meet with one Frontend software engineer for a 45-minute video chat interview. Here, we will ask you questions about your technical background and basic computer science concepts. You will be able to ask any questions about the culture and how we work at ADDI. Complete a simple take-home challenge within a 1-week window. With this technical challenge, we want to see your technical expertise solving a real-world problem. We expect that you invest 5 hours or less in developing a working solution. Meet with a Frontend software engineer and the engineering manager for a 45-minute chat to talk about your take-home exercise submission and any questions you might have. Meet onsite with one of our founders for a 30-minute chat to talk about the vision of the company, what we are building and how you will contribute to our product.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo *Non bilingual candidates won't be considered for this position*  Job description: The Sales/Operations Analyst works as part of the Sales Team, to support the Business Development Representatives, Account Executives, and Customer Success Managers by acquiring relevant information as well as assisting in the development of specific projects to reach mutually agreed goals.  Responsibilities: · Update CRM records and general CRM maintenance. · Assisting in managing specific requests such a Trade Shows attendees list, wish list accounts, etc. · Maintain data integrity within customer records in CRM and other systems · Collecting data from various sources. · Collaborate with Sales Operations manager to determine and address data and reporting needs for various Sales and CSM projects. · Propose new ideas to gather the information efficiently. · Analyze historical data to provide insights, recommendation and actions plans based on trends observed. · Perform other duties as assigned  Skills and Knowledge: English level B2 Intermediate Excel skills. Knowledge in marketing, sales and data bases. Knowledge in Hubspot or Salesforce are a plus. One year of related experience. Results-driven. Strong interpersonal and time-management skills. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Teamwork.  The candidate can be located in Medellín, Bogotá or Barranquilla.  Schedule: 8am to 5pm
Descripción (inglés): *Non bilingual candidates won't be considered for this position*  Job description: The Sales/Operations Analyst works as part of the Sales Team, to support the Business Development Representatives, Account Executives, and Customer Success Managers by acquiring relevant information as well as assisting in the development of specific projects to reach mutually agreed goals.  Responsibilities: · Update CRM records and general CRM maintenance. · Assisting in managing specific requests such a Trade Shows attendees list, wish list accounts, etc. · Maintain data integrity within customer records in CRM and other systems · Collecting data from various sources. · Collaborate with Sales Operations manager to determine and address data and reporting needs for various Sales and CSM projects. · Propose new ideas to gather the information efficiently. · Analyze historical data to provide insights, recommendation and actions plans based on trends observed. · Perform other duties as assigned  Skills and Knowledge: English level B2 Intermediate Excel skills. Knowledge in marketing, sales and data bases. Knowledge in Hubspot or Salesforce are a plus. One year of related experience. Results-driven. Strong interpersonal and time-management skills. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Teamwork.  The candidate can be located in Medellín, Bogotá or Barranquilla.  Schedule: 8am to 5pm

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Gorilla Logic provides nearshore Agile teams to Fortune 500 and SMB companies, bringing unparalleled expertise in the delivery of full-stack web, mobile, and enterprise applications. Our highly collaborative Agile Gorillas are uniquely qualified to implement complex software initiatives. With offices in the United States, Costa Rica, and Colombia, Gorilla Logic helps clients gain competitive advantages to achieve results faster.  Full-Stack Ruby on Rails Developer  Gorilla Logic is looking for a Fullstack Ruby on Rails Developer, working on our client’s production web application. Based in Medellin, Colombia, this is a unique and highly technical role, requiring strong Ruby on Rails and web development experience in delivering a leading-edge platform solution. Our environment will require you to work effectively with your teammates, of course. But your real success will be measured by how well you couple critical thinking with self-motivation, enthusiasm, and determination.  Technical Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience). 3+ years of development experience. 1+ years of Ruby on Rails development experience. 1+ years of web development experience with modern JavaScript framework; React preferred. Experience with Active Record. Must have the ability to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Strong communication skills to interact with Agile team members.  Bonus Skills Experience with Node.js . Experience with React/Redux is a big plus.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Medellín, Antioquia /  AI Fund – Bearing.ai /  Full time  Bearing is at the forefront of bringing AI to the maritime shipping industry. This is a trillion dollar industry that moves 90% of the goods we interact with on a daily basis, but has traditionally lagged far behind other industries in adopting new technologies. At Bearing, we’re changing that. We’re building an AI-driven platform that helps shipping companies dramatically streamline their operations and tackle their biggest pain points. We’ve already built our first product and have some of the world’s biggest shippers as our customers. Our team is made up of highly experienced AI engineers and tech industry veterans and we’re backed by the AI Fund and shipping industry investors.  We are currently looking for an exceptionally talented Software Engineers to join our small team. You will be responsible for building out our API to support our new WebApp as well as helping us develop new AI-driven products. Since you’ll be joining an early-stage startup at the ground level, you’ll need to be able to wear multiple hats and thrive while working in a dynamic environment.  Lead the development of a RESTful API to support our new WebApp: Collaborating closely with the rest of our engineering team, you will architect and build out a scalable, reliable back-end for our new WebApp.  Architect and implement new features from scratch: Partnering with our Machine Learning engineers, you will lead the end-to-end development of new AI-driven products.  Improve code across the entire stack: You will identify bugs and performance issues across the stack and work to improve those. You will also build performance monitoring and testing tools to ensure our product quality stays high.  What You Must Bring:  5+ years professional experience shipping production-ready code Strong computer science foundations, including data structures & algorithms, OS, Computer Networks, databases Expertise in Python Experience in setting up data pipelines and databases Proficiency in HTML, CSS and JavaScript Experience developing RESTful APIs Basic understanding of Machine Learning models Expertise with version control systems, such as Git Excellent communication skills and the ability to have in-depth technical discussions with both the engineering team and business people Knowledge of Unix/Linux systems Experience with Amazon AWS and containerization technologies Excellent English language skills BSc in Computer Science, Mathematics or similar field; Master’s or PhD degree is a plus Self-starter and comfort working in an early-stage environment  Nice to Haves:  Experience shipping Machine Learning products Experience working on logistics or shipping-related products Experience with Agile development  What We Have to Offer:  Company equity benefit Food & commute benefits Work from home benefits Medical and dental Insurance coverage for you and family members. Monthly education budget Collegial atmosphere Direct and transparent communication style Innovative environment Work with global AI Leaders Be part of a great cause to improve lives everywhere through artificial intelligence  At Bearing, we are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy (including childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information (including characteristics and testing), military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. AI Fund believes that diversity and inclusion among our employees is critical to our success as a company, and we seek to recruit, develop and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool. Selection for employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo ¡Buscamos talento como tú! ¡Postula tu hoja de vida!  Marca orgullosamente colombiana del sector de alimentos, ¡te ofrece un ambiente colaborativo y cercano! Nos encontramos en búsqueda de un Analista de Logística Bilingüe - Bogotá  ¿Qué necesitas para aplicar? Profesional graduado en Ingeniería industrial, Administración o carreras afines. Preferiblemente conocimientos en el sistema modular SAP (Especialmente Módulo MM y SD) y cadena de abastecimiento. Manejo de Paquete Office - Excel Intermedio. Mínimo 2 años de experiencia en cargos afines.  Este rol se enfoca en asegurar la transversalidad en la configuración y administración del maestro de materiales para los procesos que realizan las diferentes áreas de la compañía y clientes externo.  IMPORTANTE:  Si cumples con el perfil anteriormente mencionado, te invitamos a aplicar a esta oferta y adicional envíanos tu hoja de vida indicándonos tu aspiración salarial y nivel de inglés al correo: seleccion@juanvaldezcafe.com con el asunto “Analista de Logística Bilingüe”
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'We are looking for talent like you! Postulate your resume! Proudly Colombian brand of the food industry, it offers you a collaborative and close environment! We are looking for a Bilingual Logistics Analyst - Bogotá What do you need to apply? Professional graduate in Industrial Engineering, Administration or related careers. Preferably knowledge in the modular SAP system (especially Module MM and SD) and supply chain. Office - Excel Intermediate Package Handling. Minimum 2 years of experience in related positions. This role focuses on ensuring the transversality in the configuration and management of the master of materials for the different areas of the company and external customers. IMPORTANT: If you comply with the profile mentioned above, we invite you to apply to this offer and additional send us your resume indicating your salary aspiration and level of English to the mail: select@juanvaldezcafe.com with the subject “Bilingüe Logistics Analyst”'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  Nuestros aprendices deben ser orientados a los detalles, con habilidades en expresión oral y escrita y con deseos de ayudarnos a superar las expectativas de nuestros clientes; brindado un servicio profesional, oportuno y de calidad. Esta posición requiere una constante orientación a la acción, al mismo tiempo que flexibilidad para resolver los problemas de los clientes sobre acelerar órdenes y corregir problemas posteriores a la venta de productos. La comunicación principal con los clientes se da a través de llamadas telefónicas y correos electrónicos, utilizando variedad de herramientas de software para navegar a través de las cuentas de los clientes, así como para buscar y revisar políticas y brindar la mejor resolución en un ambiente divertido y de ritmo veloz.  A continuación encontrará una serie de habilidades que le permitirán tener éxito en esta posición:  Habilidades Técnicas Habilidad para utilizar computadora de escritorio. Conocimiento sobre Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Outlook. Excelentes habilidades de escritura. Comprensión del uso de Internet, así como de la página web de Amazon.com y de las páginas web de la competencia. Habilidades De Comunicación Capacidad para comunicarse de manera clara y asertiva con clientes, tanto internos como externos. Excelentes habilidades de documentación de información. Buena comprensión de los problemas presentados por los clientes. Habilidades de composición – capacidad para redactar respuestas de manera correcta, concisa y precisa. Habilidades De Resolución De Problemas Habilidad para comprender problemas de manera lógica. Resolución efectiva de problemas. Capacidad para aprender y tomar decisiones rápidas. Persona disciplinada y orientada a la acción. Orientación al detalle y alta capacidad de organización. Habilidad para priorizar actividades asegurando el cumplimiento de los estándares de manejo de tiempo. Habilidades Para Centrarse En El Cliente Orientación al servicio al cliente. Empatía y capacidad de priorizar las necesidades de los clientes. Habilidades interpersonales. Resolución de conflictos y negociación efectiva. Capacidad para determinar las necesidades de los clientes y proveer soluciones apropiadas a estas.  Basic Qualifications Diploma de Bachiller Mayor de 18 años Si eres extranjero, permiso de trabajo Preferred Qualifications Adaptabilidad a un ambiente rápido, enérgico y de tareas diversas. Resolución problemas de manera creativa y analítica. Gran pasión por el servicio al cliente. Experiencia previa en roles similares es deseable. Nivel mínimo de inglés requerido B1 Manejo de excel y herramientas de Office  Company - Amazon Operation Serv Colombia  Job ID: A2301232
Descripción (inglés): [{'translation_text': 'Description Our apprentices must be oriented to detail, with skills in oral and written expression and with desires to help us to exceed the expectations of our clients; provided a professional, timely and quality service. This position requires a constant orientation to the action, at the same time flexibility to solve the problems of the clients on speeding orders and correcting problems post sale of products. The main communication with the customers is given through phone calls and e-mails, using variety of software tools to navigate through the accounts of the clients, as well as to find and review policies and provide the best resolution in a fun and fast paced environment. Below you will find a series of skills that will allow you to be successful in this position: Skills Techniques Ability to use desktop computer, both internal and external. Knowledge about Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Outlook. Excellent writing skills. Understanding the problems presented by the clients, as well as the problems of composition, capacity and ability to use the website.'}]

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Site Name: Bogota Samsung Tower  Posted Date: Nov 22 2022  Position Name: Systems & Analytics Coordinator Latam  In this role, you will support and lead overall regional projects for working as part of the Commercial Excellence team, that executes the Regional agenda and helps create the roadmap in partnership with Tech product owners, business partners and markets in: Salesforce execution requirements (Pharmacy and Expert) for Sales Force Effectiveness / CRM and Sell In & Sell Out Including but not exclusively Orange stores, FSFA metrics, Pharmacy dashboards, Ipsos and advantage benchmarking.  Your Responsibilities:  Lead the development of local/regional reports (preferably in PowerBI). Increase visibility and drive reporting standards and insights of data and BI usage to greater enable our commercial teams Accomplish align roadmap and drive a step change shift in our ability Develop Data Management of the functional process in charge Develop LATAM Analytics Reports base in market needs. Ensure the functioning of the tools developed. Ensure the functioning of the tools developed. Increase visibility and drive reporting standards and insights of FSFA data and CRM usage to greater enable our sales teams. Increase visibility and drive reporting standards and insights of FSFA data and CRM usage to greater enable our sales teams. Primary interface with Global/Regional System & Analytics roadmap. Transition responsibilities: Colombia activities as Daily Sales and Sell Out reporting, commission, CRM support, others.  We’re striving to create a climate where we celebrate our diversity in all forms by treating each other with respect, listening to different viewpoints, supporting our communities, and creating a workplace where your authentic self belongs and thrives. We believe in an agile working culture for all our roles. If flexibility is important to you, we encourage you to explore with our hiring team what the opportunities are.  Why you?  Basic Qualifications:  We are looking for professionals with these characteristics to achieve our goals  Professional in administrative or related careers Min 2-3 years of progressive experience in Commercial Area, mainly in Business Analytics. Sales Force effectiveness expert. Project management and leadership capabilities. Deep understanding of Pharmacy and Mass commercial practices. Strong systems and analytical background. Data Management. Strong knowledge on BI Reporting (preferably experience in PowerBI)  The position requires that the person have notions of the functionality of the business with administrative, analytical & financial issues. This will allow a better understanding of the information for a correct development of the analyzes.  If you feel this is your next career move, please apply up to November 16, 2022  ¿Why Haleon?  Our values and expectations are at the heart of everything we do and define our culture so that together we can deliver extraordinary impact for patients and consumers and make Haleon a brilliant place to work.  As a Haleon employee you will be encouraged to be you in a diverse and inclusive environment that focus on your wellbeing and enables you to feel good and to thrive, and gather the opportunities we offer to learn, develop and keep growing.  At Haleon we believe that we all bring something unique and when we combine our knowledge, experiences, and styles together, the impact is incredible. Join us to make the difference in an important role in benefit of patients and consumers around the world.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Noble employs a team of passionate individuals who are changing the face of customer engagement. Over our 40-year history we have empowered employees by creating an inspired community that values Urgency, Accountability and Results. Our ability to think big has enabled us to continually evolve and lead the market, and to stay on the forefront with exciting technologies including cloud, mobile and artificial intelligence.  Job Description  GENERAL SCOPE & SUMMARY  Provide remote technical and application problem resolution and escalation assistance related to Aspect products. Diagnose, troubleshoot, repair and debug complex computer systems and software. Respond to situations where end users have failed to isolate or resolve problems in malfunctioning equipment or software.  Primary Role & Responsibilities  Gain knowledge of assigned customers' technical and business environment. Document and verify reported problems. Troubleshoot and resolve issues utilizing all available tools, resources, and documentation. Engage additional resources when necessary. Provide effective and consistent communication to management, peers and account team in support of customer. Working knowledge of main Aspect products and strategy.  Qualifications  SPECIALIZED KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS  Understanding of PCs, Networks, OS platforms, databases, telephony, software applications, and ACDs. Demonstrated ability to learn complex software tools quickly. Strong customer service and teamwork skills. Professional demeanor to maintain and enhance customer relationships. Ability to use professional concepts and company policies and procedures to solve routine problems. Ability to develop resolutions to problems of limited scope and follow standard practices and procedures in analyzing situations or data from which answers can be readily obtained.  Job Requirements  2+ years relevant work experience supporting customers in a technical environment OR commensurate college-level coursework, or a combination of both. Some travel, after-hours, or on-call work may be required. Shift flexibility including weekends. Technical Certifications and second or third languages a plus but not required  Noble is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer with a strong commitment to diversity. In that spirit, we are particularly interested in receiving applications from a broad spectrum of people, including women, minorities, individuals with disabilities, veterans or any other legally protected group.

Título: Especialista en Subvenciones y Subcontratos / Grants and Subcontracts Specialist
Descripción: Acerca del empleo ANTECEDENTES DEL PROYECTO La Actividad de Financiamiento Equitativo (EFA, por sus siglas en inglés) de USAID/Colombia es una iniciativa de cinco años que se asociará con las poblaciones desatendidas, el sector de servicios financieros y el Gobierno de Colombia para abordar las limitaciones de la demanda, la oferta y el entorno propicio que limitan el acceso a servicios financieros formales. servicios para los colombianos rurales y afectados por el conflicto. OBJETIVO El Especialista en Subvenciones y Subcontratos será responsable de implementar el programa de subvenciones del proyecto en estrecha colaboración y supervisión de la gerenta del Fondo de Actividades (AFM por sus siglas en inglés). Él/ella servirá como enlace entre el personal del proyecto, los subcontratistas y los beneficiarios para garantizar que los beneficiarios y los subcontratistas implementen las actividades del proyecto con alta calidad y cumplan con los requisitos de presentación de informes. En este rol, el Especialista en Subvenciones y Subcontratos coordinará los equipos de proyectos relevantes, incluido el personal técnico, de M&E, de comunicaciones, financiero y operativo, con el objetivo principal del proyecto de garantizar una implementación eficaz y eficiente. Él/ella se asegurará de que el beneficiario y el subcontratista cumplan con las normas y reglamentos de USAID y las políticas y procedimientos de gestión de subvenciones y subcontratación de DAI.  TAREAS • Bajo la supervisión de la AFM, apoya la gestión del programa de subvenciones bajo contratos (GUC), incluida la provisión de insumos clave para el diseño del programa basado en objetivos técnicos. • Bajo la supervisión de la AFM, respalda el mecanismo de fondo de subvenciones en pleno funcionamiento, desde el inicio hasta el cierre, es decir, la coordinación del comité de selección de subvenciones, la selección de beneficiarios, la implementación de subvenciones hasta la ejecución y la firma de la adjudicación hasta el cierre de la subvención. • Apoya el cumplimiento de las normas y reglamentos de los donantes con respecto a la gestión de subvenciones, supervisa y facilita el cumplimiento de los requisitos de los donantes y de la DAI, garantiza el cumplimiento de los reglamentos financieros y de adquisiciones de acuerdo con los objetivos del proyecto. • Tiene conocimiento de las regulaciones de cumplimiento de ADS del Gobierno de los EE. UU. con respecto a las subvenciones. En coordinación/conjunción con el personal del proyecto EFA, brinda capacitación, orientación y apoyo a los beneficiarios para garantizar una gestión y administración coherentes de su proyecto. • Coordina el apoyo a los beneficiarios para garantizar su implementación de conformidad con los requisitos del proyecto EFA. • Garantiza la gestión de la información de calidad a través del mantenimiento regular de los archivos de subvenciones, los calendarios de informes, los rastreadores de fondos, el envío y la actualización de la documentación interna de la DAI. • Coordina con el equipo de operaciones (finanzas y adquisiciones) y el personal técnico del programa para facilitar las reuniones de lanzamiento del concesionario, los informes de progreso y el cierre de las actividades del subsidio. • En estrecha coordinación con los beneficiarios, identifica los desafíos de implementación de los beneficiarios y se asegura de que los beneficiarios reciban el apoyo necesario de los equipos técnicos, de M&E, de subvenciones, de comunicaciones, financieros y/u operativos del proyecto. • En colaboración con AFM, brinda orientación e interpretación de las políticas, los procedimientos y los reglamentos de las subvenciones al personal del programa y a los beneficiarios, según sea necesario. • Apoya los esfuerzos para monitorear y evaluar las actividades técnicas y administrativas de los concesionarios, para garantizar que las operaciones estén a tiempo y que el proyecto financiado por la subvención se lleve a cabo de conformidad con los sistemas, políticas y procedimientos de DAI y USAID. • Establece y mantiene controles de sistema adecuados para garantizar la exactitud de los estados financieros, de conformidad con las reglamentaciones administrativas y contables gubernamentales aplicables. • Asegura que AFM y el personal del proyecto relevante se mantengan informados, asesorando sobre el progreso del beneficiario, destacando áreas de preocupación y comunicando un enfoque proactivo y orientado a soluciones para la gestión general del programa de subvenciones. • Coordina las auditorías financieras anuales y de otros concesionarios, incluida la preparación de programas e información de respaldo, responde a las preguntas del auditor y consolida los formatos de los informes. • Elabora y proporciona informes periódicos para una gestión adecuada según sea necesario o solicitado. • Brinda a la gerencia de proyectos un informe mensual sobre el estado del desembolso de las subvenciones, brindando información para los informes trimestrales sobre las subvenciones emitidas, el estado y cualquier nota pertinente. • Apoya el proceso de cierre de la subvención para cada subvención individual • Otras funciones que le sean asignadas. CALIFICACIONES PREFERIDAS • Una licenciatura o equivalente. • Se prefiere al menos 5 años de experiencia laboral con un mínimo de 2 años de experiencia en gestión de subvenciones para programas complejos financiados por donantes. • Experiencia con proyectos financiados por USAID y conocimiento de las normas y reglamentos relacionados con la gestión de subvenciones altamente deseable. • Precisión en el trabajo con grandes cantidades de datos y capacidad para administrar y priorizar cargas de trabajo • Excelentes habilidades de comunicación oral, escrita e interpersonal. • Competencia en Microsoft Office Suite o software relacionado. Nivel de responsabilidad y salario acorde con antecedentes y experiencia.
Descripción (inglés): ANTECEDENTES DEL PROYECTO La Actividad de Financiamiento Equitativo (EFA, por sus siglas en inglés) de USAID/Colombia es una iniciativa de cinco años que se asociará con las poblaciones desatendidas, el sector de servicios financieros y el Gobierno de Colombia para abordar las limitaciones de la demanda, la oferta y el entorno propicio que limitan el acceso a servicios financieros formales. servicios para los colombianos rurales y afectados por el conflicto. OBJETIVO El Especialista en Subvenciones y Subcontratos será responsable de implementar el programa de subvenciones del proyecto en estrecha colaboración y supervisión de la gerenta del Fondo de Actividades (AFM por sus siglas en inglés). Él/ella servirá como enlace entre el personal del proyecto, los subcontratistas y los beneficiarios para garantizar que los beneficiarios y los subcontratistas implementen las actividades del proyecto con alta calidad y cumplan con los requisitos de presentación de informes. En este rol, el Especialista en Subvenciones y Subcontratos coordinará los equipos de proyectos relevantes, incluido el personal técnico, de M&E, de comunicaciones, financiero y operativo, con el objetivo principal del proyecto de garantizar una implementación eficaz y eficiente. Él/ella se asegurará de que el beneficiario y el subcontratista cumplan con las normas y reglamentos de USAID y las políticas y procedimientos de gestión de subvenciones y subcontratación de DAI.  TAREAS • Bajo la supervisión de la AFM, apoya la gestión del programa de subvenciones bajo contratos (GUC), incluida la provisión de insumos clave para el diseño del programa basado en objetivos técnicos. • Bajo la supervisión de la AFM, respalda el mecanismo de fondo de subvenciones en pleno funcionamiento, desde el inicio hasta el cierre, es decir, la coordinación del comité de selección de subvenciones, la selección de beneficiarios, la implementación de subvenciones hasta la ejecución y la firma de la adjudicación hasta el cierre de la subvención. • Apoya el cumplimiento de las normas y reglamentos de los donantes con respecto a la gestión de subvenciones, supervisa y facilita el cumplimiento de los requisitos de los donantes y de la DAI, garantiza el cumplimiento de los reglamentos financieros y de adquisiciones de acuerdo con los objetivos del proyecto. • Tiene conocimiento de las regulaciones de cumplimiento de ADS del Gobierno de los EE. UU. con respecto a las subvenciones. En coordinación/conjunción con el personal del proyecto EFA, brinda capacitación, orientación y apoyo a los beneficiarios para garantizar una gestión y administración coherentes de su proyecto. • Coordina el apoyo a los beneficiarios para garantizar su implementación de conformidad con los requisitos del proyecto EFA. • Garantiza la gestión de la información de calidad a través del mantenimiento regular de los archivos de subvenciones, los calendarios de informes, los rastreadores de fondos, el envío y la actualización de la documentación interna de la DAI. • Coordina con el equipo de operaciones (finanzas y adquisiciones) y el personal técnico del programa para facilitar las reuniones de lanzamiento del concesionario, los informes de progreso y el cierre de las actividades del subsidio. • En estrecha coordinación con los beneficiarios, identifica los desafíos de implementación de los beneficiarios y se asegura de que los beneficiarios reciban el apoyo necesario de los equipos técnicos, de M&E, de subvenciones, de comunicaciones, financieros y/u operativos del proyecto. • En colaboración con AFM, brinda orientación e interpretación de las políticas, los procedimientos y los reglamentos de las subvenciones al personal del programa y a los beneficiarios, según sea necesario. • Apoya los esfuerzos para monitorear y evaluar las actividades técnicas y administrativas de los concesionarios, para garantizar que las operaciones estén a tiempo y que el proyecto financiado por la subvención se lleve a cabo de conformidad con los sistemas, políticas y procedimientos de DAI y USAID. • Establece y mantiene controles de sistema adecuados para garantizar la exactitud de los estados financieros, de conformidad con las reglamentaciones administrativas y contables gubernamentales aplicables. • Asegura que AFM y el personal del proyecto relevante se mantengan informados, asesorando sobre el progreso del beneficiario, destacando áreas de preocupación y comunicando un enfoque proactivo y orientado a soluciones para la gestión general del programa de subvenciones. • Coordina las auditorías financieras anuales y de otros concesionarios, incluida la preparación de programas e información de respaldo, responde a las preguntas del auditor y consolida los formatos de los informes. • Elabora y proporciona informes periódicos para una gestión adecuada según sea necesario o solicitado. • Brinda a la gerencia de proyectos un informe mensual sobre el estado del desembolso de las subvenciones, brindando información para los informes trimestrales sobre las subvenciones emitidas, el estado y cualquier nota pertinente. • Apoya el proceso de cierre de la subvención para cada subvención individual • Otras funciones que le sean asignadas. CALIFICACIONES PREFERIDAS • Una licenciatura o equivalente. • Se prefiere al menos 5 años de experiencia laboral con un mínimo de 2 años de experiencia en gestión de subvenciones para programas complejos financiados por donantes. • Experiencia con proyectos financiados por USAID y conocimiento de las normas y reglamentos relacionados con la gestión de subvenciones altamente deseable. • Precisión en el trabajo con grandes cantidades de datos y capacidad para administrar y priorizar cargas de trabajo • Excelentes habilidades de comunicación oral, escrita e interpersonal. • Competencia en Microsoft Office Suite o software relacionado. Nivel de responsabilidad y salario acorde con antecedentes y experiencia.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo WE HAVE SEVERAL POSITIONS TO FILL IN LATIN AMERICA - YOU CAN WORK REMOTELY FROM THE COMFORT OF YOUR HOME!  The Microsoft 365 team is looking for software developers. Are you interested in working on a product that ships new features every week?  Would you like to design and develop new components that solve complex distributed systems and search optimization problems?  If the answer to these questions is yes, then Microsoft 365 team would like to hear from you! We write software from the ground-up, running across thousands of servers. We are currently building a new system for searching data in an enterprise.  The goal of the system is to efficiently search all entity types such as emails, calendar items, contacts, documents, and so on with latency in milliseconds. To design the new system, we are applying a combination of approaches from the fields of API design, Machine Learning, Distributed Computing, Workflow engines, Algorithm Optimization, and many more. Come to define, design and deliver the next state of enterprise search system.  Responsibilities  Your responsibilities will include some or all the below: Designing and developing search platform related features and solutions Collaborate with the team on building a highly scalable and high performance search stack Collaborate with customers and partners to understand user requirements and design features to enable rich search experiences Working on distributed infrastructure, released and managing live service in production. Qualifications  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in CS or equivalent experience At least 3 years’ experience in designing, developing and shipping software Solid C++/C#/Java skills with at least 5 years of C++/C#/Java programming experience 2+ years of experience in distributed systems and agile development environment Prior experience with development in large low-latency high-volume services, experience with service-oriented development and cloud-based systems. Experience in writing efficient multi-threaded and concurrent code Strong verbal and written communication skills in English with excellent interpersonal communication and collaboration skills Demonstrated commitment to the success of others. Preferred Qualifications Passion for delivering high quality software on a rapid ship cycle Enjoy learning and ramping up on new technologies quickly. Requirements  These requirements include, but are not limited to the following specialized security screenings  Ability to meet Microsoft, customer and/or government security screening requirements are required for this role.  Microsoft Cloud Background Check: This position will be required to pass the Microsoft Cloud Background Check upon hire/transfer and every two years thereafter.  Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.  Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Description  We are a technology company working to transform credit and banking in Latin America starting with point of sale finance. We aim to build fair, simple and affordable financial services that empower our clients, treating them with dignity, and building financial freedom. We launched in February 2019 and have already served thousands of clients and disbursed millions of dollars.  We operate as a full stack startup. We have built our core systems and processes from scratch, and we believe our technology and analytics platform will drive our progress into the years to come. We come at this with deep experience building and growing technology teams and financial products. As important as what we do is how we do it. We are a conscious company, and are deeply committed to working and living our five core values - A company of owners inspiring colleagues, we pull rabbits out of hats, we care and we trust, act with integrity, win today every day, and scale exponentially  We are backed by Andreessen Horowitz, Monashees, Village Global, and an outstanding team of individual angels, including Kevin Ryan, Josh Abramowitz, and Scott Weiss.  What you will do Take e2e ownership and operate the software that you design, develop, test and release into production. Work closely with designers, engineers, and product owners to build great products and experiences for our clients and allies. Architect resilient and scalable components leveraging our architectural styles and patterns. Develop new features using our Python stack. Develop unit/component/integration tests that guarantees the reliability of the features that you build. Review pull requests on a daily basis transferring your knowledge with your team. Receive mentorship from everyone on the team - from more experienced members to junior folks who are just starting. Deploy new features to production on a daily basis using our CI/CD pipeline. Be on call occasionally. We rotate to distribute our knowledge and experience. Contribute to our Architecture Decision Records where you will be able to propose new techniques, patterns and tools for our evolving platform. Requirements You have 3+ years of full time technical work experience as a software engineer. We will adjust the role accordingly. Great communication abilities with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Willingness to work with a distributed team. Good foundations in distributed systems and cloud computing. Experience with modern Python libraries and tools. Awareness of most used design patterns and architectural styles. Benefits Work on a problem that matters and help change customers’ lives. Build a lasting company from the very beginning, helping define every aspect of it. Be at the center of it all. We are a true technology company, and engineering is at the core of what we do. Massive market opportunity ahead of us; we are growing faster than pretty much any other fintech lender was at our stage. Work alongside a great and diverse team that cares about what we are doing and how we are doing it. Generous compensation, including equity, 100% health insurance (and 50% for dependents), flexible time-off, learning budget, and visa sponsorship for foreigners. How The Hiring Process Looks Like Meet with our recruiter for a 30-minute video chat. We will get to know you better, understand what you’re looking for, and answer any questions you might have about ADDI. Meet with one backend software engineer for a 45-minute video chat interview. Here, we will ask you questions about your technical background and basic computer science concepts. You will be able to ask any questions about the culture and how we work at ADDI. Complete a simple take-home challenge within a 1-week window. With this technical challenge, we want to see your technical expertise solving a real-world problem. We expect that you invest 5 hours or less in developing a working solution. Meet with a backend software engineer and the engineering manager for a 45-minute chat to talk about your take-home exercise submission and any questions you might have. Meet onsite with one of our founders for a 30-minute chat to talk about the vision of the company, what we are building and how you will contribute to our product.

Título: QA (Quality Assurance) Automation Engineer with Cypress - Remote - Colombia
Descripción: Acerca del empleo FullStack Labs is the fastest-growing software consultancy in the Americas. We help organizations like Uber, GoDaddy, MGM, Siemens, Stanford University, and the State of California, build distributed software development teams, and deliver transformational digital solutions. As an employee-first company, we focus on hiring the most talented software designers and developers in the western hemisphere, by creating a positive, respectful, and supportive work environment where they can achieve their greatest potential.  We’re most proud of: Offering life-changing career opportunities to talented software professionals across the Americas. Building highly-skilled software development teams for hundreds of the world’s greatest companies. Having delivered hundreds of successful custom software solutions, which have positively impacted the lives and careers of millions of users. Our 4.7-star rating on GlassDoor. Our client Net Promoter Score of 64, twice the industry average. Sustained growth of 100% - 200% per year.  The Position:  As a QA Automation Engineer at FullStack Labs, your primary responsibilities will be to design automated tests to validate the applications we build for clients. Each day at FSL, you will be collaborating with other members of the engineering team to solve problems with the application. You will develop automated tests and configure testing automation environments. You will ensure proper test coverage and will test features to ensure they are properly built, function as they are designed to function, and correctly solve clients' problems. To do this you will gain a deep understanding of our client's business and the problems that the software is designed to solve. The automated test coverage that you will create will ensure that the products we create maintain their level of excellence and do not regress. You'll work with our incredible clients in one of two ways: Team Augmentation / Staffing: You will integrate yourself directly into our client's team and work alongside their existing designers and engineers on a daily basis. Design & Build: You will work on a FullStack Labs product team to build and deliver a product to our clients.  What We're Looking For: 3+ years of Quality Assurance experience. Advanced English is required. A thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle. Well-versed with STLC and defect life cycle. Ability to work well with team members within an agile development team. Identifies defects and creates informative bug reports and effectively follows up on bug closure. Advises the team on major issues to product quality. Deep understanding of testing philosophies like TDD, BDD, etc. Knowledge of how to create and execute test plans Experience working on more than one time-sensitive project at a time. Proactively tests, provides test coverage, and resolves issues. Works closely with team members to emphasize quality throughout the entire SDLC. You must have an extremely high, forensic attention to detail. A natural orientation to detail is the most important skill set for this position. You naturally notice small imperfections in seemingly high-quality work. You care deeply about building flawless user experiences and have a visceral reaction to low-quality work. You DO sweat the small stuff. You must have strong computer / technical skills...using technology comes naturally to you. Strong work ethic and the ability to focus on multi-task throughout the day. A positive, optimistic, can-do attitude. Excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent customer service skills, placing customer outcomes as a focal point for all actions and decisions.  Technologies: Experience with some (not all) of these technologies is required: SauceLabs / BrowserStack / Kobiton. Postman. Jira. Slack. GitHub. Toggl. Mac OS. Terminal. XCode/Android Studio. Figma/Invision.  Benefits: Competitive Salary. Paid Time Off (vacation, sick leave, maternity and paternity leave, holidays). 100% remote work. The ability to work with leading startups and Fortune 500 companies. Health policy with Sura 100% for you and up to 4 primary family members. English Classes. Sodexo food card. 2 additional extra-legal bonuses per year worth up to 10% of salary. Virtual company events each month. Ample opportunity for career advancement. Continuing education opportunities.  FullStack Labs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form, which can be provided upon request during our hiring and interview process.  Learn more about our Applicants Privacy Notice .

Descripción: Acerca del empleo Job Title: FP&A Analyst Location: Colombia (Willing to relocate)  Qualifications Minimum 2 yeas of experience working in accountability and financial areas Analysis of business performance/profitability. Budget preparation, financial planning, financial reporting experience, Forecast and Strong Accountability knowledge Financial statement interpretation, knowledge in Gross Margin Profitability Drivers Results presentation to Managers, metrics and indicators management Results orientation at financial level, Efficient cost management- Familiar with ERP Programs (Desirable SAP/Oracle EBS - especially Cost and Overheads module) Good knowledge of US GAAP/IFRS Experience handling HFM (Hyperion Financial Management is a plus) Advance English (B2/C1), Advance Microsoft Excel
